1b1(phal chen): bam po drug bcu partsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sa
1b2(phal chen): brgyal pos 'di bskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyi ba dang // grangs ma mchis pa zhe
1b3(phal chen): bya ba de bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan pa lags// tshad ma mchis pa dang kun tu mtha' yas pa dang bgrang du mi rung
1b4(phal chen): dang // mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang brjod du ma mchis pa las// ji ltar bstan par 'gyu
1b5(phal chen): de bskad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi brgyal po la 'di bskad ces bka' bstsal to// kye skyes bu de/ 
1b6(phal chen): ba legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjesu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs brgyas kyi ye shes kyis 'khyen pa'i ngon
1b7(phal chen): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par brdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar sems pa legs so// dengs skyes bu dam pa legs par nyon lar
2a1(phal chen): tu yid la bzung shig/ dang bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das las
2a2(phal chen): phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'dir skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa de la 'di bskad ces bya ste/ brgya pa stong phrag brgya bye ba'o// bye ba bye ba na/ khong khong ngo // khro
2a3(phal chen): khong na khod khrod do// tha gru'o// tha gru tha gru na khrig khrig go// khrag khrig khrig khrag na thams thams so// thams thams na/ myang myad do// myad mya na gang yang 'o// g.yag gang yag na ban
2a4(phal chen): bun no// ngan bun na/ byar phyur ro// phyar byur byar phyur na/ lcag lcig go// lug lcig lcag lpag na/ byang bying ngo // byang bying byang byingan/ cem cen mo// cem cem na phyal phyal lo// yul phyal
2a5(phal chen): phyal phyal na/ khyad khrud do// khyad khyud khyad khyud na/ zar zer ro// zar zer zar zer na/ khrib khrab po khra'i khri ba na/ ya gangs ya gangs na/ cho ma'o// chom chom na// khram khrim khram khrim kham
2a6(phal chen): nab nub po nab nub nang nub na/ sang sang ngo // sang sang sang sang na/ rgyu las so// rgyu las rgyu yas na/ tad ya so// tad yas tad yas na/ bgrang yar ro// bkra yar bkra yar/ gas yA
2a7(phal chen): gang yas na/ mtshungs med 'tshungs med na/ lam lam mo lam lum lam lum na/ yal yol yal yol na/ khrul khrul lo// khrul khrul khrul khrul na/ zang thung ngo // thang thung thang thung na
2b1(phal chen): bsam phyod do// bsam phyod bsam pyod na/ drang breng ngo brang breng drang breng na/ bgrang yas so// bgrang yas bgrang yas na/ sngo mas so// sngo las bsngo yas na/ zang yog/ zang yod
2b2(phal chen): bzang yag na// 'phro ba kye 'phro ba kye na/ rtse 'phyo'o// rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyon/ yon tan na 'jug g.ya so// 'brug g.yas 'brug g.yas na/ sang yal sang yal na/ thang yul go thing yug
2b3(phal chen): thing yug na/ zing 'phyo'o// yid 'phyo yid 'phyon/ nam ne neb bo// nang ne ba nang ne na/ khrigs thams cad khrig thams khrig thams na/ yal yal yang yal na/ bgrang yas grang
2b4(phal chen): yas na/ thug yal thug yal na/ shang shang ngo // shang shang shang shang na/ yag yag yag yag na/ tha ma zim mo// rngam thim tham thim na rlom brnya'o// brlom brnyal na gzhal bye
2b5(phal chen): sa so// gzhal byos gzhal 'phyos na/ gzhal 'byos so// gzhal yas gzhal yas naso// gzhal med do// gzhal med gzhal med na/ gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na/ gan
2b6(phal chen): mthim mo// gzhal tha mi zhal thim na/ gar gzhalo// gar gzhal garAn/ gzhal sangaso// gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na// gzhal thag go// gzhal thag gzhal thag
2b7(phal chen): na/ gzhal phul gzhal phul na/ gzhal gzhi'i'o// gzhal bzhin 'phyo 'gyur ro// 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro// nyar nyer na nyar nyer na/ phyag phyag phyag phyag na/ zal zul
3a1(phal chen): lo// bzal brdul bzal bzul lo// sangs sal lo// sal sal sal sal na/ g.yo ldog gi g.yo ldog g.yo ldan na/ phan phun no// phan phun
3a2(phal chen): phan phun na/ rnang g.yas so// rnang g.yas rnang yas na/ rem 'brel lo// ram 'brel rem 'brel na rdzing dad do// rdzi ngang rdzi dang na/ brdzi brtul rdzi brtul lo// yul yu
3a3(phal chen): log yul yul yul na/ ngad dad do// nga dad na bgrang rtsi'i bgrang brtsin/ zab pa bgrang ngo // zab grang zab bgrang na/ dga' rkyang ngo // dga' brkyang dga' brkyang na/ gzhung
3a4(phal chen): gdal lo// gzhung bdal gzhung gdal na/ 'khrug khyad do// 'khrug khyad 'khrug khyad na/ 'ol phyed 'ol byol na/ brda ba yas brdang g.yaso// brda ba yas na/ gtsul yas
3a5(phal chen): so// gtsal g.yas gtsal g.yas na/ bgrang yas so bgrang g.yas na/ byin 'phye'o byim 'phyo byom phyo na/ ye me'o/ ye ma me ye me na/ bskal yas so// bskul yas
3a6(phal chen): na bskal yas na/ lngab ldeb po/ lnga pa lteb na lngab ldeb na/ 'phan chad do// phan chad phan phyed na/ phang phung ngo phang phung ngo / 'phrang phung na khye'u gtsang khye'u gtsang ngo // 'khye'u
3a7(phal chen): gtsang na zhung gzung ngo // bzhung bzung zhung bzung na/ chog g.yal lo/ mchog yal mchog yang na/ mtha' rtul lo// / mtha' brtul mtha' rtul na/ yul 'khyam mo// yun 'khyos
3a8(phal chen): yun 'khyams na/ blun lnga po po blun lob po/ blon lob na/ lam lom mo// lam lom lam lom na/ brnyad yas so// brnyad yas brnyad las na/ lang lang ngo lang ling lang laM/ 
3b1(phal chen): lngang lta po// lja lnga'i ljab ldadzin/ ma 'tshal lo// ma brgyal maHla na/ 'byam yas so// 'bum las 'byam yas na/ nga babrang ngo // nga 'brang nga 'brangan
3b2(phal chen): sgron yal lo// smon yal smon yal na// bkra gtsal lo// bkra gtsal bkra gtsal na/ lo brgyas so// lo brgyas lo rgyas na/ 'bum brtib po// 'bum partibi 'bum
3b3(phal chen): rtib na/ la lo la lo yon bgrang 'phyos so// 'brang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na/ bgrang 'phyos la 'greng ba'o// 'phros la skyes pa 'greng 'phres la sgral na/ dpag yas so// 
3b4(phal chen): dpag yas dpag yas na// dpag yas la 'gres pa'o// dpag yas 'dres dpag yas 'bres na/ yal 'phyong yal 'phyod na yal 'phyong la bsgres// pa'o// yal 'phyong
3b5(phal chen): la skyes pa yal 'phyong la bsgres pa na/ ra mu yal mu yal mu yAn na/ mu yan la bsgres pa'o// mu yal la bgres pa mu yal la bsgres pa na/ bgrang yol lo// bgrang
3b6(phal chen): yol bgrang yol na 'gres pa'o// bgrang yol bgrang yon na bgres pa'o// bgrang yol la bgres pa bgrang yang la bsgres na/ mi 'jal to// mi 'jal mi 'jal na/ mi 'jal
3b7(phal chen): la bsgres pa'o// mi 'jal la bsgres na/ bsam phyed do// bsam phyod bsam phyod na la bsgres pa'o// bskam phyod la skyes na bsam phyod na/ 'thab 'jam mo// 'thab 'jam
3b8(phal chen): 'thab 'jam na dpag thag go// dpag thag dpag thag la bsgres pa'o// dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na/ brjod tu med pa'o// brjod tu med pa brjod tu med pa na/ 
4a1(phal chen): brjod tu med pa la bsgres pa brjod tu med pa la bsgres na/ brjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa la bsgres pa/ shin tu bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
4a2(phal chen): dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la tshags su gcad de bka' stsal pa// brjod tu med pa'i ba lang brjod tu med pa ni ka brjod tu med pas thams cad tshang bar 'gyur/ brjod du med par bskal par brjod bya
4a3(phal chen): kyang / brjod du med pa'i sangs brgyas zhing gi rnams// thams cad gzhig ste brdul kun tu blangs shing / cig rtse la gcig po brjod du med pa ste/ thams cad brjod du med pa'i rab tu 'jug/ zhing
4a4(phal chen): rnams brjod du med pa'i rjod du med// bskad cig sems kun rab tu 'jug go// skad cig re rer 'jig pa rjod tu med/ 'jig pas bskal pa mang por zad par byed/ dbye ba'i bye brag dbye ba brjod du med// 
4a5(phal chen): brtul la 'jug pa brjod tu med pa ste// bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brjod du med pa'o// bskal pa brjod du med pa'i zad par byed// rtul dang brtul gyi mtshan nyid brjod du/ brjod du med pa'i brtul rnaMs kun bzung ste/ 
4a6(phal chen): bskal pa kun tu bzang po stong byas kyang / kun tu bzang po de bsngags mthar thugs brjod du med pa'i kun tu bzang po rnams// sra rtse re re kun la yang dag 'jug/ sra rtse gcig la zhin yul rnams kun la ste/ 
4a7(phal chen): dbyings ma lus ji snyed de bzhin no// skra rtse re re zhing khams kyi brjod du med pa'i yang dag 'jug par byed// mkha' dbyings rtse sgra'i rtse mos gzhal tu rung / zhing rnams zed rjod du med pa'o// skra rtse gcig bzhin yul gi
4a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing gi rnaMs// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par phye mar// bskal pa mi mthu' zhing rnas brjod tu med// bskal pa shin tu bstan chos brjod du med pa 'byung / shin tu bstan pa brjod med re re las// sems can rjod
4b1(phal chen): brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul// de dag skra rtse gcig la 'jug pa ste// skra rtse re re ma lus kun brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ste// skal pa brjod du med pa zad par byed// chags med sems kyang brjod du med pa ste/ 
4b2(phal chen): de dag sku yang brjod du med pa ste/ rnam par phye bsku brjod du med pa/ kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa grangs med do// sangs rgyas zhing tshad med brjod tu med pa yang / se sen rjod med rnam pa ston da bye// rnam par ston pa re re zhing // 
4b3(phal chen): se sen brjod du med pa yongasu spyong // de dag rgyan bzangs rnam bzang phye brjod du med/ de dag rdzu 'phrul mang po'ang brjod du med/ rna dag dbang yang rjod du med pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul rnaMs kyang rjod tu med par 'byung // 
4b4(phal chen): rna 'phrul brjod du med pa ste/ spyod yul rnams de bzhin brjod du med// 'jig rten brjod du med pa'i khas su 'byung / chos tshul rnas dag brjod du med pa 'byung / mdo sde re re las kyang brjod med pa'i
4b5(phal chen): rjod med chos ni yang dag rab tu 'byung // chos rnaMs re re las kyang brjod pa yi// shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa 'byung // bstan pa re re zhing yang brjod du med/ rtogs par shes brjod du med pa 'byung // rtogs par shes
4b6(phal chen): pa re re rjod med pa'i// si san brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul na/ tshul 'thun chos kyang brjod du med pa 'byung / tshul mthun ses kyang rjo du med pa byung / mi mthun sa chos kyang rjod tu med pa ste/ mi mthun sems kyang
4b7(phal chen): de bzhin brjod du med// dbang po mi mthun brjod du med pa ste/ tshig gi rnam pa mi mthun chos kyang brjod tu med/ de dag rjod tu med pa rnar 'dul// bskad cig re rer spyod yul gyur la/ rjod tu med pa'i rnam par 'phrul
4b8(phal chen): pa bston/ de bas de dag brjod du med pa ste/ des kyang brjod du med pa ste/ skal pa tha dad brjod du med par 'byung brtan pa/ de dag brjod du med pa la 'jug/ 'gras kyi tshul gyis de dag brjed tu med// 
5a1(phal chen): srid cig la brjod tu med pa yi// yangs dang dog pa rnam pa mang po gnas// dag pa nyon mongs brjod du med pa ste/ rgya che phra ba de bzhin brjod tu med// zhing cig la yang brjod du med pa yi// bye brag
5a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phros pas zhing mi mthun// tshad med de yang dag grangs su brjod tu med/ sA rtse re re la yang dag gzhon// sangs rgyas zhing rnas brjod du med gnas kyang / sra rtse gcig tu dog par mi 'gyur te/ de na gnod sbyin rnam
5a3(phal chen): pa gcig med par/ brjod du med pa yang dag rab tu gzhol// zhing rnams de dag 'dre bar mi 'gyur te/ 'bre ba'i nyes pa de dag kun kyang med/ cig kyang shin tu brjod med shin tu yangs pa ste/ zhing cig de bzhin de bzhin
5a4(phal chen): thams cad zhing / sras cig bzung tu brjod tu med pa yi// mkhas pas mkha' dbyings gzhal du rung srid kyi// sra rtse gcig gi zhing rnams mang po dag/ shin tu bstan pas rjod tu med pa yani/ sra rtse gcig tu de bzhin
5a5(phal chen): sku 'jug ste/ brjod du med pa cig nas gcig rgyud pa'i/ sra rtse bzung ba rjod tu med pa ste// sra rtse de dag mthor thug gang yang med/ skad cig tu rgyud po'i/ yun rings brjod du med pa'i gzung byas shing // tshul
5a6(phal chen): 'dir brjod du med pa'i 'dzud par byed// bskal pa kun kyang de bzhin brjod du med/ mtha' dang dpung med 'di zung byas shing / brtan pa brjod du med pa'i spyod yul gyis// de dag brjod du med pa'i ra tu 'jug/ brjod cu
5a7(phal chen): med pa'i 'jug tshul 'di yin no// yid kyis dang po 'arjod du med pa dang / rnam par gnon brjod du med pa dang / rnam par 'dul ba brjod du med par ni/ phyogs rnams rjod du med pa kun tu 'gro// de dag sems kya
5a8(phal chen): brjod du med pa ste// rgya che yangs pa brjod tu med pas na// de dag dmigs pa brjod tu med pa ste/ des ni brjod du med kun gyi mtha' phyin byed// de bzhin gagalus kyi las kyang rjod tu med pa ste/ ngag gi las kyang brjodan/ 
5b1(phal chen): med// de bzhin sems kyang brjod med 'byung // mos pa dag kyang brjod du med// de dag rnams shes dag pa brjod du med// de dag shes rab gsal bar rjod pa'i tshul rnaMs yongasu spyod // the tsom brjod du med par
5b2(phal chen): rab tu brjodaka/ de dag 'byung ba brjod tu med pa dang / yongs su gnon pa brjod tu med pa yini// de dag bting 'dzin brjod tu med pa ya ni// de dag rjod med thams cad la'ang med// sems can thams cad brjod du med pa
5b3(phal chen): ste/ zhing rnams kun kyang de bzhin brjod du med/ sems can lus rnams brjod du med pa ste// de dag bsam brjod du med pa yis// de dag las kying rnam smani brjod med de/ de dag mos pas de bzhin brjod du med/ bsam
5b4(phal chen): gyis rnams par thar pa med pa yin// de dag bye brag khyad par brjod du med/ de dag lus mang rjed du med// pa ste/ gang dag 'byung ba de dag brjod du med/ ji ltar 'byung ba'ang brjod du med pa ste/ 'di la 'byung ba'ang brjod
5b5(phal chen): tu med pa ya ni// yang dag 'jug pa brjod du med pa shes/ de dag tshul gyi lam yang brjod tu med// de dag rab tu ston pa 'ang rjod tu med// tus nas brjod du med par shin tu 'byung // bdag nyid chen po 'di 'bru'i bdag nyid can// / 
5b6(phal chen): brjod bu med pa 'jig rten dag na rgyu/ de dag lus rjes brjod tu med pa yis// brjod du med pa rnams la yang dag 'jug/ sems can rtson po brjod tu med par rnams// mthong zhing shes rab rjod du med pa yis/ chos rnams
5b7(phal chen): brjod tu med pa zhi ba byed/ sangs rgyas de dag brjod du med pa ston// de dag rnam pa brjod tu med pa yis// de nas zhing rnams brjod du med par 'dod/ rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa yis// zhing rnams brjod du
5b8(phal chen): med pa kun tu 'dong // de dag lus rnams brjod du med pa kun tu 'dong / skyes bu khyu mchog brjod du med pa la/ rnam pa tha dad brjod du med yis/ mchog pa brjod du med pa ste/ rab tu byed/ byin chen dag pa brjod med
6a1(phal chen): brjod du med pa dang // me tog sna tshogs de bzhin brjod med dang // spos dang 'phreng ba mchog brjod du med pa ste// rgyal ba brjod du med pa bsnyen bkur byed// de dag rjod du med pa ste/ mos pa dag pa
6a2(phal chen): 'ang rjod du med pa yin// bsam pa de bzhin brjod du med pa yis// sangs rgyas brjod du med la phyag 'tshal spyan/ zhing rtong pa brjod du med pa ste/ mi mnga'i sems kyang brjod du med// yongs su rtod pa brjod
6a3(phal chen): tu med pa ste// thams cad rtod pa de bzhin brjod du med/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rjod tu med/ yid gsal dad pas de bzhin rjod tu med/ brgyal ba sngags shing bstod pa rjod du med pa ste/ zhi byas yang de
6a4(phal chen): bzhin brjod tu med/ de dag brjod pa brjod med pa ste/ mi ba skye ba'i chos kyang brjod du med/ rab tu zhi ba brjod tu med dang ldan/ zhi ba'i sa yang de bzhin rjod tu med/ brtson 'grus phung
6a5(phal chen): po de rjod du med pa ste// zhum pa de'i sems kyang brjod du med pa ya ni/ phyar mi ldog pa'ang brjod tu med pa ste/ mi bskul sems kyang rjod tu med dang ldan/ bsam gtan brjod ni brjod/ 
6a6(phal chen): du med pa ste// rtogs par gzhog chos de bzhin brjod du med/ bsam gtan zhi yid brjod du med pa ste// brjod du med pa'i bsam gtan rab tu shes/ de dag shes rab rjod tu med la zhugs/ de bas ting 'dzin
6a7(phal chen): brjod du med pa ste/ rab tu dben pa chos brjod du dang ldan/ sangs rgyas brjod du med la mngon par 'jug/ spyod pa'i bsgo ni rjod du med pa ste/ de dag shes rab brjod du med pa yin/ de dag spyod yul rjod du med
6a8(phal chen): pas na/ chos bsgo dag na brjod du med pa yin/ de dag chos pa stobs brjod du med pa ste/ chos la gnas pa'ang brjod tu med// de dag chos kyi dran pa brjod du med/ de dag chos kyi dbyings kyang brjod du med// 
6b1(phal chen): de dag ye shes brjod du med dang ldan// ye shes brjod du med la shin tu med rlabs// de dag phung po khams dang brjod du med// de dag brjod du med ye shes mthar yang thug/ de dag chos kyang 'khor lo brjod du med/ de dag chos
6b2(phal chen): kyi char 'bebs brjod du med// de dag chos kyi rang bzhin rjod du med/ de dag chos kyi spyan yang brjod du med/ de dag rdzu 'phrul rnams par brjod med de/ tshul dbyings brjod du med pa khong du chud / dngos po ye shes brjod du med
6b3(phal chen): ba ste/ sems kyi skad cig de dag brjod du med// brjod du med rnam pa tha dad pa// skad cig sems kyis brjod tu med pa ste/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa ste/ brten pa de dag brjod du med pa gnon/ zhing rnams rnams
6b4(phal chen): phye brjod de dra ste/ rgyan kyang de bzhin brjod du med pa yi ni// gzugs kyang dbyings kyang brjod du med pa ste/ kha dog mdog kyang de bzhi na brjod du med/ khyad par sna tshogs de bzhin brjod du med pa ste// rnam
6b5(phal chen): par tha dad pa de bzhin brjod du med/ ngag dang nyon mongs brjod du med pa ste/ rnam pa mi 'thun pa ye shes brjod du med/ sems can brjod du med rab tu shes// sems can khams kyang brjod du med pa bste/ 
6b6(phal chen): de dag las kyang de bzhin brjod du med// sems can de dag spyod pa'ang brjod du med/ dbang po dag kyang brjod du med pa ste/ de dag sems kyang brjod du med pa yin/ khams kyi rnam par de dag brjod tu med// de dag gos
6b7(phal chen): pang de bzhin brjod du med/ de dag rnams par spyod pa'ang brjod du medo// kun nas nyon mongs de bzhin brjod tu med/ rnam par byang ba'ang brjod du med/ 'dul ba de bzhin brjod med 'byung // lus kyi rnams pa rjod du me
6b8(phal chen): ba ste/ brjod du med pa mngon par sprul byas shing / brtan pa brjod du med pa'i nan tan byed// sems can brjod du med pa yongs su 'brel// de dag rnams par 'phrul pa rjod// du med/ 'od rnams brjod du med pa rab tu 'a byed/ 
7a1(phal chen): de dag rnam par 'phrul brjod du med/ kha dog sna tshogs de bzhin brjod du med// sems can brjod du med pa rnam par spyod/ 'od zer bu de bzhin brjod du med// ba sku re re nas kyang brjod du med pa'i// 
7a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa mang po rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams brjod du med pa snang bar byed// de bzhin 'byung ba rjod du med pa dang / rnam par gnon pa brjod du med pa yis// 'jig rten brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul/ 
7a3(phal chen): dag lus kyi las kyang rjod tu med/ rnam dag chag kyang de bzhin rjod du med// mtha' yas yid kyang brjod du med pa ste// spyod pa'i khyad par de bzhin brjod du med/ ye shes rgyud kyang brjod du med pa ste// khams rna
7a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa khong du chud/ brtan pa gzung ba rnams brjed du me da/ shin tu bslabs brjod du med pa ste/ sgra dbyangs brjod du med pa she sa pa ste/ rnam dag dbyangs dag brjod du med pa yin// de dag bden
7a5(phal chen): pa bran pa rjod du med/ 'gro ba brjod tu med pa shes par byed du/ dge spyod lam brjod du med pa ste// nan tan rnam par de bzhin rjod tu med// bag tsha med parjod du med pa ste/ 'jig rten brjod du
7a6(phal chen): med pa rab tu 'dug/ de bzhin gshegs bsras rjod tu med pa yi// rnam dag spyod pa 'di 'dra ste// de dag yon tan legs pa rjod du med/ yon tan rnam dag de bzhin brjod du med/ de dag zad pa med yang
7a7(phal chen): brjod du med// 'jig rten 'gon po brjod du med pa'i rnaMs/ yon tan legs par brjod du med pa gsungs/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brjod tu med/ yon tan rnam dag de bzhin brjod tu med// brtan
7a8(phal chen): par gang la brjod du med// gang gnas ye shes de yang brjod du med// de dag mthar thug med pa dang brjod du med/ de dag sangs rgyas shes byed yin 'ong brjod du med/ yang dag 'jug pa'i ye shes rjod
7b1(phal chen): tu med// de dgra brjod du med pa'ang rjod du// gang gnas ye shes de brjod du med/ de dag mthar thug med parjod du med// dus gsum bsam brjod du med pa ste/ de la tshad bzung brjod du med// pa yin// 
7b2(phal chen): 'byung ba'i ye shes brjod du med/ de dag brjod du med pa'ang brjod du med/ gang dag ye shes de yang brjod du med// de dag mthar thug med pa brjod du med// tus gsum bsam pa brjod du med pa ste/ 
7b3(phal chen): de lo tshad bzung brjod du med pa yani/ 'byung ba'i ye shes brjod tu med pa ste/ mi gnas pa'ang de bzhin brjod du med// spyod pa'i khyad par de bzhin brjod du med/ smon pa rnam dag rjod du med pa ste/ byang chub
7b4(phal chen): sems bsgrub pa'ang de bzhin brjod du med/ sangs rgyas byang chub brjod du med pa la// de bzhin ye shes rjod du med las 'byung / don rnams brjod tu med par byed pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen chos de
7b5(phal chen): bzhin brjod du med// rnam dag zhing yang rjod du med pa ste// de dag spyod pa'i stobs kyang brjod tu med/ de dag brjod tu med pa bsgoms bya sa nas/ bskad cig cig tu rjod med mngon 'tshang brgya/ de dag rjod
7b6(phal chen): tu med pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas brjod med tu med pa rab tu ston/ de dag cho 'phrul brjod du med pa yis/ 'jig rten brjod tu med pa rab tu bston// brtan pa chos kyi 'khor lo brjod med pa/ de dag brjod par byed
7b7(phal chen): pa rab tu bston// de dag bsngon pa'ang brjod du med pa ste/ 'jig rten phan 'dogs brjod du med pa'ang byed/ bskal pa brjod tu med pa thams cad kyang // zad par 'gyur gyi yon tan brjod tu med/ yon tan dang ni legs
7b8(phal chen): pra brjod med pas// zad par mi nus de bzhin brjod tu med/ de dag 'gon po brjod pa la// tshig dang dbang po brjod tu med pa yis// bskal pa brjod tu med par ston byas dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mthar
8a1(phal chen): thug med/ phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed yod pa'i rnams/ ma lus thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur te/ sangs rgyas gcig la'ang dge ba'i rjod tu med pa yi/ bsku mnga' thams cad rjod
8a2(phal chen): tu med byu la// sku rnams re re brjod tu med pa yi/ brjod du med pa'i dbul rnams mnga' 'gyur la// ljags yangs re re brjod tu med pa yi/ gsung zab brjod tu med pa brjod 'dzad do// dbyings gcig gis kyang
8a3(phal chen): yon tan brjod med par// skal par brjod du med par stod byas la// sangs rgyas gcig sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad de/ sku gcig ji bzhin de bzhin thams cad sku// dbu cig ji bzhin thams cad dbu// lnga grwa
8a4(phal chen): cig de bzhin ljags// dbyangs cig yan lag ldan pas legs brjod kyang // bskal pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthu' yas pa'i/ bskal pa ma tha' yas mur thug zad par ni/ legs par chags med de dag thar
8a5(phal chen): drug mi 'gyur ro// rdul rtse gcig la brjod du med pa yi/ pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba rjod du med/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po zhes bya ba yi// zhing rnams brjod du med par rab tu 'jug/ rdul
8a6(phal chen): rtse gcig la thams cad yod pa yi// chos dbyings ji tsam thams cad ma lus par/ rdul gyi zhing rnams brjod du med pa dag/ 'byung bar 'gyur zhing gzhan yang 'jig par 'gyur// rtul gcig la mtha' dang dbus
8a7(phal chen): med pa'i/ zhing rnams tu mar bstan pa yang dag par 'jug/ phyogs rnams pa rnam par phye ba brjod du med/ zhing rnams re re de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams/ brjod du med pa rnam par rtag bya ste/ zhing cig de bzhin zhing
8a8(phal chen): kun tu// de dag brjod du med po'i lus su 'byung // de dag spyod du pa'i mthu ni brjod du med pa ste// khyad par 'phags mchog de bzhin rjod du med/ de dag rdzu 'phrul brjod du med pa ste/ chags med nyid kyang de bzhin rjod
8b1(phal chen): tu med// sgra la 'jug pa rjod du med pa ste/ sgra la rten pa de bzhin brjod du med/ de dag stobs bcu brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub 'tshang rgya de bzhin brjod du med// rtogs pa dag pa rjod tu med pa ste/ chos dbyings yongs su
8b2(phal chen): gnon pa brjod du med/ de dag 'dzed shes rjod du med pa ste// de dag nyid kyang rjod du med pa yin/ tshad dang grangs kyang brjod du med pa ste/ brten pa de yang dag tshul bzhin rtogs par byed/ 'gon po'i tshul rnams brjod
8b3(phal chen): tu med pa dag/ rnam pa tshad med brtan pa yongs su gnon// ting 'dzin tha dad rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// brjod du med pa de dag rab tu 'jug spyod pa// rnam pa dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pa rnam dag brjod du med pa ste/ 
8b4(phal chen): brjod tu med pa'i rnam dag mngon tu gyur// chags med sems kyang brjod du med pa ste// brjod tu med pa'i las kyang rnam par gnon// spyod pa mtha' yas brjod du med pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul brjod du med
8b5(phal chen): ba'ang rab tu ston// zhing rnams brjod du med pa shin tu shes// de phyir sangs rgyas brjod tu med pa mthong / spyod pa'i mthu ni rjod tu med pa yan// ye shes brjod tu med pa khong tu/ chud/ de la 'gro
8b6(phal chen): kha mdo bcing phyir mi ldog pa med pa ste/ brjod tu med pa'i yul la rab tu 'jug/ brjod du med pa'i zhing tu rnam par rgyu/ brjod tu med pa'i bskal bzang bar du byed/ tshul gyi rje dag rjod du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa
8b7(phal chen): de bzhin nyid kyang 'thob// ye shes brjod du med pa rab tu 'byung // bskad cig re re brjod du med pa ston// re re tshig gis brjod du med pa yis// sangs rgyas brjod du med pa rab tu shes/ byang chub tus cig mngon par sa
8b8(phal chen): ngas rgyas pa// tha dad dus khongasu chud par byed/ de dag sra rtse 'jug pa brjod du med/ shin tu brtul phra 'jug pa'ang brjod du med/ rab tu che bzhing rgyun kyang brjod du med/ sangs rgyas rno bar 'phyo ba'ang brjod du med// 
9a1(phal chen): ga sangs rgyas rigs la'ang zhugs pa de dag gi/ tshul cig nyid du brjod du med pa ste/ de bas gleng rgyung brjod du med pa la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don du 'jug zhing dang / sems can de bzhin gan
9a2(phal chen): ba rnams/ tha dad khams bsgyur rjod tu med drug/ brtag pas shes byarjod du med pa ste// dus gsum 'dzin pa brjod du med pa ya ni/ shAn tu rgyas sems can gyi rgyal bas bris nas/ drangs la 'ag pa bstan
9a3(phal chen): ba'i le'u ste/ sum bcu drug go// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sems bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
9a4(phal chen): rnams// shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi byed 'di'i bskal pa ji tsam pa de dag 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can yod pa'i nyin zhan cig go// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'ayor
9a5(phal chen): pa bskal pa tsatsam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rab tu 'jod sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams dus sman rgyal tshan gyi nyin cig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams du
9a6(phal chen): smin rgyal mtshan gi bskal pa ci tsam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku mos shin tu brgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams phyir mi log pa'i 'khor rab tu bsgrogs pa'i nyan cig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig
9a7(phal chen): rten gi khams 'khor lo rab tu bsgrogs pa'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de la ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi brgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams sgron ma bzang po'i nyin zhag cig go// kye
9a8(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khams rtul med pa'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par seng ge'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams bsgron ma bzang po'i nyin zhag/ 
9b1(phal chen): gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khams sgron ma bzang po bzang po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang 'dzad snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams 'od bzang po'i zhag
9b2(phal chen): gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer gyi sku'i pad mo shin tu brgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
9b3(phal chen): kyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer gyi bsu'i pad ma shin tu brgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams bde bar dga' ba'i nyan zhag gcig
9b4(phal chen): go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khaMs 'da' bar dga' ba'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdo na bar mkhyen pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
9b5(phal chen): gyi khams rgyan dang ldan pa'i nyin zhag cig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gi khams rgyal dang ldan pa'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thugs zla ba'i sangs rgyas
9b6(phal chen): kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams kyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor mdog gi nyin zhag gcig go// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar bskal pa grang ba las 'jug pa'i tshul 'dir 'jig rten gi khams med pa rgya stong phrag bcu 'das
9b7(phal chen): pa ni/ de'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po'i bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams pad mo'i dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go// bza' ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams
9b8(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang ldan/ pa yongasu gang ngo // shin tu rgyas pa/ tshe'i tshad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste sum bcu bdun no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos yang
10a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag shar phyogs logs su sngon chad byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs zhugs pa'i drang srong 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub
10a2(phal chen): sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor sum brgyad dang ldan pa chos bston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag lho phyogs na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs zhu
10a3(phal chen): ba'i ri'i dpal kyi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rgyal dang ldan pa chos ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag nub phyogs logs
10a4(phal chen): na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' seng gre'i 'gros su 'gro ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor su
10a5(phal chen): brgya dang ldan pa chos bston to// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag byang phyogs logs na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhug ba'i ri spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba yod te/ de la byang chub sems
10a6(phal chen): dpa' spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems 'khor stong phrag gsum dang ldan pa chos bston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag shar phyogs logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri'i
10a7(phal chen): spos bri zhes bya ba yod te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpa' zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor stong phrag bcu dang / ldan pa chos bston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang dang / shar daphyogs
10a8(phal chen): kyi mtshams logs na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs zhugs pa'i ri'i brgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas rdo rje'i ri zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba/ 
10b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa chos bston to// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams logs na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i mtsho
10b2(phal chen): brten zhes bya ba yod te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' lnga'i phung po zhes byang ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong dang ldan pa chos ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag lho dang nub dang / kyi phyogs 'tshams logs na byang
10b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri bskar ma'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong phrag gsum dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// 
10b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams logs na sngon byang chu/ ba sems dpa'i bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri spos kyi ngad can zhes// bye ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od zer rab tu
10b5(phal chen): 'gyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong phrag lnga dang ldan pa ston to// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal mtsho chen po'i nang na sngon byed chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas phug bzang po zhes
10b6(phal chen): khya ba yod te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yul shin tu yangs pa'i lho phyogs na sngon byang chub sems dpa' zhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba d+hete// yul bau ta la'i bu zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems
10b7(phal chen): dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i sngon dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba gser gyi gleg zhes bya ba yod de/ yul du ran sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs zhugs pa'i gnas tsami bar byed pa'i phug zhes bya ba yod do// yul ril
10b8(phal chen): btong ba zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs zhugs pa'i gnas smon 'aces bya ba yod de/ yul dge 'dun pa'i yul zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas pang bzung / 
11a1(phal chen): gi phug ces bya ba cu yod te/ yul bye dur+ya zhes bya ba na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas thugs pa zhes bya ba klus btsugs pa yod do/ yul kam lo tsa na sngon byang chub
11a2(phal chen): sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i byis pas 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i yod do// rgya'i gnas na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas mthu bo che phug ces bya ba yod do// yul kha sha sngon byang chub
11a3(phal chen): sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas pa lang ga'i go zhes bya ba na yod do// kha che'i yul na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas shin tu bston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ yul dga' ba 'phel ba zhe
11a4(phal chen): bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas/ gnas brtan gyi phug ces bya ba yod do// yul chu 'dzin ces bya ba na bsngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas khyod po
11a5(phal chen): bston pa zhes bya ba yod do// yul sa 'dzin dkyil 'khor na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas brgyags kyi phug ces bya ba yod do// shin tu brgyas pa byang chub sems dpa'i
11a6(phal chen): gnas kyi le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o// / bam po drug bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de nas// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam tu sems te// sangs rgyas
11a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing ni bla sam+b+ha gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gis mi khyab sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs
11a8(phal chen): kyi sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtul ni ci tsam pa zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bya sangs rgyas skye ba'i ci tsam pa zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes
11b1(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku ni ci tsam pa zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyad/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzung ni ci tsam pa zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bkyi
11b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom
11b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ci tsam pa zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ci tsam zhig tu bas mu khyab pa dang / de nas
11b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas// byang chub sems dpa' ud pa da la'i snying po sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis brlabs kyis// byin gyis rlab
11b5(phal chen): so// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis byin gyis rlabs dang ldan par 'dzad do// sangs rgyas kyi gzi rjid kyis yongs su brgyas par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la rab tu 'jug go// sangs rgyas
11b6(phal chen): kyi chos kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong tu chud par 'dzad do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs par 'dzad do// chags pa med pa'i rgyud 'byam klas pa la rab tu bzhog go/ 
11b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rigs rab tu rtogs par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du med pa rab tu gzhag pa 'dzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ud ba la'i snying pos
11b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug pa'i rig cing khong du chud pas// chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs pa'i yid dang chos thams cad sgrib pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam da
12a1(phal chen): ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas dang lta ba dang snying rje chen po lnga'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang / byang chub ses
12a2(phal chen): dpa' yid dam pa dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor brgyud tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyis 'dod pa ni zad pa dang tha
12a3(phal chen): dang ba yang dag pa shes pa'i rnam par gzungs thams cad kyis snang brgyad byas pa dang / ldan pas sangs rgyas kyis mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i snying po la 'di bskad ces gso'o// kye brgyal ba'i sras sangs
12a4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa la rnam par bskyod pa ste/ kye brgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rngam par 'phrul pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs
12a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la sku 'i mtshan thams cad rab tu bskyes pa'o// sangs brgyas brtsa ma ldan 'das rnams kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang dgongs
12a6(phal chen): pas sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas ldan 'das kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhin tu brjod pa med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i shin tu bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zad
12a7(phal chen): la bsam gtan gyis mi khyab par spyod pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs dbyangs ni tshad med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyings thugs su nud pa ni brjod du med pa'o// 
12a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams cad mchog par 'khyen pa'o// kye brgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing bstan pa ni bslab pa'i mi ma
12b1(phal chen): mthug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ 
12b2(phal chen): kyi gzugs kyi bsku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa'i med par rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyan ni/ chos thams cad mnyam
12b3(phal chen): pa nyid kyi spyan mngon pa sangs rgyas pas mtha' dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chags pa med pa'i bstan ni 'gro ba thams can gyi sgra sgrib pa med par thugs su chud pas mtha' dpung
12b4(phal chen): med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbarnyes pas mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12b5(phal chen): rnams kyi ljags shin tu yangs pa yi// chos kyi dbyings thamasad du gsung gi dbyings su 'gro bas mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsku'i chos nyid ni sems cam
12b6(phal chen): ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnams dmigs pas mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las ni chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing dus gcu
12b7(phal chen): chags pa med par thugs su chud cing / rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyi rnam par thar pa bslab pa mi mnga' ba la rnam par spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
12b8(phal chen): 'jag dang rnam par 'phrul ba dang cho 'phrul mi za dang yang dag pa'i bston pas mtha' dang dpung med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag/ 
13a1(phal chen): pa ni brjod du med pa'i brgya byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bston to// bas ma ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par 'dzud pas/ mtha' dang dpung
13a2(phal chen): med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang smon lam thams cad yongs su brdzogs pa ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi chos rdzogs te/ chos thams cad
13a3(phal chen): brdzogs par byang chub par bya bar la mtha' dang dpung med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med
13a4(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bskad ces la ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa yang dag par
13a5(phal chen): bston to// bcu gang zhe na skad cig cig la 'jig rten la 'a dzag khams thams cad du rga ldan gyi gnas 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa dang / ba skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du byang chub
13a6(phal chen): sems dpa' che yongs su bstan pa dang / bskad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang / bskad cig gcig la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs
13a7(phal chen): shi drung du bzhug mngon par 'tshang brgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang bskad cig gcig la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang / bstan pa'i bskad cig gcig la 'jig rten giSh+Tha
13a8(phal chen): thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang / bskad cig gcig la 'jig rten gi khams thams
13b1(phal chen): cad tu brgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dzod yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ni/ 
13b2(phal chen): par dag pa cig ma yin pa thams cad du bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu 'dus pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus
13b3(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa 'byung ba dang / mos pa dang sbyor ba rnam par tha dad pa 'byung ba la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag bcu'i po de dag ni/ sangs rgya
13b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par ba sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni sangs brgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ste/ 
13b5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdze na par 'tshang rgya ba'i de'i dus la bab par yanaka/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa rnams kyi dge ba'i rnam par sman pa dang / rnam par smin pa mnya
13b6(phal chen): pa nyid ni de'i dus mi 'da' bar dus las bab pa yin pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni de'i tus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
13b7(phal chen): rnams kyis sems can gyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyun tu cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du/ 
13b8(phal chen): sku yongs su bstan pa ni dus las mi 'dar bas dus la bab pa yini/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang bsnyoms su bzhugs pa de ni dus las mi 'da' bas// tus las bab pa ya ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na/ 
14a1(phal chen): yul dang / grong dang grong khyer du gshegs pa de ni de'i dus las 'da' bas de'i dus las bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin tu sems can yongs su 'dzin
14a2(phal chen): kha de'i dus las mi 'da' bas tus la 'bab pa ya ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing 'dul bar dga' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba de'i dus la bab pa ya ni sangs
14a3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa'i ni dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas
14a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'ad ga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i thasras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom lda ngan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe' med bcing bsam kyis mi khyab
14a5(phal chen): pa ste// bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skyil mo dkrungs cig gis brgyas par gang ba dang / dus cig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig
14a6(phal chen): rten gi kham su zhums cad ma lus dang gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gi khams ma lus par byon pa'i skur gyur pa dang / ye shes cig rtogs par chos thams cad snang ba/ 
14a7(phal chen): byasgrub pa med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs cig bskyed pas chos dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ched pa nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par
14a8(phal chen): bstan pa dang dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis byas par 'gengs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang ma 'bres par bzhugs shing 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs
14b1(phal chen): rnas dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyud cig ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpa' med bcing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
14b2(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na 'jug pa med pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas smon lam mngon par bsgrubs
14b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang lus med la lus mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang // chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang brgya par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med
14b4(phal chen): pal sems can 'dul ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs ma dron par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul
14b5(phal chen): ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba drang 'jig brten mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / yul thams cad mngon par 'du med pa la las kyi rnam par smin par mngon par sku
14b6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa la chos kyi dbyings su gsungs mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad kun tu nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'jug pa med
14b7(phal chen): pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad ma bskyes pa la skye ba dang 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par bsgrubs
14b8(phal chen): ba'i ye shes dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
15a1(phal chen): rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khong su chud pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsku ni dus thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khongasu chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bzungs
15a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul ba 'dzad pa ni/ cho 'phrul chen po gsung gi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chag rab tu dbye ba thams cad la 'khas pa ni sangs rgyas bco/ 
15a3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi chos gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni thugs rje chen po khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
15a4(phal chen): rnams rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni/ 'dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongasu chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can rnams par
15a5(phal chen): 'dul ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gachags pa mi mnga' bar skyed pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ska cig gcig tu ni
15a6(phal chen): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i brangs khongasu chud par bstan pa thams cad khongasu
15a7(phal chen): chud pa yin/ bstan pa thams cad khongasu chud pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas pa/ 
15a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du rgya che ba'i chos zab mo bzod par dga' ba'i rnams te/ bcu po gang zhe na bdud kyi bkrugs ma rab tu 'joms shing rnam par 'thor ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos thod pa
15b1(phal chen): dga' ba'o// mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i bzod par dka' ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par 'dzad pa ni/ sangs brgyas bcom
15b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i bzod par dka' ba'o// sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// chos
15b3(phal chen): kyi dbyings thugs su chung bar ye shes ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bkod par dka' ba'o// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad ma lus par bskus khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi bskus khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi bsku
15b4(phal chen): rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi dmigs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// gsung gi yan lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya bar
15b5(phal chen): don yod par tha dad par yang dag par mkhyen pas thogs pa med pa'i bstan pa'i tshul tu tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhin tu 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i bzod par dga' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
15b6(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi ba sku'i bu ga gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i tshul tu// 'jig rten gi khams thams ca du shin tu phra ba snyed kyi thabs
15b7(phal chen): mi 'byung / zhing de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i thams cad nas 'byung nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu rgya che ba'i ni chos bzod par dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
15b8(phal chen): rgyas brtul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi brtul shin tu phra ba ste/ yongs su bston cing / sangs rgyas kyi rgyas dang rang bzhin gyi lhab lhu ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing / 
16a1(phal chen): sems can rnam par gdul ba'i thogs pa med la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang / gnod sems kyang shin tu phra ba de yangs par ma byas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rta chung
16a2(phal chen): bar ma byas pa ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chung ba'i ye shes mnga' ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka'o// mun pa med pa'i khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon
16a3(phal chen): par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa med cing bsgrub pa mi mnga' ba sems can pha rol gyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
16a4(phal chen): dang mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rgya che ba'i chos bzod par
16a5(phal chen): dka' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rnams pa thams cad du kha phye ba ma tho ba med cing shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
16a6(phal chen): rnams kyi yang dag par sgrub par bdag nyid chen pa na sngon gyi mtha' rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das kyi ba dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
16a7(phal chen): kyi brgyud tu rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par
16a8(phal chen): shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par gnas pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med bcing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
16b1(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi ni khan dus gsum mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rten pas yang dag par bcom pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag nyid che ba'i rnam par thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shi
16b2(phal chen): tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dngos po rnams pa tha dad la rnam par gzhag cing gcig gis len pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba/ 
16b3(phal chen): med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas mnyam par bsod nams ma zad pa dang ldan pas ma zad pa'i bsod nams mngar ba ste/ sangs
16b4(phal chen): brgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnams pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku gzugs dang kha dog mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams
16b5(phal chen): cad na/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba'i ni rnam par thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas
16b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jig rten pa bzhi rnying pas/ bag tsha ba mnga' bar bzhugs shing / khru mchog dang seng ge nga ro byin te/ rgol ba'i nang na stag lta bu'i mthu dang ldan la chos thams cad bstan pa la thugs sgron ma
16b7(phal chen): lta bur mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal
16b8(phal chen): pa brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i bzhi lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon tan shin tu sbyangs zhing mya ngan las 'das nas de srid kyi yul ring po 'das kyang / sangs
17a1(phal chen): rgyas bskyed pa'i yon tan zad par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod/ 
17a2(phal chen): du med pa dag na bzhugs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rjes su dran par bya ba nas/ bsku mngon par ston pa 'dzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
17a3(phal chen): kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam par thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnams pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing
17a4(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu po gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can sangs rgyas kyi tshangs
17a5(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa rnams ni dag pa la sngon gyi sngon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
17a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par
17a7(phal chen): dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po rnam par dag pas/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs
17a8(phal chen): brgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku la rnyog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bslabs pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ 
17b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu che bo rnyas shing pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17b2(phal chen): kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzad pa 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing / tus thams cad du gnas pa ste bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas
17b3(phal chen): rjes su dran pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la tus thams cad sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa'i rnams la dus thams cad du chos bston pa dang / sems can sangs rgyas la dad pa'i ses
17b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du bskyed pa dang / chos kyi skyong bar 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la thugs rje chen pos sangs
17b5(phal chen): brgyas kyi 'dzad pa dus thams cad du brgyun mi 'chad par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
17b6(phal chen): pa sna tshogs dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
17b7(phal chen): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing / 'dus thams cad du gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po gang zhen/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
17b8(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te/ bcu po gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku ye shes pargya mtsho ma zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs
18a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phros las tshad med pa rnyed pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas pa kyi spyan gyis mnga' bas/ ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
18a2(phal chen): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mnga' bas yis shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
18a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam la dang / khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun
18a4(phal chen): mi chad par bsgra 'bas pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
18a5(phal chen): ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi mnon pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par brdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya tshe/ 
18a6(phal chen): mi zad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
18a7(phal chen): rnams kyi tshul yin/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas/ 
18a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di ni lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ thams cad
18b1(phal chen): nam rgya da yos pa na 'angs rgyas rgya sa sa rnaMs kyi tshul chem 'dzim
18b2(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi don tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18b3(phal chen): kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos la rab tu gzhol ba 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste/ tshul ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur/ 
18b4(phal chen): ba dang / 'dul ba'i sbyar ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das bston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yinan/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
18b5(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' las pa 'di ni gan tu bstan pa'i bsgo mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sems can gyi spyod pa sna chags shin tu mtha'
18b6(phal chen): ma / yang rgyas ma ldan 'das rnam pa na sems can rgya kyil sas/ rnam pa na bzhin du stan pa'i bsno mtha' ma 'o sa sargyar lo ldang sas rnams sems can paras cad la gan ga
18b7(phal chen): mams yidi dzin pa'i bab ladas pa'o// sa sa rgyas com ldan 'das rnams ni mis sa rnams la sang rgyas kyi 'dzin las bsgru ba'o// mam 'das pa nim pa myong ba na na gyi ma mal las pa'od ni
18b8(phal chen): ma ldan ya nam pa kyi nu mems dpa spyong ma ngas ga gagis ngas su gtsug pa ma nga na sanapa ma pa'i rgya pa
18b9(phal chen): kha dang ma 'drung bzhi du bstan pa'i no mapa'a' mi ra/ sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'dang rnams ni/ las rten gyi lalas mams cang bathun pa'i yumi da 'dzin pa ga tu man pa'i mnom mam 'o// 
19a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta bu bzhin tu yongasu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
19a2(phal chen): ni 'jig rten 'di khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa ni/ bskal ba yangs pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang / yongs su bshad
19a3(phal chen): khas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams khongs tu chud par bya ba'i bskor mthar yas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i bsgo'o// 
19a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i bsgo'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
19a5(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su bstan pa yini sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom
19a6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phris bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom
19a7(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams len pa mi 'dzin pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub po// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyanas
19a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnams ni byin gyis rlabs kyi yul dang mangs dmigs pa thams cad yul du 'dzad pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan
19b1(phal chen): nyid kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phris bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la dmigs par mdzad pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub po/ sangs rgyas bcom
19b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'dran las sgrub po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
19b3(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las bsgrub po// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la bsgrub bo// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che
19b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba las// bam po drug bcu bzhi pa// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can rnams gtso bo chos de bcu gang zhe na/ 
19b5(phal chen): smon lam chen po zhe la yongs su rten zhing / smon lam zhig mi mnga' bas gsungs pa de lta bu mdzad cing gnyis mi gsung / 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo chos dang po'o// phyi'i ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal pa thams cad du byang chub
19b6(phal chen): sems dpa' spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'dzad pas/ rab tu rtson zhing sgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dul bar gyur pa gcig gzigs kyang
19b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang rjod du med par gshegs shing / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu gshegs pa la thogs pa med pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso ba'i chos gsum pa'o// zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnam
19b8(phal chen): 'thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang / dang pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rje rjen pos snyoms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso ba'i chos bzhi'a'o// gang gis tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa
19b9(phal chen): nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur snyam tu sems na byang chub kyi sems nyams pa 'di/ 
20a1(phal chen): ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug go/ 'jig rten gi rgyud las ma yin pa 'di ni sems
20a2(phal chen): can gi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su sngo ba sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i sems su lus kyi las dang / gang gi lus dang yid kyi las kyis spabs cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyan pas
20a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba med pas/ bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sems
20a4(phal chen): khar dag cing 'od gsal ba dang pa thams cad du snang ba zhing kun tu 'od byung ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba'i/ thams cad du snyoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ sems can
20a5(phal chen): gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten gi dga' ba thams cad la mi chags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gso ba med smon lam thams cad tu mnyam pa nyid kyis
20a6(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad pa dang ldan par byas te/ bsdug bsngal dang spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni sems can gi gtso bo'i chos dgu pa'o// sdug bsngal gi mi bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/ 
20a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad nyams kyi don du dga'ab kyis bdungs kyang bla bar sems skyed pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yongs su srung ba dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i sa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug
20a8(phal chen): 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de gang zhe na 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20b1(phal chen): 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod ba chags pa med pa rnam pate/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs
20b2(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang / 
20b3(phal chen): zhengs pa dang bzhud pas chags pa mi mnga' bas rnams par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston pas chags ma mi mnga'o bas rnam par spyod pa yin
20b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na zhugs kyang / tshogs pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings
20b5(phal chen): mo lus pa thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad
20b6(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor na zhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can dang spyod pa la gzigs shing thugs kyis
20b7(phal chen): skad gcig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnams par 'dul ba yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis kyang tshad med pas
20b8(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen po'o// rnam par spyod pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa
20b9(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pas bsam gyis mi khyab par ston cing / gsungs yang chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa ya ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas
21a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni chags pa mi mnga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan mchog dam pa
21a2(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sku mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam bu bla na/ 
21a3(phal chen): med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam pa drug bcu de nga ldan zhing yan lag lngas rgyas yongs su gzung ba dang / rgyan rgya stong du mas rab tu rgyan pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med
21a4(phal chen): pas rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang tshig gi yig brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par 'dzad pa dang / bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge'i ri chen po sgrogs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen pos rnyes pa mi mnga' bar
21a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa thams cad du sel can thams cad la brag cing gsal te/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs
21a6(phal chen): 'dul ba nye bar gnas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi mchog dam pa bla na med pa yang dag paro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin las ni stobs bcus rgyan pa sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin
21a7(phal chen): chos po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu rgyan cing bsgrubs pas// chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi la rab tu rten pas sangs rgyas
21a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos rting med pa rab tu rnyed pa chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi brgyan du gyur pa na dus gsum gi chos kyi dbyings ma lus dang thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems can dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig cig/ 
21b1(phal chen): dang / ldan pa'i shes rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed pa 'dzad do// 
21b2(phal chen): 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi 'dra ba rjod tu med pa dag dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyud thams cad mun sel bar ston pa sangs rgyas
21b3(phal chen): skye ba dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa cing don yod pas sangs rgyas skyabs brjod du med par rang bzhin rnam par dag cang kun tu snyoms par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
21b4(phal chen): rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan gyi mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhad mo 'dzum par ston to// zhal gi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog tu ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod
21b5(phal chen): du med pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed sems can gyi khams tshad med pa na bsam gyis ma khyab pa rnams par ston pa/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sabyang chub tu rnam par bzhag
21b6(phal chen): du mi 'gyur bar lung bstan pa 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal bar 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhad mo mdzum pa 'dzad pa/ rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna
21b7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/ sgrubs pa med pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthu' thug pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 
21b8(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzin pa med pa 'jig rten thams cad chags de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa 'jig rten thams cad gyen du 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yang dag par spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang
22a1(phal chen): bral ba rjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/ drung po dang khams dang skye 'ched dang bral ba sen 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam 'ablan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgya
22a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od cing med pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'ong ma 'dres shing rgyun du ma dang ldan pa/ kha dog snga tshogs brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun du thogs
22a3(phal chen): pa med pa thams cad du chags pa med pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa med pa tshad med pa'i 'dzod du gyur pa 'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan
22a4(phal chen): mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog mtha' yas pas mnga' ba'o// kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' 'a ma/ kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
22a5(phal chen): kyi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin tu rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o// de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams sum tu rtogs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog gis mnga' ba'o// kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol
22a6(phal chen): tu phyin pa rnyed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
22a7(phal chen): rnams ni dge ba'i shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o// chos nyid kyi rnam par thams cad
22a8(phal chen): du lung bar yod pa/ khyad par med par spyod pas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyis ye shes skyo bar thams cad kyi nang na rtogs pa dang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgrubs pa med pa'i rgyud rnams par dag pas 'jig rten gyi
22b1(phal chen): khams mi snyan pa thams cad kyis mi snyan par brjod padu med pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / rgyud rnams par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa yang dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bco
22b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po las ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang / rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste shin tu dang ba dang / yongasu rtog pa'i rnyog pa mi mnga' ba/ sku'i 'dzin pa las yongs su brtsal ba lta bus mi skyo ba thugs
22b3(phal chen): shin tu gsil ba thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyob pa/ yon tan gyi gnas dam pa bla na med pa la su 'dzin pa med pa'i nang na thugs rtse ba can phan pa 'dzad pa sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes cen
22b4(phal chen): po byin gyis brlabs te/ bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'dzad pa ste// 'di
22b5(phal chen): nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i mtha' thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
22b6(phal chen): rgya mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' ba'i chen pos mngon bsgyur ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
22b7(phal chen): thams cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar 'dzad pa'i mnga' sbyar bas/ tshig dang yig ge mtha' ba la thogs pa mi mnga' bo'i spobs pa 'bar ba dang // chos thams cad ma lus par sems yongs su brjod
22b8(phal chen): khas mnga' ba chen po ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' chen por bsgyur ba'i chos nyid po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su
22b9(phal chen): sman pa dang / sman lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul po la thogs pa mi mnga' ba chen po te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' ba chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
23a1(phal chen): ni 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa'i med par rnam par drug tu rab tu skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams spyan rnam par grol par bkod pa dang / blangs med pa
23a2(phal chen): dang ldan pas na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' rab tu thug pa thams cad gcig tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsdud pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu sre ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
23a3(phal chen): dang gzhan du gzhan phyogs su rab tu gzhag kyang / sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor cing rmongs par mi 'gyur la the tsom du mi 'gyur bar mnga' 'dzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i
23a4(phal chen): chos gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun du byin gyis rlabs pa dang / thugs skad cig gis
23a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par bstan pa dang / skal ba grangs med par brjod kyang yig shin tu bstan pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa
23a6(phal chen): dang / mi mthun par med pacing nye bar nyon mongs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su 'du bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyis rlabs pa la mnga' bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
23a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mnga' ba chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
23a8(phal chen): bar yang dkyil 'khor krung gcig gis bzhugs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mi bde ba'i mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/ gang zag de la yang mi spel bas 'dul ba'i dus las mi mnga' ba dang / gang zag
23b1(phal chen): gcig la ji ltar ba bzhin tu rim pa rim pas/ 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyin ma'i mtha'i mu'i mthug pa'i bsku la mnga' bar byin gyis rlabs te bzhugs kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyo ba mi mnga' bste
23b2(phal chen): de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba thams cad du byin gang zag gi don du yongasu spyong bar 'dzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mnga' sgyur ba'i chos
23b3(phal chen): lnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhud pas 'jigs rten gi khams thams cad du gzhud pa la thags thogs mi mnga'
23b4(phal chen): ba dang / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa dang / phyogs kyi phra ba'i rgyud thams cad du gzhung pa la thugs skad cig gcig ldan par gzhung pa byin gyis rlob cing / rno
23b5(phal chen): kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par byas la chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu skor ba la mngal ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos bsgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
