23b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul bar sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du thugs skad cig re re la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mnga' ba che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs ma rgyas
23b7(phal chen): pa'i gang yang med pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang slob pa'i sa la gnas shing mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi rjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sgrubs pa med par rtogs
23b8(phal chen): khang thugs su chud pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don tu ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bac+doMs rnaMs kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos
24a1(phal chen): mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyan gyi skye 'ched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'dris gang bsgrubs pa de snyed kyi skye 'ched kyi de yongs su grub par 'dzad do// snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi
24a2(phal chen): 'dran las grub par de shes kyi skye ba 'ched kyis yongs su grub par 'dzad do// shangs kyi skye 'ched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las grub pa de shangs kyi skye 'ched kyi yongasu grub par 'dzad do// de ljags kyi skye mched kyis yongasu sgrub
24a3(phal chen): par 'dzad/ ljags kyi 'dzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las gang sbubs pa de sku'i skye 'ched kyis yongs su sgrub pa 'dzad do// sku'i skye 'ched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las gang sgrub pa de thugs kyi skye 'ched kyis yongs
24a4(phal chen): su bsgrub par 'dzad do// thugs kyi skye 'ched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmigs pa chen po ste/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnams
24a5(phal chen): phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do// de bzhin tu dmyigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel zhing sgrub pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa la mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mngal
24a6(phal chen): rnon pos dbang sgyur ba'i chos rgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs ni rang gi sku'i bsku'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzung bar 'dzad cing khongs su chud par mdzad pa dang / sems
24a7(phal chen): can re re zhing yang yul sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa tsam tu yangs par 'dzad kyang sems can de dag la gnod par dang mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag tu yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig
24a8(phal chen): tu rgyud pas/ skal pa re re grangs med par zad par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa tsam tu yang gom pa gcig gis phyin pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba
24b1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas de dag 'byung ba'i tshig yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyud dang klu de dag ni sems can gyi gtso 'os brjod du med pa'i yang rjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas de
24b2(phal chen): dag ba spu'i bu ga re re nas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar dang / sems can gcig nas gcig tu rjod du med yang rjod tu med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig
24b3(phal chen): nas gcig tu gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i gcig nas gcig tu med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gcig nas gcig nas rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / namakha'i mtha'i dbyings dang dpung med
24b4(phal chen): par bstan pa kun tu 'tshams med par sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i skye 'ched thams cad du 'dod pa'i long spyod rgya chen pos grangs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya'o ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs
24b5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad mo'i rgya mtsho bos rgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can
24b6(phal chen): ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i bskus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i
24b7(phal chen): mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs bskad cig ma re ri'i byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs pa
24b8(phal chen): dang / dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba bzhin tu dgongs pa skad cig ma thams cad la'ang pad mo'i rgyud kyis yong su dag par mngon par 'tshang brgya pa dang / de bzhin gshegs du chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas
25a1(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnam par rgyan pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag par 'byam klas pa brjod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa tha dad pa
25a2(phal chen): rnam par tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med cing 'byam klas pa/ dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa bstan pa ma sten pa dang ldan pa/ blo tshad med pa dang mos pa shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyis gnas med pa mtshan nyid
25a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang ldan pa tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa skad cig gis thams cad yongs su bstan pa las kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ched bsgrubs pa mi 'dzad pa la mnga' che
25a4(phal chen): ste/ 'di ni ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi ma da' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen
25a5(phal chen): pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos kyi so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'dir ga ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yang su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na
25a6(phal chen): mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs
25a7(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// dge rtsa ba thams cad yongs
25a8(phal chen): su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa rnams byang chub tu mngon par mchod brgya'o// yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun gsum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pas yongs su brdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
25b1(phal chen): 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sems can yongs su smani bar bya ba dang / 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chubs mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
25b2(phal chen): 'das kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// zhing yongs su dag par byang chub pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom
25b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su brdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya'o// mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po dang gzugs kyi/ 
25b4(phal chen): sku lta na don yod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu da mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam panyid yongasu rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
25b5(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phrin la sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
25b6(phal chen): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs
25b7(phal chen): na chos kyi thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa med cing / spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud pa la dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shin tu ston bcing bcing rjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan la
25b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do// ma bcings ma grol ba dang / gzung ba med bcing sogs pa
26a1(phal chen): gamed te/ yongs su rdzogs pa med par yang thugs su chud la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa yang rnyed te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu
26a2(phal chen): chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba de'i yang dag par de kho na nyid ma nor ba gzhan tu mi 'gyur ba dang chos thams cad bdag gi med cing yongasu rdzinas pa med par ci de kho na nyid la gyi mtha' yas pa rnam par mi mnga' yang
26a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas
26a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ba ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang mi 'phrogs shing mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa la de'i rang bzhin tu ngo bo nyid med pa dang ji lngar
26a5(phal chen): ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul gyis thams cad thugs su chud bkyang ga zugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku'i gzugs rnam par dag grangs med par nga / zhing gi mtshon ma dang spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa rnam pa sna chags
26a6(phal chen): yang dag par bstan cang bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon ma chen por gyur pas/ mun pa med pa'i snang ba'i ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa
26a7(phal chen): gsum pa'o// chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin da ltar byung ba'i mtha' yang ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba 'am ma yin pas de
26a8(phal chen): bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod tu med pas 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang lhar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba yang rab tu brjod cing kun tu gzigs pa/ 
26b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i 'phra na las dang gsungs kyi 'phrin las dang thugs kyi
26b2(phal chen): 'phrin las kyis mngon par 'du 'dzad pa'ang ma mnga' la/ yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs shing rnam par phye ba med cing mthar thug ste/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bgrang bar tshul gyis rnam par
26b3(phal chen): 'das kyang tshul nges pa med pa'i mdzod du gyur cing 'greng ba dang mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su rgud pa/ ye shes sgrib pa med
26b4(phal chen): pas gzigs pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gtul ba rnam par dmigs pa la rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs tsha da med pa mu med par mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom/ 
26b5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnas ni sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga'o// chos tham sa cad lta ba med pas tha mi dad pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / sna tshogs med pa dang / byung ba med/ 
26b6(phal chen): ba dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges pa yang dag par skabs cing 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa dang yang dag por gzigs pas thams cad mkhyen pa zang
26b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i thams cad gzigs pa/ mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas cho 'phrul yang mnga' sgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mi mnyam pa 'di ni sangs rgya
26b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thug su chung ba'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan mkhyen par bye ba chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa gnas med pa
27a1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos skyon med pas dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen to// de yang nyi ma gcig gam zla ba phyed dam lo gcig gam lo rgya'am bskal pa 'jigs pa dang 'du ba rjesu skrag
27a2(phal chen): pa dang / phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam yud ba tsam gcig gis dus dang snga bro nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus su phyi dro'i dus dang nyi ma bgrangs pa'i dus dang / nyi ma bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus dang / zla ba dang
27a3(phal chen): lo dang lo brgya'i dus dang bskal pa gcig gi dus dang tshad med pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas phyi ma'i dus mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus su chos bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog rgyun tu chad pa
27a4(phal chen): mi 'gyur bral bar mi 'gyur bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur lajig par mi 'gyur/ g.yo bar mi 'gyur ring tu mi 'gyur 'khor de na gnas pa nyid du yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMm
27a5(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du dus la bang par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jig
27a6(phal chen): btsud med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par thogs pa med pas mnga' ba'o// tha na dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pazang mi shes bya mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i thogs pa med pa menga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag pa
27a7(phal chen): mkhyen pas mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o mthun mong ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa yang dag par mngasha ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mthar thug pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa
27a8(phal chen): yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshig gis tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o// chos thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o// bsam pa dang mos pa dang dbang po ji lta bzhin tu chos kyi tshul dang rnam grangs ji ltar rnam pa/ 
27b1(phal chen): bkod pa'i bzhin tu sa mtshams med par bston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa rnams yongs su de mdo sde de dang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang dpung gi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
27b2(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ni ming med cing mang dang rus dang 'byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang yigs shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas te/ mang 'das pa ma yI
27b3(phal chen): pa dang / mang ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang / ming da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang / mang sems can ma yin pa dang mang zhing ma yin pa dang / mang chos kyi ma yin pa dang / ming gi yon tan ma yin pa dang / ming byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa
27b4(phal chen): dang / mang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / mang grang ba ma yin pa dang ming grang das med pa ma yin pa dang / ming skye ba ma yin pa dang / mang 'gags pa ma yi dran pa dang / mang med pa ma yin pa dang / ming yod pa ma yin pa dang / ming cig
27b5(phal chen): pa ma yin pa dang mang tha dad pa ma yin pa dang chos thaMd rang bzhin gyis brjo da tu med pa dang / phyogs pa dang brda med pa dang / tshig gi lam med pa sgra dang bral ba sgra'i rnam par thams cad mi 'byung ba yongs su bsgrubs pa
27b6(phal chen): med pas byas pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par gcig ma yin pa rnam par mang po ma ya ni thugs su chud pa la rjod pa dang spyod pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog rnyes pa dag ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i yul mi mnga'
27b7(phal chen): ba dag go// mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go// rtog pa kun tu rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa 'gags pa dag go// spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
27b8(phal chen): rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ tshor ba'i spyod pa dag pa ste/ 'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'byed kun tu rgyu
28a1(phal chen): pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis zhi ba rab tu mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye 'ched kyi rgyud med pa dang / khams rnams mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / chos zad
28a2(phal chen): bskyed du med cing rang bzhin gyi nam mkha' lta bu dang chos thams cad dben pa dang las med pa dang / rnam par smin pa med pa dang spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang / ma grub pa dang ma byung ba dang grangs kyis rjod pa dang yod pa ma yin pa dang med pa ma
28a3(phal chen): yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang skyo ba med pa dang gnas pa med pa dang / yongs su gnas pa med pa dang yong su smin pa rnyed pa dang / rnam par 'dul
28a4(phal chen): ba med pa dang / sems can med pas dang / sems can med pa ma yi ngan pa dang / srog med pa dang srog med pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen med pa dang rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang / rten med pa dang rten med pa ma yin pa dang / 
28a5(phal chen): chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dam pa'i rnyes pa de ga ste/ nges par dang ma 'dres pa'i phung po gsum rnam par bkod pa rnams ni
28a6(phal chen): bstobs bcu thugasu chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i bsgra sgrogs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi thabs
28a7(phal chen): mkhas pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgya ba'i sras bcu po dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas ba kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa'o// shin tu brgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ bam po drug
28a8(phal chen): bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas 'dra ni las rgya chen po tshad med pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ma
28b1(phal chen): par/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar 'byung ba'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'jug par mi nus so// bcu gang zhe na phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyis
28b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan tu skyes pa'i snyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mu med pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ bla na med pa gzil
28b3(phal chen): brjid tshad med pa snang ba tshad med pa/ dbyangs tshad med par dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa/ gsung brjod du rnam par dag pa dmigs pa tshad med pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la shes rab dang / ye shes yul tshad med pa mnga'
28b4(phal chen): ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ dbadud dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa dang bces pa dge slong dang bram bze'i skye gu dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma ya ni tu bcas pa'i 'jigri rten la phan 'jog
28b5(phal chen): papabadzad do// byams pa chen pos spyod yul thogs pa med pa dang / thathA dang thugs rje chen po'i bsgo'i mthar thug pas ses can la phan 'jog kha 'dzad do// bsod nams kyi bstobs dang mnga' phun sum tshogs pa
28b6(phal chen): dang / dbang po rnams par sbyang ba dang / cang shes pa kyi sems dang yongasu dag pas kyang / sems can rnam la phan 'dogs pa mdzad theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa 'dzad do// theg pa chen po yongasu su
28b7(phal chen): brdzogs par byas pas kyang / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dzad do// 'gro ba thams cad gnod pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa 'dzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las dang po'o// 
28b8(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa med pa kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i sku thams cad skye ba bstan pa sgyu ma lta bur yongasu spyod pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa mig g.yor lta bur rnam par dmyi
29a1(phal chen): la/ na mkha'i yul tshad med par khyab pa gzhed pa bzhin tu bskyed yang chags pa mi mnga' ba/ smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba gnas med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin
29a2(phal chen): gyis 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag brgyan shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phran las mdzad do// khang pa rtsegs pa'i rin po ches les byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po dang ldan pa na bzhugs pa
29a3(phal chen): kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yid la bya ba'i byin brlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sku rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'dzod chen po yang dag pa
29a4(phal chen): bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phra ni las mdzad do// ye shes kyi nyi ma 'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrani las 'dzad do// yul che bsku'i skyed pa'i yul sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
29a5(phal chen): mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen pos rnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jiH/ rten byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
29a6(phal chen): las mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa rnam par spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'dzad do// ting nge 'dzin las zhes pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// spyod pa thog ma la
29a7(phal chen): yos mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug gi bar tu thog ma dang tha ma med tshul gyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sa 'di la gnyis su med pas thams cad mthar phyin par byas nas/ tha mar 'jig rten gi grangs
29a8(phal chen): kyis skyes pa yongs su ston te/ skyes pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad tu sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'ar 'gyur ba// 
29b1(phal chen): kyang 'jig rten gyi grang thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mngon par byung bas kyang 'jig rten tha~Md du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs mngon par 'tshang brgya pas kyang 'jig rten thams ca
29b2(phal chen): tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phra ni las mdzad do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phros las 'dzad// thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten sna tshogs 'jig rten tshad med pa 'jig rten kun
29b3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi phra ba'i rgyud dang rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi ma lus pa thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las 'dzad do// zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten tu sangs rgyas kyi 'dren las mdzad do// las kyi rnam par/ 
29b4(phal chen): smani pas ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sems can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gi sangs rgyas kyi 'angan las mdzad do// skye ba dang shi bo'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten tu sang/ 
29b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'dren las 'dzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas kyi 'phrin las sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'dren las mdzad do// 'di
29b6(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs kyi 'phrin las gnyis pa'o// dge ba sbyong ba'i las rno bar dag cing gdung rabs thaMd ye shes kyi tshul rna bar dag pas sku tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pa/ sems can rtul ba thugasu nud pa dge ba'i rtsa
29b7(phal chen): thad yong su rdzogs par mdzad cing / btsun mo'i 'khor gi nang na bzhugs pa ston kyang / sangs rgyas thaMd kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'i rnam sgra dang tshig thaMd dang bral bar rtags pas/ dngos po thams cad dngos po// 
29b8(phal chen): med pa las byung ba'i khongs chud par bya ba dang / dngos po tha~Md shes pa la gzugs par bya ba dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos 'gro ba dang / mu med pa rnam par lta bar bya ba
30a1(phal chen): dang byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtogs par byed pa dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten brjod du ra med par khongs su chud par bya ba dang btang snyoms chen pos sems dbang sgyur ba la gnas par
30a2(phal chen): bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang / chos rab tu brjod par bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ma lus par mngon par sgrub par bya ba dang / thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs
30a3(phal chen): su rdzogs par byed par bya ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan du byed pa dang / chos ston pa rnam par brjod pa rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi dngos po la smon lam par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes
30a4(phal chen): kha la rtogs par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas pa rnam par smin par yang dag par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul tu sems can dul ba dang yongs su smin par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su
30a5(phal chen): smin par rnam par tshul bzhin du bdul ba dang / grangs med bI thabs 'khas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa'i dang / sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rag
30a6(phal chen): tu brjod par dang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par sbyangs pa/ thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin las mngon par sbreng ba dang / thams cad la skyon pa'i sems chen po skyed pa'i phye 'phrul gsuM
30a7(phal chen): long su rlan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes mthong ba dang / rnam par dmigs pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gi nang du bstan pa yan chad du/ 'jig rten gi mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lA/ 
30a8(phal chen): yongasu bstan pa mdzad cing / ye shes kyi mthu chen po thoms pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa'i bsgribs pa med pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyi thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i mthar thug pa'i 'phrin
30b1(phal chen): las kyi mtha' dang / 'bra ni las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gsung gi 'phros ye shes nyams pa med pas/ rnam par dag pa dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing / chags pa med pa'i thabs mkhas pas
30b2(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'dredrin las gsum pa'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i chen po mngon pa rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgyan rnam par phye ba/ tshad med pa dang ldan
30b3(phal chen): pa yid du 'ong ba'i spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas/ sems can rnams la 'jig rten gnas las skyo ba dang / 'jig rten gyi mngon par zhen pa rnam par zlog pa dang / 'jig rten du rtogs pa thams cad mi/ 
30b4(phal chen): rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi tshul la mngon pa zhen pa rnam par zlog pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su bcod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang chub zhing nub pa la yang dag
30b5(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi don rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang / khyim gyi tshul yongs su spangs par bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par
30b6(phal chen): gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi sngon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa lo su snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnyes pas sems can rnams mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu sprul
30b7(phal chen): kha dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa yang dag par 'gyur ba 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang na 'dus pa 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag
30b8(phal chen): par ba rdzogs pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgor brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
31a1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgor rab tu bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba mdzad cing 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam 'phran las bzhi pa'o// don cig ma yin pa 'am/ 'khyen
31a2(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i kyang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhol ba dang / sku'i byini rlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos
31a3(phal chen): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ba thams cad du brgyas par bkang ba'i phyir byin kyis brlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas/ mthar rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med par rab tu rnyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
31a4(phal chen): yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i bya dang chub sems dpa' rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dam rapa thob pa rnams kyis zhal tu lta ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rna
31a5(phal chen): pa dang / smon lam khyad par can ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang rtag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'aSh+ma lo zab mo rab tu bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa brtsegs pas
31a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i brjod tu med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gi khams
31a7(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs pa mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i sems can gyi rnam par dmigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i
31a8(phal chen): gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes pa bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus par mtha' thug/ sems can rnams pa thams cad dang / zhing gi rnam par thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams ca
31b1(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang gdul ba'i rnam thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i thar/ 
31b2(phal chen): thug pa rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'chang rgya bas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrini las lnga'o// sangs
31b3(phal chen): brgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa/ byar mi ldog bya'i 'khor lo dang / 'jog rten thams cad kyi khong su chung ba'i tshul gyis tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang / mi 'jigs pa seng ge'iring re chen po'i tshul
31b4(phal chen): gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo drang chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i bsgo snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes na mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa
31b5(phal chen): 'itshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis smi bas pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig
31b6(phal chen): mgo rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i tshul gyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod pa'i 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
31b7(phal chen): dang/ mi 'gal po'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad 'ang ma 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de la sogs pa rnams pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo la/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i
31b8(phal chen): rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dzad pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
32a1(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su gshegs pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
32a2(phal chen): 'phran las mdzad de/ ma'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / bri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi brgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha'
32a3(phal chen): ljang gi rgyal po'i gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas de dag tu gshegs bkyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dran las mdzad de
32a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ grong khyer kyi sgor bya ni nas g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / long ba rnams mig thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par gyur pa dang / gos med pa rnams gos thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams pa/ de
32a5(phal chen): khathob pa dang / rolo mo'i na byang na grol ma 'drangs par swA yid du 'ong ba rang 'byin pa dang / brgyan sdong na 'dug pa dang gnas nas ma'o// ga pa dang / ma spyod be la bkrol bar spyod cing / bkrol ba'i sgra 'drung ba
32a6(phal chen): dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra ba skad 'di du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang / ldan padang mi 'thun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 
32a7(phal chen): mtshan dang dang byad bzang po bstun pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yongs su gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / skum pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
32a8(phal chen): kyi 'dranani las mdzad do// gshegs pa dang / slar gzhugs pa dang / gzhengs pa dang / chags pa dang / gzhugs pa dang / gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrani las mdzad do// chos ston pas dang mi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang // 
32b1(phal chen): sengs can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten gi
32b2(phal chen): kyi yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing / 'byung ba dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos/ shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / ldan pa sngon 'gro
32b3(phal chen): bar byang chub sems dpa' dang / gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrani las mdzad/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsku gzugs ldan mi gos pa'o// zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang / sags
32b4(phal chen): rgyas rnams skye ba dkod no// zhes bya bar yad ches par bye 'o pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa ni chos dkar po'i 'byung gan nas su gyur pa'o// zhes sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig
32b5(phal chen): rten gi thams cad rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyi ba yin no// zhes bya bar khongs su chud par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon/ na bsngags pa ni mtha' yas pa'o// zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / 
32b6(phal chen): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mos pa'i tshul thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyes par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
32b7(phal chen): ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o zhes/ khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la mngon par gyur par rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi ris/ bsam gis mi khyab pa'i gnas su
32b8(phal chen): gyur pa dang / sems can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhing thams cad snang ba khong du chud pa dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas 'jig rten gi thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams
33a1(phal chen): la/ sems rgyas kyi 'phrini las mdzad do// dad par bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar dang / thal mo sbyor bar byas pa dang / rjes su bstan par dang / spyan grangs pa dang / mchod pa dang mngon par mthor ba dang / 'dzum par bya
33a2(phal chen): kha dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis/ mos par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
33a3(phal chen): 'gyur bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod par bya bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can rnams la
33a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku kha dog dang / dbyabs kyi rnams par tshad med pa bstan kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
33a5(phal chen): kyi'adzi ni las mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par bya bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// de dag la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas
33a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas dag/ 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthun dang 'dul ba dang / ji
33a7(phal chen): lta bu'i tshub las mi 'da' bar 'byung ngo // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rgya chen po dpag tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i yul
33a8(phal chen): dang / snying rje'i yul chen po dag rab tu bskul ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su bskyo ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bco
33b1(phal chen): ldan 'das pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bdun pa'o// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgon pa'i la bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs sam/ dben par bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa la
33b2(phal chen): bzhags sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i gnas la bzhags sam/ gcig pu dges par bzhags sam/ sku mi sbyang bar bzhugs sam/ ye shes zab po'i gnas la bzhags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs tshad med pa
33b3(phal chen): la bzhugs sam/ sku'i yongs su spyod pa mi mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrini las gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis mos pa bzhin
33b4(phal chen): tu/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rgyun ma chod par 'byung nga ste/ sangs rgyas lha yongs su btsal bas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyu na mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas klu yongs su btsal bas kyang / sangs rgyas
33b5(phal chen): kyi 'phran las rgyun mi mdzad do// sangs rgyas gnod sbyini yongasasu tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi 'am/ ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas/ lho phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'dran las rgyun miched
33b6(phal chen): do// sangs rgyas kyi srin po'i yongasu tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mo dang mi ma yin pa ni yongasu tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su tshol bas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi
33b7(phal chen): 'drani las rgyun mi 'chad do// chos bston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi mdzad ngo // sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi mchad do// sangs rgyas kyi 'thams cad brjod pas kyang sags
33b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi mchad do// byang chub sems dpa'i skyong ba'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad gcig tu rjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'drani las rgyun mi mchad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa cig rnam par phye ste/ 
34a1(phal chen): spyod pa tha dad pa spyod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi mchad do// 'jig rten gyi yul sangasus kyi yul du brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phros rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jig rten gyi yul ba
34a2(phal chen): brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrani las rgyun mi 'chad do// yul ma yini pa sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// nyin mtshan dang yun du yin man dang / zla ba dang lo bgrangs par bzhugs/ 
34a3(phal chen): pa dang / yongs su bzhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal par brjod du med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i bar du bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
34a4(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phris kyis brgyad pa'o// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'byung gnas lta bu/ sems can thams
34a5(phal chen): cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam por spyong pa lta bu/ sangs rgyas rnams la dad lta bu// sems khong du chud pa lta bu/ dbang po rnams sgrubs pa lta bu/ sems can bskye ba dgu thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad la mos pa lnga
34a6(phal chen): shu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams la skul pa lta bu/ gzhan gyi bring mi 'jog pa rnams la ye shes snang ba lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi khams mi rtag/ 
34a7(phal chen): khar bsten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mo'i'achad par bston pa dang / 'phrin las mdzad pa'i mthar thug par bstan pa dang / chos kyi rgyun nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang / srid pa'i tshul rtsa ba nas chang par brjod pa dang / 
34a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad skyo bar bya bar bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i sems su 'thun par byas pa dang / bsku'i tshe mtha' lta bur sems can rnams kyis shes par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad dag/ 
34b1(phal chen): bar bya bar bstan pa dang / sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa mnyes par gyis shig/ bstan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan par mi rung khong du nud par bya ba dang / 
34b2(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams kyi brtsol ba skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas la dmigs par rtson pa'i sems la 'god pa dang / yul du dran par rnam par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtho' ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skyo ba'i dbang po phyir zlog cing yengs
34b3(phal chen): su dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas mos bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlab par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i rkyen 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyin par dgongs par mdzad
34b4(phal chen): kha dag sku thams cad pashig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzung gis sems can rnams yongs su bzung bar mdzad do// 'jig rten gi rnam par 'khrugs pa dang bregs shing myos pa'i sems can rnams sdom pa la dgongs pa mdzad sring
34b5(phal chen): yongasu myang na las 'das pa bston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dran la rgyud mi 'chang de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las dgu pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad sems can rnaMs ste/ 
34b6(phal chen): ga mi 'do du ba dgang phying khyo byon pa dang / yang rig pa grus pa'i sa rgyas zhe chugs rkyen pos ga ded ga chen pa ni lan yan bzhid 'dug che na sa da pa
34b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gi sems can thams cad kyi bskyabs su gyur pa dang / 'gron tu gyur pa rten du gyur pa/ bla mar gyur pa bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur to zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'byung bar dka'o// zhes rnam par de lta
34b8(phal chen): bur smre bsngags 'don cing mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / yid la byed pa de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi 'dra ni las tshad med pa dang / rgyun mi 'chang bar/ sangs rgyas
35a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi sems dang par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams dad pas mchod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lhag pa'i
35a2(phal chen): bsam pa rnam par sbyong bar bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams sbyin par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnaMs kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang / sem
35a3(phal chen): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmigs pa bya ba'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ phyogs dang yul sna tshogs sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsags par bya/ 
35a4(phal chen): ba'i dbang gyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos 'ji lta ba bzhin tu sku bdung ring sel byin gyis rlobs te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bri ba dang / lha ma yin dang namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
35a5(phal chen): bo dang mi'i ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas thams cad tu 'dul ba dang / mos pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sku bdud dang ring srel gyi byin gyi rlob po// rang gi sku rnam par phye ste/ sku gsung ring sel tshad med grangs med pa/ 
35a6(phal chen): dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rjod tu med pa'i yang rjod du med pa byin gyis rlob po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi sku gdung gi 'jig rten thams cad du phye ba de'i yul dang / phyogs kyi klu'i gnas pa
35a7(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / bri ba dang lha dang lha ma ya ni dang na mkha' ldan dang / mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen po'i gnas dang / srin po'i gnas dpag tu bsku btung dang ring srel la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ sa btung ring srel dang / 
35a8(phal chen): dbu dang phyag sen gyi mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten la 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dran par gyur to// chos la bar tu rten par gyur to// dge 'dun la dad par rab tu thob par 'gyur to// yul dang / 
35b1(phal chen): dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu'ang rgyan mi gcod pas sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa sbyin pa yong su rkyong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams byed par 'gyur to// mtho ris de dang de yong su dag par 'gyur ro// rigs
35b2(phal chen): dang rgyud gi bdag nyid chen por rab tu thob par gyur to// long spyod chen po dang 'khor rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// lha dang mi bun gsum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur to// log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongasu rdzogs pa
35b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i don tu yod par rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro// chos dkar po la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// khams gsum pa las byung ba'i lam yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// theg pa gang la dad
35b4(phal chen): pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag la bran du zo ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rten pa dang skyabs btsal ba dang 'gon btsal ba dang dpung gnyen btsal ba ses
35b5(phal chen): skyed par gyur te/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang yongs su yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa sbyong ba/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
35b6(phal chen): 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gi byung na de ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par mang po rab tu bsags/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dra ni las bcu pa'o// kye
35b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'dran las rgya chen po tshad med pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par/ de dag ni sangs rgyas rlabs po ma rtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi tshad
35b8(phal chen): bzung bar mi nus so// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par
36a1(phal chen): spyod cing / dngos po rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung bstan pa thams cad bston pa gnyis su med par spyod do// sangs/ 
36a2(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran par la rtsol ba rnam par sems can bsam pa brjod du med pa'i 'byam klas pa rnams la gnyis su med par spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus pa
36a3(phal chen): mngon par sangs rgyas pas/ gnyis su med pa'i sku rnam par dmigs par 'dzad do// 'das pa'i dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga'o// 'byung ba dang / byang ba'i/ 
36a4(phal chen): mtha' gnyis su med par dang / bsngo ba'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnyis su med pa'i thug su chud par mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gnyi su med pas/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gcig par rab tu mkhyen cing // 
36a5(phal chen): bston pa thugs su chud pa mnga'o// sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis med par thugasu chud pa'o// mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa dang / 'dul bar 'dzad pa'i rnam par dmigasu med par
36a6(phal chen): thugs su chud pa mang // 'jig rten gi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga'o// 'das pa'i dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su/ 
36a7(phal chen): med par thugasu chud pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gnyis su med par brjod cing / dngos po gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
36a8(phal chen): 'das gnyis su rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lta zhugs pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu bzhugs pa rnamaso// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi dbyings/ gnas pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa la bzhugs
36b1(phal chen): kha'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs su rje chen po mi mnyam pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon lam ji lnga pa bzhin du 'byung ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung
36b2(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su mi gtong ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de gzhin gshegs pa'i sku
36b3(phal chen): bskal ba mnyam pa tha dad pacing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhugs pa'i thugs su la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad nyams pa med pa/ 
36b4(phal chen): la gzhol ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sang tshangs brgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thams cad kyi mnyam
36b5(phal chen): panyid la 'jug pas/ grub pa med pas yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ chos thams
36b6(phal chen): cad la bzhugs pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams/ 
36b7(phal chen): cad kyis 'das pa dang bgrangs mtha' dag thams cad mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa bablangs pa mtha' dag sems can thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa dang / cog gi lam la mtha' yas thams cad mkhyen pa
36b8(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can gi bsam pa dang / shes rab mtha' dag thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po rnam pa sna tshogs
37a1(phal chen): su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la/ bsam pa yongasu mi gtong bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par 'khyen pa dang chos // 
37a2(phal chen): 'tshang rgya bar 'khyen pa'i mtha' dag thams cad mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gi rgyud thams cad rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhin gi 'phrul gi rnam par byed pa
37a3(phal chen): thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas ngal be che zhes bya ba
37a4(phal chen): las// bam po drug bcu drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'isras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi stobs chen po/ stobs chen po tshad med pa stong pa nyid che/ stobs
37a5(phal chen): thub pa med pa stobs mi nyams pa/ stobs snying po dang ldan pa stobs mi shes pa stobs 'jig rten gi thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa stob sems can thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan stob
37a6(phal chen): khaM tso/ dpa' ba chen po'i stobs rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni pha rol tu phyin pa gnon pa thams cad kyis mi shigs mi chod pa'o// 'jig rten gi yul thams cad kyi sku tshe'i dbang po nyams par mi nus so// dag
37a7(phal chen): ba chen po// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi bskal ba'i mi'i gdung bas/ 'jig par mi nus pa'o// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad 'jig rten par rtogs pa'i chu'i phung por grogs par mi 'gyur ro// bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi sde
37a8(phal chen): thams cad dang lha thams cad dang lha thams cad kyi gdung dang / klu dang gnod byin dang bri za dang lha ma ya ni dang / na mkha' lha'i dang mi 'am 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma ya ni thams cad dang / btud kyi sde thams cad dpung dang sha za
37b1(phal chen): dang srin po thams cad kyi dpung dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dpung gis rgal bar mi nus pa'o// rdo rje ri rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang / 'khor yul gi ri chen po tsom de/ stong gsung gi stong chen po tsam gyi rdo rje'i char phab kyang ba
37b2(phal chen): com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba sku gcig kyang 'gul bar mi 'gyur/ g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga' bzhugs sam pashes sam/ bzhud dam/ gzi
37b3(phal chen): kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa'i yul de dang ba'i 'khor dag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes na kun tu 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhe 'bring rnams la yang dganod// 
37b4(phal chen): par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlobs pa'i sems can la yang ga gnod par mi 'gyur zhing mi g.yon/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lha mos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
37b5(phal chen): kyi mthu chen po bstobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i mtshan gi chos dang po'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dges nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad ri rab kyi ri dang bcas 'khor
37b6(phal chen): yug dang 'khor yug chen po'i ri rab bcas pa dang / rgya mtsho dang ri dang nags tshal thabs po dang / sems can gnas pa'i tha dad pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i bu ga gcig tu btsud do// phyi nI/ 
37b7(phal chen): mtha' bskal pa'i mur thug par gzhag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs ma rtogs par sems can rnams kyis shes par ba mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag ni de snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams sku'i spu'i bu ga gci
37b8(phal chen): tsam yang skyob mi mnga' ste/ khyi ma'i mtha' gsal ba'i mur thug par sngams shing gshegs sam/ bzhugs sam zhengs sam gzigs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thugs skad cig tsam yang skyob par mi mnga'o// chad cing
38a1(phal chen): gtub bar ma gyur ro// mthur dang stongs la 'ongs su nyams par 'gyur ba mi mnga'a'o// zad cing rung bar spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba mi mang la'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ namapa' chos dbyings ma/ 
38a2(phal chen): lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin pakyang skyo ba med de/ 'dub pa med do// gnod pa med do// med par mi 'gyur ro// mig g.yo mi 'byung ngo // ma 'jog go// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ga
38a3(phal chen): skuspu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jig rten gi khams ma lus pa thams cad skams kyang / de'i rgyu thugs skad cig tsam du yang dag med pa'i sku nyams pa mi 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthu chen po'i stobs/ sangs
38a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'os gzhan yang sangs brgyang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gshegs thams cad gcig tu bzhud byas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
38a5(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gi khams yongs su 'da' gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gshegs thabs gcig tu bzhud pas/ sa sa rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
38a6(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gi khams yongasu 'da' zhing thugs bskyed pa gcig gis bskal ba tha dad pa'i rim pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'byung bar mdzad do// de ltar rab tu gshegs pas bskal pa 'jig rten gi khaMs/ 
38a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bzhud zhing / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyu ba'i bskal par bzhud de/ 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi brtul snyed shin tu phra ba 'byung bar mdzad do// de snyed kyis 'jig rten
38a8(phal chen): gi khams tsam tu 'khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs shing 'khor yul chen po'i rdo rje'i ri dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam pa brjod par med pa'i yang brjod tu med pa la skyes pa rnyed kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed pa la ba spu'i khung bu gcig
38b1(phal chen): tu bachud de/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig pu ji lta ba bzhin tu sku'i sku'i khung bu thams cad du tsud de/ ba spu'i khung du yang sems can thams cad snyed du gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snyams te/ de snyed kyi baphru
38b2(phal chen): bu mu de bzhin drug gams te/ zugs bskyed pa de ltar bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ladzi rten gi khams thams cad tu brgyu nga gshegs sa mnamakha'i dbyings thams cad tu rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gi la
38b3(phal chen): rgyud grangs pa sngon gyi mtha' rtogs pa nas bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du zad par gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa la rtsod pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro// 
38b4(phal chen): thugs rnams par 'khrug par mi 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku yongasu nyams par ni 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i
38b5(phal chen): stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gsum pa'o// / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod rnams bzhenas nas bskal pa brjod rgya ba'i dkyil mo krung gcig bcas
38b6(phal chen): bas/ nyid mtshan gyi rgyud du bsngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' thug thogs pa'i bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang sku mi g.yo zhing bde ba'i dam pa spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 
38b7(phal chen): rnam par spyod kyang / de sems 'ga' tsam du yang sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las rgyun mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad yong su bkod de/ 'jig rten gi khams de dag ni sems can
38b8(phal chen): gcig gi lus kyang 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tsam tu che bar de ltar bur gyur la/ sems can gcig gi lus gi mtshan ji tsam gis lus sems can thos
39a1(phal chen): cad 'gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi khams thams cad lcid ci tsam du yod pa de tsam du gyur te/ sems can gcig gis ci tsam ldar bsgrubs ci bzhin du sems can thams cad re re/ 
39a2(phal chen): lcid kyang de tsam tu gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gi rtse mo gcig la/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mur thug pa snrums te/ phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gis ji ltar bsnams pa de bzhin du/ 
39a3(phal chen): sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo la'ang de tsam re re stabs kyang de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsku mnyal ba 'am/ thugs dub par mi 'gyur te/ thugs bskyed pa'i rma shas shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du yang dag bsdug bsngal mi bde/ 
39a4(phal chen): bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin tu 'jag rten gi khams la 'dzag pa dang na mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi bri ba'i rnam pa la 'jag pa re re dang / de lta bu la 'jug pa'i na mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dpyang
39a5(phal chen): kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis mthar thugs pa/ skra'i rtse ma cha shas kyis gzhan pa'i 'jig rten gi khams la 'jug pa thamasaHda re re zhing yang skad rtse mo cha shas kyis gzhal te/ namakha'i dbyangs kun
39a6(phal chen): tu khyab par thams cad ma lus pa'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad kyis na mkha'i dbyings 'jug pa thams cad tu bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa le 'di'i tshul dang / dkyil mo bkrungs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i spyod pas sngon gi mkha
39a7(phal chen): dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal ba zad par mdzad de/ bskal ba zad par 'dzad cing bskal ba la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mthu bo che'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan
39a8(phal chen): gyis bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsku gcig la dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa brtul shin tu phra ba snyed byin gyis rlabs te/ dbu re re yang lcags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
39b1(phal chen): brjod tu med pa'i thu shin tu dra ba snyed byin gyis rlabs nas/ de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang bsgra bskad kyi gsung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re brjod de/ 
39b2(phal chen): kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing / dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung sbra skad ci gsung re res kyang mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bshad pa/ mdo sde re re
39b3(phal chen): la yang chos bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa yang brtul ba shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gsol bar 'dzad do// chos bstan pa'i gcig las kyang chos kyi chag dang / yig sangs rgyas kyi zhing
39b4(phal chen): rjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa brtul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod tu medapar 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin tu chos ste/ na pa thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi tshig dang yig ge brjod pa'i de/ de
39b5(phal chen): ltar brjod pas/ bsngal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa'i rgyu la shin tu dra ba snyed rab tu phra ba bstan pa bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhi nga brjod tu med pa'i yang rjod du med pa'i brtul shin tu dra ba snyed du gyu
39b6(phal chen): tsa / rab tu bstan pa'i tshul gyis rnam drangs 'dis/ bskal ba 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed gan tra zla ba snyed rab tu bstan la/ rnam grangs 'di 'thabs bskul pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul gan
39b7(phal chen): phra ba snyed zad la/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal bar gyur te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal zad cing 'das par byas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdul pa rnos thams cad snang bas la'o
39b8(phal chen): lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad rab tu shes pa bstan cing lus bstan pa dang / the tsom thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 
40a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad brjod pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba thams
40a2(phal chen): cad ma lus par ye shes kyi sgron mtshon pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa dang / mi 'jig pa chen pos rgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas kyi sku cig
40a3(phal chen): gi byin gyis rlabs kyis ji ltar ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin chen po dpe' thams cad la dpe med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa ska'i
40a4(phal chen): rtse mo'i rgya shas kyis gzhal bar ma lus pa thams cad chags pa med mang par bya bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa na nga snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed de snyed du thugs su bskad cig re re la
40a5(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal bar sprul par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul pa'i sku'i thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi dbu'i mang por gyur la gzhung de
40a6(phal chen): bzhin du bsku'i re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar gyur te/ ljags re re las kyang de snyed de snod kyi dbyings kyi yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gi khams sems can go bar mdzad pa/ 
40a7(phal chen): de dag 'byung la/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang skad kyi gsung de dag re res kyang de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde bshad par 'gyur la mdo sde de dag re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi chos bstan pa rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan
40a8(phal chen): kha de dag re re las kyang de snyed de snyed kyi gsung de dag chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge brjod par 'gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang yig de dag res re kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams la dbyangs kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can
40b1(phal chen): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la tub par mi mnga' snye/ nyams par mi 'gyur la thob ma mi mnga' bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor yang tham la'i
40b2(phal chen): ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar tu rgyun 'chang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i brgyal mtshan gyi chos lnga'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
40b3(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi thugs dpal gyi bye'us rgya byu rdo rjes chen po ltar phrin tu brtan par grub pa mnga' bdag ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du byon pa na/ bdud sdig tor can gyis sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud kyi sno
40b4(phal chen): gzugs sna tshogs can gan tu mi bsdug pa 'jigs 'jigs ltar / dug pa rab tu snang ba'i gzugs can 'jig rten thams cad rab tu'/ jigs pa'i gzugs can rab tu skying g.ya' skyid pa'i gzugs cam
40b5(phal chen): bdud shin tu mi bsdug pa'i gzugs 'chad pa rab mchog por 'dzags pa 'jigs pa chen po snyed pa 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig rte na thams cad phung bar byed pa/ de lta bu'i sha stag gis byang chub kyi shi
40b6(phal chen): drung du chos kyi bdud thams cad dang / namakha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gang bar gzer yang byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs la bsnyengs pa mi mnga'o// bag tsho ba mi mnga'o baspu gcig kyang g.yo/ 
40b7(phal chen): pa med do// thugs kyi cha shes shin tu phra ba 'ga' tsam gyis kyang de rnams pa tha dad pa gzugs pa'i mtshan ma rnam par tha dad pa 'dzin pa mi mngon ste/ shin tu brtan po yin pa med do// mi skul do rnams par rtogs par med do// shin
40b8(phal chen): tu bzhi'o// bsnyems pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo// sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu spangs so// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun mi chad de/ byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis rang/ 
41a1(phal chen): po shin tu dben pa'o// bag tshab mi mang ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// thugs shin tu dran pa zhing mnyam mi mang ba'o// tshul zil gyis mi gnan pa/ phas kyi rgol bas mi gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ 
41a2(phal chen): thams cad dang bdud kyi rigs su rtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gis gnon to// shin tu skra 'gong ngo do// de ltar zil gyis gnon te spa 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo// 
41a3(phal chen): de la yang bcom ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrub ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'od ni sangs rgyas
41a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthu bo che chen pos stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi/ spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pa ni 'jig rten gi khams
41a5(phal chen): ma lus pa de dag thams cad du/ sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyi rnam par dmigs pa kun tu khyab par 'gyur ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med de ri rab la thogs pa med do// 
41a6(phal chen): ri rib rarini po'i che'i ri la thogs pa med do// 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po'i la thogs pa med do// lha'i khyim la thog pa med do// klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do// gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa med/ bri za'i khyim la thogs
41a7(phal chen): pa med do/ lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do// na mkha' lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do/ mi 'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do// lto phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa med do// 
41a8(phal chen): gal te brgya la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yod par sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste/ ca co 'bres par gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i
41b1(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa'i sgra la bsgrubs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' shig de dag gi rnam pa'i rnam par dmyigs pa la lha de lham me ldan ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang lagi rnams/ 
41b2(phal chen): kyang klag par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu' bo che chen pos stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bdun no// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags
41b3(phal chen): pa mi mnga' ba ste/ bskol pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med par yongasu sbyangs pa'o// 'das pa'i dang ma 'ongs pa dang lhar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyun tu gyur pa'o// rnyog pa med pacing rnam
41b4(phal chen): pa dang shin tu gsol ba'o// bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o// bdag gaM zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o// chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// nang ngan mi gnas pa ma yin pa'o// phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o// ma skyes
41b5(phal chen): pa'o dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o// zhi zhing gnas med pa'o// brtson pa med pa'o// 'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnasapa'o// dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad la 'gags pa'o// rang
41b6(phal chen): bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsol ba'o// yongs su dag pa'o// dmigs pa dang yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o// chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// 'dod pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags
41b7(phal chen): dang bral bas dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o// chos kyi dbyangs kun nas mi zad pa'o// 'du shes kyi rnams pa thams cad kyi rnam par thams cad kyi tshad med pa dang bral ba'o// 'du' byas dang 'dus/ 
41b8(phal chen): ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o// tshig gi lam gas brjod tu med pa'i mthar thugs pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul lo// mi zad pa dang chags med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o// ye shes sngon tu 'gro ba'o// stobs bcu/ 
42a1(phal chen): thatha ca kyis rnam par dag 'o// zangs 'das papa thams cad du chos nig med 'thams cad kyi mnga'i ba mod du phyin pa brnyes pa'o// rmom med la chab ba'i 'byung banas dang 'dzid du byung bar/ byos kyi tshu thams cad la dgongs 'gyur
42a2(phal chen): bar thos pa med pa'ong shing gi drung du dogs papa dang / byom kyi bra dang drung 'byung lda pa ma lus pa thams cad la gdas rten cing mi ga yol sams pa med pa'i ye shes kyir tu ga'inas pa/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyis na
42a3(phal chen): thug pa/ zag pa zed yongasu zad bathugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag par mtha' mi zad pas klas pa chos chags med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu nyam
42a4(phal chen): par bzhag pa dus gsum thams cad bsgrubs pa med par 'byung ba sem/ sa can thams cad kyi dus gsum gi sems dang / spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs bskal pa gcig gis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni/ 
42a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gi chos brgyad po'o// gzhan yang sangs brgyas bcos rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o
42a6(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i yongs su grub pa'i bsku'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i bsku'o// khams gsum pas gos med pa'i sku'o// brten pa'i bskus rnam par dmyigs pa'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran
42a7(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis brlabs bsku'i rang bzhin yang dag par bston pa'o// bde ba' med pa dang rdzun pa med pa'i sku mnyam par nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o// chos kyi bzhud pa dang byon pa med pa'i bsku'o// 'dus ma byas pas 'jig rten pa med kyi/ 
42b1(phal chen): bsku'o// mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rjes kyi bsku'i rang bzhin no// yul ni mi gnas pa dang / phyogs ni mi gnas pa dang / phyogs ni myi gnas pa'i sku'o// ma lus par thams cad kyi lus thams cad kyis lus kyi
42b2(phal chen): 'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no// lus thams cad du yongs su gzhal ba'i sku'i sna tshogasu rnams par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi bsku'i tshul gis
42b3(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba'o// ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no// sku'i yongs su 'jed du gyur pa'o// chos kyi dbyings rnam par tha dad pa med shin tu bsten pa'i bsku'o// kham+ba ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par gengs par kun tu khyab pa'i/ 
42b4(phal chen): sku'i rang bzhin no// mi g.yo ba mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o// yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i bar du brjod pa'i bsku'o// sems gi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul/ 
42b5(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba'i sku'o// 'gag pa yang ma yin ma 'gags pa yang ma yin bas 'dul ba ston pa'i bsku'o// yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag bA 'byung ba'i shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o// chos thams cad sangs rgyas
42b6(phal chen): kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i sku'o// rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgrubs pa med 'thar thug pa'i sku'o// thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos kyi thams cad thugs su chud pa'i bslu'o// dzad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos
42b7(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi rnam par dag cing 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra bsdu ba mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas yis tha~Md kyi rjesu 'brang zhing dag par gzhon par thug su chud pa'i sku
42b8(phal chen): ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i yis tha~Md kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhing yang dag par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dag pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom/ 
43a1(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni ye shes mnyam pa med pa'i mnyam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad thugs su chud pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o// mngon par grub pa'i spyod pa khyad/ 
43a2(phal chen): bar du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// tha dad pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub se/ sa
43a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud pa'o// smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog pa'o// spyod pa thams cad minyam pa med pas yong su rdzogs
43a4(phal chen): par byas pa'o// spyod pa'i bstobs la thub par dka' rang ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba'o// spyod pa thams cad kyis rnam nga bar dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pas rgyun dma' ba med pa'o// / 
43a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med par 'gyur ba'o// ting 'dzin thams cad kyis yongs su spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o// lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa yin no// lam gyi yul med pa'o// lam thams
43a6(phal chen): cad la rab tu bzhugs pa'o// ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'i bag tsha ba med pa'i mnga' bas chos char 'bebs pa'i 'khor ldan pa'o// dge ba bris pa dang ma dris pa la rjesu mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul bston pa mkhyen
43a7(phal chen): pa'o// mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yang dag par spyod pa rnams la 'phrin las gsum yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgom pas rnyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
43a8(phal chen): thams cad bskyed pa'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mdzad pa thams cad kyi bsam gis mi khyab pa'o// chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen pa cing gzigs pas/ 'jig/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob
43b1(phal chen): ba'o// dus gsum yangs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba snyen mtha' dang dpung med pa la ma lus par 'khyen pa'o// 'jig rten gi las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir phra ba'i ye shes thug su chud pas 'jig rten gi kham/ 
43b2(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bsku blangs pa thams cad thugs su nung pa'i ye shes kyis yig med pa'i chos
43b3(phal chen): thugs su nud pa'o// ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bye ba dang / yig thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pa thug su chung ba'o// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis dge ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin/ 
43b4(phal chen): tu sems can thams cad kyi lus dang skye 'ched ji lta bar thu dgasu bskyed pa cig ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong du chud par bston pa 'khyen pa'o// chos thams cad kyi don tu chos thams cad yongs su btang ba
43b5(phal chen): zhing rim gror byas pas thugasu chud pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par yul tu 'gyur ba'o// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul tu 'gyur ba'o// 'jig datus gsum thams cad la thugs skad cig gis
43b6(phal chen): chags pa med par 'khyen cing thug su chung ba'i yul dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lus par 'gyur ba'o// 'jigs pa med par 'dul bar thams cad yul tu 'gyur ba'o// thams cad kyi rjes
43b7(phal chen): su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o// sa 'tshams med cing thug pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams sangs rgyas pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa
43b8(phal chen): tus gsum tu brjod pa la ma lus pa thams cad thugasu skad cig gis 'khyen cing thugasu chud pa'o// sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma chad pa'o// 'jig rten gi khams kyi rnam par thams cad mu med pa'o// tus
44a1(phal chen): gsum gyi rnam pa thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi khru mchog gi mthu byung ba'i rnam par thams cad la tshad med pa'o// zhes bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma lus pa ste/ de dag thos
44a2(phal chen): cad la lhag par med pa'i sangs rgyas pas ye shes kyi ye shes med par spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas/ 'byung ba thams cad du thugasu chud pa dang / mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun 'chad med pa de la sangs rgyas
44a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyug pa'i bskus mtha' dang dbung med par spyod pa yin chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis spyod pa dang mthar dbung med pa'i spyod pa yin/ zugs rje chen pos sbyor ba yin/ dus thams
44a4(phal chen): cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad brla ston pa la spyod pas mtha' dang dpung ma dra bar spyod pa yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs brgyas kyi mthu bo che chen pos stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan
44a5(phal chen): gyi chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu' bo che chen pos stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gi chos rnams te/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / 
44a6(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa mi nus pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
44a7(phal chen): mi thos pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngo par dga' ldan gi tshe ji srid par bzhugs nas 'jo bam+bu mngan pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
44a8(phal chen): rnams ni zla ba bcu ldan pa bstan pa thogs pa med mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'byung bar bgyis pa'i thugs kyi mngon par 'gyur 'byung ba thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi
