268b2(phal chen): brtul dang bral ba'i snang bas dang ldan pa'i 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo 'tshar rmad tu byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo 'tshar rmad tu byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
268b3(phal chen): snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa'i rnams la 'byung ba'i 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di ni dbang yang dag par mthong nas snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ 
268b4(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa 'byam klas na thab mo dang / yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' ba stobs kyi che ba nyid yongs su dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ 
268b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// yid gnyis dang theg/ tsom tu 'gyur ba'i ming dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang / the tsom med pa'i phyir bston pa bdud 'dul ba'i phyir bston to// bdud sde yongs
268b6(phal chen): su smin pa'i phyir bdud 'dul bar ston to// thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun tu nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' la thub pa med pa'i yongs su bstan
268b7(phal chen): ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// sems can mos shing spros par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dud 'dul ba bston to// snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang
268b8(phal chen): nub sems dpa' bdud kyi las la 'das pa yongs su bstan pA dpyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyi nyams smad cing bstobs med par bya ba'i yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du dang byams pa'i stobs yang
268b9(phal chen): dag par bstan pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu chos kyi nyid rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba bston to// 
269a1(phal chen): kye brgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi dbang mthong bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 'dung 'dul ba ston to// rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto/ 
269a2(phal chen): mngon par brdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye nga rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' ba rnams bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
269a3(phal chen): pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams
269a4(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa yin no/ chos bka' ba'i tshogs cad yang dag par brtsags pa yin/ chos snang ba rnams dpyad par bya ba thams cadashin tu rnam par phyin pa yin/ 'jig rten gi rnams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ 
269a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyis rlabs pa yin/ 'das pa rang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsku gdung dang thugasung dang thug
269a6(phal chen): rnam par mi rtog pa yan/ skad cig gcig gis dus sum rnam par 'tshang brgya pa yan/ shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dza'i na kyang rab tu thob pa ya ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstobs dang ldan pa
269a7(phal chen): yin te/ ji ltar gnas dang gnas ma ya ni zag pa zad par shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang
269a8(phal chen): chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcus po de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
269a9(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ni chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ mami 'jigs pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i rjes su bsgrags
269b1(phal chen): pa dang / bden pa bzhi 'tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i bsgrub pa'i med pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' ba'i 'gyur ba dang / thog ma med bcing bsdug bsngal bsal
269b2(phal chen): zhing 'byin pa dang snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos bsnyon par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
269b3(phal chen): lag dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyod pas bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag las stsogs pa rnams pa tshad med par de bzhin gshegs
269b4(phal chen): pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo des ni sems can gzhan gyi sems can gyi rgyud thams cad la chos kar po'i
269b5(phal chen): rnam pa bcu thogs pa med pa dag mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs shugs dang // snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad
269b6(phal chen): mi gtong ba dang ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin tu mi 'khrug pa dang / dus su ma shes par bya bar rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus
269b7(phal chen): kyi dbang zil kyis mi gnon pa dang / tshig gi dbang gnyis par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshag bzhin du khong tu chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
269b8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyal kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par 'dzad
269b9(phal chen): zan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'du
270a1(phal chen): byed ma rig pa yongs su bston pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang brag tshab thams cad dpa' bral ba yang du
270a2(phal chen): par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi las la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi bsku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mi ldog par yongs
270a3(phal chen): su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod 'gur mi rung zhing / dbang bskur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad bsgyu ma lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po de
270a4(phal chen): pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pa pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye brgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs
270a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phros las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su brdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ na 'dul ba thams cad yongs su 'dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa'atha/ 
270a6(phal chen): mas cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa che na po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag yang dag par gzigs nas de bzhin
270a7(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam par med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i yongs su ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag
270a8(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi bsgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o// don cha med 'a khong du chud par 'gyur ro// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smom
270a9(phal chen): lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur pa nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na
270b1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi ma yin no// 
270b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi bsgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas gdon mi za ba'i me tog bsgo
270b3(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gi lam yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral bar 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa chos thams
270b4(phal chen): cad kyi bsgo snang bar byed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten gi khams dang 'jig rten gi khams dang las 'das pa'i dge' ba'i brtsa ba rnams par 'phel bar byed pa rim gror byas te/ mnyam par bya'o blang bar bya'o// yongs
270b5(phal chen): su bzung bar bya'o// yongs su bzung ba nas kyang nges par rtogs/ pa'i bsgo yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par sgrub pa la brtson par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dang / 
270b6(phal chen): rnams la bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gon po ma yi na no// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi bsgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bston pa'i tshe/ 
270b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad med pa grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams g.yos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
270b8(phal chen): kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsol bar 'gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dger bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa kye bya'i bu legs so// legs
270b9(phal chen): ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi bsgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnams par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi
271a1(phal chen): sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi bsgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gi khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang / 
271a2(phal chen): thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams par 'phel bar byed pa bstan pa 'di/ rgyal ba'i sras khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs shing byung
271a3(phal chen): ba ste/ rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis chos kyi byin brlabs dang / mthus mos par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad nges kyis kyang mngon par bsngags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngagaso// kye rgyal ba'i
271a4(phal chen): sras khyod kyis kyang rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
271a5(phal chen): pos/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur ltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyi'i thams cad la lngas/ chos kyis dbyangs thams cad ltas/ te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// grangs rnams de
271a6(phal chen): dgra bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong tu rtul shugs dka' spyad pa/ gang rna mos de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa// dpe 'a zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byas// 
271a7(phal chen): gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/ gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar bar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang / 
271a8(phal chen): yon tan mi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' byed spyod mchog 'dzes par bsngos par bya// gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum dang las dang nyon mongs bdud dang dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag bdud g.yos 'gro ba kun las
271a9(phal chen): 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po// gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs myos bral bsam zhing rab zhi ba/ 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ gang dag bdud g.yo'o/ 
271b1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun las rgyal te/ thams cad dbang byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dag las sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu gnas dang ston// sems skyes gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad bston/ de dag yon tan/ 
271b2(phal chen): sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya// srid pa'i rgyan na sems can sdug bsngal nyan cacing ske dang dga' bas gzar ba dang // 'chi dang ma ngan dag gas gtsor shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ de
271b3(phal chen): dag thams cad dga' bar bya bya'i snying rje brgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog dgod pa// de dag yon tan shin tu dge' ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par bgyis/ spyan dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar byas
271b4(phal chen): bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtson shing rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams pa dang / dga' ba'i chos la rtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas skal brgyar yang smad pa spyod pa// de dag ldan pa yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis
271b5(phal chen): de dag nyon// gang dag byang chub nyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus pa skyems pa// gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshor phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur nyer pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phyir phan phyir rtog bdag gi bdel
271b6(phal chen): ba mi chol byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub de dag kun gyi spyod mcho ga rjod par bya// rgya mtsho chu thigs bgrangs pare res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag du ma stong
271b7(phal chen): du brjod byas kyang / dpa' tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bsnun par mi nus 'on kyang go// sems can phan pa'i don tu sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang zag 'gro ba rnams phyir
271b8(phal chen): dge' ba kun 'dzani kar po 'phel byed kyang // mtho ris mi'i sems par sems med mi gnas tshol dngos por yongs su mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas/ don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab zhing stong ste/ 
271b9(phal chen): bston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnam ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad mtsho ba yin// byams pa rlan pa yani snying rje rtse ba dga' ba sdong po rngan pa sdom pa ste/ zla ba ye shes bri med tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can// 
273a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'od kyi rab tu brgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa// de dag pad mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang // sa bon mos pas bzhi bsam byams dang snying brje
273a2(phal chen): dag ni rtsa ba ste// sdong po shes rab thabs ni yan lag lcug mu dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga// bsam gdan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya khyod
273a3(phal chen): de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khyabs// rims kyis bkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yid bde' ba rnams ni rkang pa ste/ dran pa sgran pa spyod mchog shes rab go yi ni ral pa rnams par grol bar dgo'// spong
273a4(phal chen): don dam lus dang phyag yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mi gnyis te/ de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdun ste rab tu skrag par byed/ 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi zad 'khya/ 
273a5(phal chen): gyur te// bdud kyi byams btang rkun por byas pas zin cing rti/ mug dngos gyur pa// lam ni ri rab ston mi mkhas sems ca/ rten mthong nas dpon mkhas de dag/ lam gi mthar khrid 'jigs pa
273a6(phal chen): med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu dgod// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa sna tshogs nad pas cing // yun rings nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba/ 
273a7(phal chen): sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs nad pa kun gsol zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad bcu dam pa dag kyang ston/ rgyal po lta bu de dag 'a khor rnams dgar byed 'grel chos ston pa/ sdig
273a8(phal chen): ngas la dgelal y-i tsang songs rgyas yon nams kyang chol cig ces/ ngaganyis dang gyis kyi yul lce mkhyen mi shes dang por nga sgyur ba/ btsunen+ya bya chub yan lag 'di na 'drung banas ri
273a9(phal chen): 'gro 'i gan pa nang// tshus rdzoms pa la ni su rgyang rgyan pa mishes 'od du zhes ra tshan/ me shes rna pa'i bu can nyon myos 'tsham shi rnams 'jas pa byed/ kyi / 
273b1(phal chen): 'byin mchog rnams pa de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba'i// 'khor lo mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol dgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'jom// ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu brgya chen ro dang ldan/ 
273b2(phal chen): byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' brlabs mtha' yul rnam par dgra cing lnga bsam dgel/ de dag de dge ye shes rgya mtsho
273b3(phal chen): mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gtan mngon par shes 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam skul ba// 
273b4(phal chen): gang dag de dag nye bar 'phrad ba shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar gyur// de dang de dag yon tan rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis ltas// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mchog mtshungs shing 'dra ste rtul shugs
273b5(phal chen): thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams ca/ da mthun pa'i spyod lam bsam pa mi byed de/ bdud dang sem/ sa can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa/ 
273b6(phal chen): de dang de dag 'jig rten dam panyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba dag las bzlog par byams pa'i sprin rnams 'dus// snying rje bstug po rig pa klog can rgyun ldog pa thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bani dbyings
273b7(phal chen): drug tu 'byin par srog pa drug/ yang dug shes da tshu khyemam yan log brgyad dang ldan de thar ba'i sa bya dran pa dag ma lan/ den pa sa ni lam mtshan pani ste na hU~M dag ra hU~M
273b8(phal chen): btsun pa/ srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis ma thul khyong khyer chos nyide dag tu ston// thams cad sakhyen gyis sems mchog shing la rab tu 'jug rngu 'phrul pa'i gang ba gan/ bshog thams cad kyi stobs s+ho
273b9(phal chen): rol gnon mthu gabos dang snying rje mi ni gnyis yin no// stongs pa de dag 'gro ba kun thub med mkha' lding dbang po brag shul 'bru/ srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing ldamani rnams kyang myangan 'dar ba'i mchog la dana'i
274a1(phal chen): tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer 'phreng ba 'dzes// 'od snang kun 'chang nyon mongs 'joms zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed// stobs dang dbang po
274a2(phal chen): dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su brgyas byed// de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung // chos dbyings rnams par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis lta na 'dzes pa
274a3(phal chen): ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skad ma 'bri ba dag ni zil gyis mnan// sems can gyi khyud rnams mthong nas srad pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnams par ston// de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro
274a4(phal chen): la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam yang mtha'// chos kyi dbang 'gro ba ku/ ngan la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyanashes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen brgyur gnas
274a5(phal chen): pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis lta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyas pa de dag chos kyi gnas yin te// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon
274a6(phal chen): mdzes las 'das kun dbang po// byams pa sdang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu the dad lung bston chos sgras go bar byed// de dag tshangs pa lta bur rlom/ 
274a7(phal chen): dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyiri mi ldog 'gyur blo gros che'ichang rnam thog pa mda' dang tha dad la/ chos kyi dbang po dbang skur 'jig
274a8(phal chen): rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dge 'jig rten de ba // na mkha'i dbyings lta bur dngos dang bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam gsal ba// 'gro ba kun tu/ 
274a9(phal chen): bya ba nyams lem chu mchog ni la yang gnas pa gnas pa ste/ 'gro ba kun tu sbyor ba dkar mkhar ba de dag rab tu mi gnas pa de dang dag ye shes dge ba zhing dag pas shes rab na mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra'o// de dag nin
274b1(phal chen): tu brgyas rkyen thangs ldanas ltar 'gro ba kun gyis g.yos// nu 'dra de dang dreg byams dang dang rje nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu stsal// de dang de dag ye shes sems ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa gas ldan
274b2(phal chen): bston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu brgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ba ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dngul yang sel// de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta bur 'jom// de dang de
274b3(phal chen): yon tan kun gyi 'brang ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// ston pa de dag nor bu rin mtshungs 'dra dang spyod pa kun gyi gdug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse// 'phreng ba la
274b4(phal chen): zur de dag smon lam bangs shing 'jig rten 'gel gnas// de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam brang dag drin bri bzhim// de dang ngag 'jig rten gsum na chos me shes kyis ni nga gcugs dag/ gdugs 'a
274b5(phal chen): de dag stobs kyis re res nyon mongs rtul las skyo bar byed// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag brgyal ba rgyal mtshan snyol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun
274b6(phal chen): du 'phags/ gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ theg pa 'dra ba rgya mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin/ de dang de dag rab 'dul dbang
274b7(phal chen): kho lta bu yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer ning 'jig rten gsum las 'da'/ klu'i dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bab/ de dag 'gro ba'i nang nas me tog
274b8(phal chen): u du 'bar ba mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing 'drad kyi sde rnams 'dul/ mi ldog 'khor lo de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsung / de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa
274b9(phal chen): sel cing lam yan ston/ de dang de dag chu brlung lta bur yon tan dang cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro/ de dang de dag zab pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro bar sgrol ka/ gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam btab pa ye shes gang chen mtsho tho byed/ 
275a1(phal chen): de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bu skye 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la dgod// de dag bskyed mos tshal gi dga' brtse zhing grol la yang dag spyod pa sngon/ de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med/ 
275a2(phal chen): khang dag mkhas// de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gang ri lta bur da dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun sel// 
275a3(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'drabru de ltar rgya 'ongs te mkhas pa de dag gnas pa de nyid gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas
275a4(phal chen): kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba bskyed pa de dang dag bston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la bston// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad ma khyen gyi spyod yul shes// de dang de dag med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun nas/ 
275a5(phal chen): thub pa med pa/ de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams / cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang bston// gang dang gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzu/ gas dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs
275a6(phal chen): kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song zhing mini dbyangs rjes su song ba yin// gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par shes bral yod bya ba thams cad bston// de dag thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis rnams
275a7(phal chen): pa kun tu brjod par mi nus so// gang dag 'di 'dra yon tan thob cing dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing yod pa dang / med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba'i ye shes mngon gsum can// thams cad ye shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye/ 
275a8(phal chen): shes de la gnas ma yin// de dag spyod la 'jug pa yin 'od 'jig rten dga' byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po bzhin pa lta bur rab brtags nas/ mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin blarlabs kyis
275a9(phal chen): smon la ma thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ sprul pa'i ye shes bsgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog rab ston pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid la can rtse gcig mnyam pa mnyams med pa legs pas grags// lus gan
275b1(phal chen): la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu bsngon// sems med yid kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston// khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs cig rnam brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag/ 
275b2(phal chen): gis sgra ba skad ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod// nyon mongs rgyud 'byung lus dang bral yang sems cad rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te// brjod pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston// 
275b3(phal chen): de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal mkhas mtshungs yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya ba sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston byed de/ 
275b4(phal chen): 'gro ba kun thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang mthun gsan pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med// rang gi lus la mkha' dang 'bras grol sems la gnas chags pa rnam pa ste// / 
275b5(phal chen): mkhas pas kun la dbang po sgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu sto na byed cing // me tog bri dang phyug ba phye ma sel snyan gdugs dang ba dan pa rgyan mtshan rnams/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchod pas rkang gnyis rtso
275b6(phal chen): bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing // mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'ud byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu bsngon// mkhas pas de dag brgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod brgyal ba zhabs kyi 'khor lo kun na
275b7(phal chen): snang zhing mtshungs ka pa med// de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu byed chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting nge 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing / blo dang ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldan pa sngon byed zad pa med/ 'gro ba sgyu mar ltar brtogs shes
275b8(phal chen): rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sgyu ma lta bur chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba kun la bston/ sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin du brgya chen sems kyang rab tu bston/ 'gro ba thams cad la ni
275b9(phal chen): 'du shes phra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba bston// la lar 'gro ba byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang bston/ la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims
276a1(phal chen): bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams// la lar tshangs pa'i lam bsdug kha cig tu ni spyod pa'i mchog kyang rab tu bston/ mkhas pa rtogs med dag la la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa bston// la lar skye ba gcig
276a2(phal chen): gas thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la lar rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba/ khrag khrig mang po'i zhing tu mya ngan 'da' yang spyod lam ldog pa med pa mya ngan de dag ni/ la ler
276a3(phal chen): lha dbang brgya byini lha dang bcas par la lar tshangs par 'gyur/ de dag la lar lha'i bu mor brgyas pa la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston// la lar dge slong zhi zhing yid la las rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ la las chos kyi phra bar 'jug gi
276a4(phal chen): ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston// la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar gcig pur spyod pa bstan ka dka' thub can tu 'gyur/ la lar 'dod pa'i long skyong rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa med// 
276a5(phal chen): la lar mya ngan 'da' tshe yis dang / la lar rgan dang byis pa ston/ de dag spyod pa bsam mi khyab na skye ba myos par gyur te/ yid gnyis rnyed para'agyur/ la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal
276a6(phal chen): 'gro gnas pa ston/ la lar mngal bzhugs/ la lar khru mchog sangs rgyas/ la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ la lar skye la lar mya na las 'das pa/ la lar bzo la yang rab tu ston/ la lar bud med
276a7(phal chen): tshogs kyi dpung gnas/ la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub shing drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing / la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su/ la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing rnam bye ba
276a8(phal chen): rgya khyab 'bro bar bston byed kyang / byang chub don tu spyod pa dag gi tshogs/ rnams las kyang phyir mi ldog pa yin no// bskal pa grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag khyu mchog sems gcig ska
276a9(phal chen): pa brgyar yang de bzhin par byed de/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtogs pa'i yul rnams thams cad bston// rtsogs med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu bston// gang phyir rgyal ba nye bar rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs
276b1(phal chen): med kun na bzhugs pas na/ 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba'i ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brtul cig steng tu mthong // sangs rgyas zhing bsgrub dang / sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyud tshul rnams kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa/ 
276b2(phal chen): khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes/ sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams de dag/ 'gro ba cig
276b3(phal chen): dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu bston par byed/ bslab pa'i 'di phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnam ni ston pa byed/ dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po brtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ 'gro bar skal
276b4(phal chen): ba yod dang med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bskor bar byed/ dbang po re re yang dbang po thams cad rnam par phan tshun gnas pa dang / dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes de ltar khams
276b5(phal chen): dang mos pa dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang phyi ma'i sems skyod nga ltar ba'ang de bzhin te/ sems mig gyi spyong ba'i pha rol phyin
276b6(phal chen): kyang dro dang 'gro ba yod pa min/ ma nor shes nas 'gro kun la chos kyi dam pa bston pa byed/ de ltar sems kyang sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems cig la ni khong du chud/ byang chub mchog
276b7(phal chen): tu kun khyen rnams sangs rgyas/ sems can gyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnam par phye rang gi shes pa'i sa rtogs gyur nas/ sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu shol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang dgod/ rdzu 'phrul
276b8(phal chen): mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes la kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ sems can skyed cig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing phyogs rnams thams cad 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang skur 'gro zhing bskal ba
276b9(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig zang byed kyang / sgra rgyu dashin du 'phra rab gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med/ 'tshe ba'i don tu bsgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba'i kun la bston byed kyang // 
277a1(phal chen): sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thams cad shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa'i phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen// 
277a2(phal chen): khyab par byas shes rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkhas la rgyu zhing mdzes la shing tu 'phags pa rnams// ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'bres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnaMs
277a3(phal chen): ma 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang du dgro bdag dang 'bres ma yin/ la la gnyid log lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ le ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad pa rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/ de ltar chos nyid
277a4(phal chen): rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes su rtogs pa bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/ skad cig gcig la skal ba bye bar zad mi 'gyur// ri'i dbang po ri sul ga/ nus pa'i 'jig rten dag tu mnyam par thos pa'i sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'bri bar
277a5(phal chen): brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med/ de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ sgyid zla dag gi
277a6(phal chen): smig rgyug g.yos la ji ltar sems can de dag chur ni 'du shes nas/ de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur bdud tu med cing brjod pas je bsgom rnam par 'phel/ de ltar mkhas pas mthar la bzhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs rnams// 
277a7(phal chen): ri nas shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes med cing phyi'i zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ gzugs ni bu ba lta bur chu mchog sngon te nor bcu'i chu bur rag las 'du shes byas chub skye shing dag dang 'dra/ sems ni sgyum 'dra sku/ 
277a8(phal chen): byaskye byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu bston de ltar phung po dgo ngapa sngon kyang dbang sgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med// skye 'arjed stong pa'i rang ba zhi dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings margas
277a9(phal chen): dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tu tshul zhi ba las bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu bsten// de ltar chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston par byed kyang gnas pa med/ 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba
277b1(phal chen): med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa nyon mongs rgyu las byung las sdug bsngal de ltar rnam gsum du/ rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa'i yang dag don dam bu ma'i lam tu dngos po med la gnas
277b2(phal chen): pa rab tu bston// bskad cig gcig las dus gsum khong du chud kyang bskad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston/ 'dod pa'i dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum
277b3(phal chen): gyi spyod pa dang rab tu ldan zhing thams cad gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid gcig la theg pa gsum tu rnam par dgod pa de bzhin bston/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang pha rol phyin
277b4(phal chen): mkhas pa mos pa dang nyon mongs rnams 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob par 'gyur/ mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas dran nyon mongs zhi bar gnas pa dag rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigapa pa
277b5(phal chen): med// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog pa'i stong 'gro ba/ kun tu ston gsum chos bzhed/ nyon mongs zag pa ldan cing skyes mi mnga'/ bya ba'ang mnyes par gyur pa med/ 'byung bas thugs su chud
277b6(phal chen): pas ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ 'di'i gnasal rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med/ 'gro ba mi 'gro lam las g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba ste
277b7(phal chen): mochos dang rtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par byed pa ye shes gang tu yang nyams pa med/ thams cad mkhyen badzad dus gsum kun la mngon gsum 'khyen mnga' ba/ 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs rbas/ 
277b8(phal chen): pa mdo brnyas pa/ chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog/ de dag yon tan mang pos rgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya// de dag spyod pa bdag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ 'on kyang
277b9(phal chen): sa lo ji ltar sa la rtul 'bra' ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam rjod par bya/ sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo 'tshar 'du shes gnas pa rnaMs/ spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus rten pas
278a1(phal chen): rnam gnon cing // tshul khrims mi g.yon dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed// nga lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag zhug
278a2(phal chen): sems dang zhing la sems pa bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnaMs thob cing yang dag don gyis rgal/ bstan pa mtshungs med sems
278a3(phal chen): can gis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang rgya yang / sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzab pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed/ snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog sten byang chub dam pa spyod pa byed dang ldan/ rtson pas phyin
278a4(phal chen): rtogs rab tu mkhas shing bskyo ba'i pha rol phyin pa gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa med thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos ston byed/ yon/ 
278a5(phal chen): tan thob byed spobs dang ldan po de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchogatu gyur/ dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pa mnyam pa med pa'i se/ nyams kyi 'grug sgra sgrogs// ye shes mchog dang sprul pa bsgrub cing
278a6(phal chen): byang chub zhi pa nye bar 'gro/ mkhos pas de dag 'byam klas byinarlabs shes pas dbyigs phyini rab tu thob/ zab la gnas pas brtan pa ra 'gro ba'i gnas shing nem nur gsal bas 'khas pa rnams/ ye shes
278a7(phal chen): sam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas rnams phye pha rol phyin/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la bzhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol cing / mngon par shes pas rnam
278a8(phal chen): par rjen/ rig pa snang ldan grol nyon mongs bral 'gro skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang 'dzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston/ pa po/ 'gro ba kun la brgyan rnams du mas rab tu bston kyang ses
278a9(phal chen): la g.yo ba med/ rnamam bzhin du shes pas bstan parab tu shes shing pha rol phyin gyur bas// mkhas pas dag ni sbyangs pa'i byeng nu phyag sang ba'i ye shes gos/ 'gro ba dag dang mi'i dungs phung med tu
278b1(phal chen): mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'bra/ ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don tu spyod pa rgya chen spyod// de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtson la rab tu mkhas
278b2(phal chen): shing 'gro kun thub pa med/ byang chub mchog tu la bzod pa dang spyod pakyang btsun mo 'khor kyang bston// chags tha med par 'byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgan byin/ stong gsum bstan pa las bzod par dra ba yang
278b3(phal chen): bkye zhing yang dgra bskul zhing 'byung gyur nas/ dud rnams 'dulo te byang nub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi ga'akhor lo rab tu stor/ sangs rgyas yang dag tu rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzud / ga/ 
278b4(phal chen): gis mkhas pa bye ba pa rnams par rtse zhing yang dag dang ldan 'byung 'gyur nas// sems can bye ba phrag sdong du mas sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun tu sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin pa'i// de dag// 
278b5(phal chen): gi ni skyong ba mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par phye/ zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig rgyar 'dzin
278b6(phal chen): te/ lag pa khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas pas phye nas ji ltar ba'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gdon pa med// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi brgyan rnaMm
278b7(phal chen): bar tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang bsku gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu bston/ mkhas pas ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus nud par bston/ 'phral zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod pa
278b8(phal chen): 'gyur ba med bya de yang bston// 'khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i bdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhol ma byed/ zhing rnams de dag rtul du byas te// 
278b9(phal chen): de bzhini gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de/ de'i rjes su rtog pa zag par gyur kyang 'jigs pa de dag mi zad par de/ 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed gang / grang yang nor bu'i 'od dang / gang dang ga
279a1(phal chen): rnams lha dang 'od/ mang po de dag 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig sku gcig khung nas 'gyed/ 'jig rten kun gyi mdo ngan song bsdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ 'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs
279a2(phal chen): skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// khyu mchog de dag tshig gis rab tu rjod pas sgra rnaMs thams cad tshang bar rjod/ srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid tu 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing 'gu bar 'gyur/ brgyan pa'i bstan pa chos kyi
279a3(phal chen): rnam pa ji snyed pa/ khyu mchog de dag chag cig rab tu brjod pas thams cad de las thob par 'gyur/ yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/ gang yang ma 'ong ba dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das
279a4(phal chen): kha ston// khyu mchog gi ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnams pa tha dad bston pa byed/ 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god/ mdas la ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i
279a5(phal chen): rgyal ba ji snyed la// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dag sgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston// skul ba'i byin gyis rlabs la shes bI mkhas pas de dag 'gro ba ji snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus
279a6(phal chen): la gnas pa mang yang med// lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed ye rjod pa'i/ 'gro ba'i kun gyi lus rnams bsdus shing brgya byid tshangs pa 'ji ga rten 'gon po rnams/ de bzhin lha dang mi rnams gang yang nyan thos rang
279a7(phal chen): rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa lta/ sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i spyod pa'i ngag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes phra ba rab tu 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa'i rnams/ thams cad shes shing
279a8(phal chen): byini rlabs byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ 'du shes dra ba rnam bsgom blo ldan 'du shes phra ba 'jig rten rnams la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam
279a9(phal chen): khar 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa shin tu ston// de dag gang la 'jig rten sa med pa dang yul med de dag bya ba ston kyang lta ba lhur len ma yin gzhan phyir dgod pa rab tu ston pa byed de dag thams cad bsam pa ji snyed yang dag 'jug
279b1(phal chen): lus nam khar lta bu rig dang ye shes chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi rtsogang tshul khrims spos kyi 'byung ba rang tu zhi bar gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ chos kyi go la rang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yang bzhin nor bu ste/ bden
279b2(phal chen): gshegs kun gyis ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thabs la gnas pa pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te 'khor lo glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta rte chags med 'gro shes rab 'gro// 
279b3(phal chen): shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo bzang po bsdud pa rnams ba zhi bo khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin tu mkhas pa'i blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur// khyim pa stong ste ting nge 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin
279b4(phal chen): khyams dang snying rje go cha'o// shes rab ral gyi yin te gron pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba 'da' yang yin/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams ni bdugs te ye shes/ brgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i ston gyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde
279b5(phal chen): rnams 'dus 'joms gzung ni ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes ma tsholus shes rab shing / me tog byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnga ste rgyal rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan brgyan/ stong pa rnam thar brgyan brdzang bu yin te/ 
279b6(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin/ thar pa bdud rtsi bzang ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyi rtsi/ de 'dra spyod pa de dag yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong tu 'phags/ gang gis skal ba bye ba khrag khrig sto
279b7(phal chen): phrag tu mar yongs su mi skyo bar/ ston pa mchod cing rnam par dag zhi la/ rtson pas 'gro ba'i ye shes mchog la dgod/ kho na ma tho ba med de dag shes rab gnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed/ zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur klan
279b8(phal chen): re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus par 'gyur la// bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang sla'i sa gzhal te zad par byed par nus srid de// skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang ba tshul nus srid kyi/ sangs rgyas sras rnams
279b9(phal chen): kyi sems ni bgrang tshul nus srid kyi/ sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni skal brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhing yon tan rnam dag thos par 'dod cing gong tu gzhal 'dod dang / gang zhig sdug bsngal rnam las 'gro
280a1(phal chen): pa thams cad bde ba 'god pa dang / gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta bu bstan pa'i sems gi yon tan bslabs par bya'o// 'jig rten las 'dres pa'i le'u
280a2(phal chen): sde bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / bam po// / bcom ldan 'das mnyan tu yod pa'i mdze ta'i tshal skyabs med pa la zas byin gyi kun dgu' ra ba'i nang / pho brang rtseg
280a3(phal chen): pa chen po can na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang // 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes dang brtson pa de pa'i ye shes dang / chags dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / 
280a4(phal chen): nyim dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / bri ma med pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i ye shes dang / ri rangab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / 
280a5(phal chen): me tog rgyal mtshan dang / bri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal ma tshan dang / 'dzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang / chub sems dpa' rin gzi rjid/ dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi rjid
280a6(phal chen): dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi rjid ye shes snang ba'i gzi rjid dang / kun snang dpal gyi gzi rjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i gzi rjid dang / 
280a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi
280a8(phal chen): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i meg dang / rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas lta ba'i
280a9(phal chen): mig dang / ud pa la'i mig dang / rdo rje mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gcod pan dang / chos kyi dbyangs snang ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i gcod pan dang / phyogs
280b1(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i gcod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'byung ba'i gcod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i gcod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i gcod pan dang / zil
280b2(phal chen): gyis mi gnon pa'i med pa'i gcod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i ting nge 'dzin pa'i gcod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i kun nas snang ba'i gcod pan dang / byang chub ses
280b3(phal chen): dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab
280b4(phal chen): tu sgrol ba'i rin po che mtsho gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od dang / dkyil 'khor rab tu byed pa'i nor bu rin pa chen 'grug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha did par dmigs
280b5(phal chen): 'i rin chen brgyal pos brgyan pa'i tsug phud dang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa spang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs
280b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi mang thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i gtsug phung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi
280b7(phal chen): bri ma me'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / brtul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'od dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang // 
280b8(phal chen): byang chub kyi dngal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / bad+ma'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang ba'i dbyangs
280b9(phal chen): dang / ri rab rgyal po'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po yongs su bsgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub
281a1(phal chen): sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad bsdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / yon tan gi tshogs 'phags
281a2(phal chen): ba dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun tu 'phags pa dang / kun tu 'phags pa dang / byams pa'i 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtsho 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa/ rgyud gyi gdug
281a3(phal chen): gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / na mkha'i dpal dang / ri
281a4(phal chen): po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i dpal dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i brgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i/ 
281a5(phal chen): dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dang dra po'i rgyal po'i dang / zhi ba'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo' ba'i dbang // po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems
281a6(phal chen): dpa' mchog gi dbang po rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho 'grug gi sgra dang / snyun gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos kyi snang ba'i dbyings dang / nam
281a7(phal chen): mamakha'i dbyangs kyi bsgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsgrogs pa'i sgra dang / sngon gi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom pa med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub se
281a8(phal chen): dpa' rini pa rtse'i glo dang / ye shes ri bo dang / nam pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu spang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos
281a9(phal chen): kyi byis su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stang tsam ste/ kun kyang byang nub sems dang 'akun du 'azang ba'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rnamabyam par 'byes
281b1(phal chen): bas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dod pas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa bya/ 
281b2(phal chen): ngol bsgrubs med pa'i mig gis dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong bas rgyun ma gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rang
281b3(phal chen): tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang / dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa'i chos kyi dbyings thed
281b4(phal chen): du 'od zer gyi bra bas rgyas par 'gyengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// nyon thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ 
281b5(phal chen): yang dag par mtha' mngon gsum tu gyur pa chos kyi rang bzhin la bzhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen tu 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs su gyur pa'i spyod pa yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i dang / 
281b6(phal chen): bcings pa'i rnam par grol chags pa med pa'i gnas la rten pa/ nam mkha'i la zhi ba ltar rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsom dang yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam tu zhugs
281b7(phal chen): pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu bzhugs pa dang / gsol ba btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan srung ba la zhugs
281b8(phal chen): la 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa khyad par ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs
281b9(phal chen): pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i la mkhas la/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtul gyi rgyun du byung ba/ mngon par gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
282a1(phal chen): la mngon par mos pa dang / yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam tu gyur/ 
282a2(phal chen): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le ges kyi spyad yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i me snyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge la ni dang / de bzhin gshi
282a3(phal chen): pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu' dang / de bzhin gshegs
282a4(phal chen): pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi legs par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgyal ba chen po la mos pa'i snang ba'i bar du thob pa dang / byang chub
282a5(phal chen): sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa thag shebs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu smon cing yang dag par bzhugs pa ma rto// gas par lha dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong tu chud
282a6(phal chen): pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa 'am/ rnam par gtog pa 'am/ gzu do ba 'am rnam par spyod pa 'am/ rnam par bsgoms pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par grol ba dang / rab tu brjod pa 'am/ sems can pha rol gyi/ 
282a7(phal chen): rgyud phyin par bya bar ma nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam par tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes rang sna tshogs kyi tshig dang / brdas
282a8(phal chen): tshogs su gyur pa dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa// dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam par dag pa/ gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems can bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan na/ de bzhin
282a9(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos padag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu zhugs pa lta bu 'am yang dag par bstan grangs/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa la'ang dag/ 
282b1(phal chen): dag par bston grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag blta'ang yang dag par ston grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sdom
282b2(phal chen): gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta bu'ang yang dag par sngan drang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par stan grang
282b3(phal chen): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyun yongs su dag pastan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'ang yang dag par bstan blang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul
282b4(phal chen): ba'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan brang / byang chu sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta bu'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgros rnams par grul
282b5(phal chen): ba yang dag par stan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'ja lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lnga bu yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
282b6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lte 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gi khams bdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lnga 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa
282b7(phal chen): tha nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer mnga' mdzad lnga'ang yang dag par bstan drang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar 'dzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi
282b8(phal chen): gnas su gshegs pa shing rnam par 'phrul pa 'dzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon tan zhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa
282b9(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon tan bston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta bu'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa
283a1(phal chen): lta ba'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan brang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
283a2(phal chen): le yongs su bstan pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta bur yang dag par bstan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par
283a3(phal chen): mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan brang / snyam pa dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems can gyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
283a4(phal chen): 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpa' med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i brgyan dang ldan pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa'i thugs rje chen po'i sngon tu 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen
283a5(phal chen): po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu pho brang brtsegs pa rgya chen po can/ yang dag mtha' dang dpung med par yangs shing rdo rje thugs pa rjed pa'i rgyal
283a6(phal chen): mtshan gyis sa'i bzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bra ba rab tu bkram pa rin po chen du ma'i me tog sil mas cha la bar gang ba nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos dam pas
283a7(phal chen): 'dzes par bkram pa dang / bye du rgya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnams par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin
283a8(phal chen): rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bskyod pa dang / sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su brgyas par 'byings pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par 'dzes
283a9(phal chen): ra byas pa dang / pha rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa bzhi stengs su brjod tu med pas brgyas pa dang / phyogs kun nas tha sras kyi 'phang ba nor bu rin po che brtsegs shing shin tu rnam par bye bas rab tu/ mdzes par kun nas gnas par
283b1(phal chen): mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba kun gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i brtul shin tu rnam par phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnas
283b2(phal chen): kyang chu zheng du kun tu brgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa bzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod tu med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i bra bas kun nas
283b3(phal chen): bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i 'phreng bas 'dzes par brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas zhing de dag spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos chus yongs su grang ba/ rin
283b4(phal chen): kho che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur to// rin po che'i me tog pun ta ri ka'i 'phreng bas dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad mo rab tu rgyas zhing shin tu 'phangs pas rab tu 'dzes par rgyan pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang
283b5(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad/ kyi bri bas kun nas g.yog pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i bra ba/ sa kun nas snang bas 'dzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhan med
283b6(phal chen): khang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos tham sa cad kyi ngang kun nas 'byung ba/ gdug spos kyi bsgron gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs
283b7(phal chen): med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi brgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan kye rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtsham
283b8(phal chen): po'i gtugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi kun nas snang ba'i rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu
283b9(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal mtshan seng ge'i yid tu 'ong ba'i mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun sngo na gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
284a1(phal chen): sa bo chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun tu rgyan du gyur pa thams cad kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// mdze'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i ga
284a2(phal chen): gzhal med khang gi sgra ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rgyal bar kun nas gnas par gyur to// mdze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos kyi sna tshogs kyis shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas g.yog bcing rgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i ri rab kyi/ 
284a3(phal chen): rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kun nas 'khor cing rgyan pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang bkrol ba'i brjod tu med pa'i 'phrin las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas na kun nas rgyan pa dang / rnan
284a4(phal chen): po che'i pad mo rjod du med pa'i sman gyis kun nas g.yog cing rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khrig brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bstan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la stong pa'i
284a5(phal chen): sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sman gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lho/ rje/ 'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par bsgrub cing nor du da rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyan pa dang / mu tig kar po'i sbyin
284a6(phal chen): brjod tu med pas kun nas rgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa rtsigs pa'i sprin brjod tu med pas kun nas g.yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sras bu'i mu tig gi sgrani brjod du med du med pa'i char mngon pa
284a7(phal chen): 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// 
284a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang byin gyis rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gyengs pa rnams par 'phrul pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab hUM
284a9(phal chen): phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyis rlabs yongs su bston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin
284b1(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams kyi brtul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad la gyi gzugs bstan rnam par yongs su ston par 'dzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon
284b2(phal chen): khyimatha 'di bzhin kum ng+yas pa gcig nas gci tu byung po yongs su bstan pa 'ad ba'asam gyis mi bya ba'i phyir ro// de bzhi ni gshegs pa rnams kyi 'ad zer gcig gi sgonas de 'jib rten gyi 'amam 'byam rdzas par slongs
284b3(phal chen): 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams pa spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sgrani 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing thams cad brgyas par 'gyengs par bsam
284b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsku'i go gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i skal ba yongs su bston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dzi ta'i tshal
284b5(phal chen): de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par kun gnas na/ gyur pa de bzhin gshegs du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ngas kyis klas pa nas na mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa thams cad yongs
284b6(phal chen): su gtugs kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu sdud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta'i tshal tu yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rgyas
284b7(phal chen): pa dang / de gshegs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin
284b8(phal chen): gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas g.yog par rgyun pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi cha rab tu 'dab pas rgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi spyan/ 
284b9(phal chen): ne du rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun nas rgyas shing rgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi zhing gi sAni gyi 'dzid nas/ gos kha dog snga tshogs su 'dzes pa'i ra rab tu 'bab pas rgyan pa dang / 'greng ba dang lnga ldi dang se mo rdo
285a1(phal chen): rgyun thams cad kyi nar rgyun mi 'chag par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'dzul ba'i sprini dang / na bun gi nar thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'ba' pas rgyas
285a2(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi phra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma'i char rgyun ma chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sgrani lha'i bu mo'i lag pa na khyer ba na mkha'i/ 
285a3(phal chen): dbyibs kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab mo'i dkyil 'khor can/ chub mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin bcing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pa brgyan/ 
285a4(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi phra ba dang / rin po che sengadA ge'i pra ba sna tshogs rnam par tha dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo dos rgyas pa ra kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
285a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol
285a6(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprini sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang 'dzad dpal gyi gzi rdzing rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang 'dzad pa'i sngon
285a7(phal chen): lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med po'i rdul phra rab snyed dang / lhag cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mcho de nas ma
285a8(phal chen): 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char
285b1(phal chen): mngon par kye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par rtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che me tog gi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdza
285b2(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bkye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po chen gdugs kyi char mngon par sgrub pa dang / kha tog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra bas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin
285b3(phal chen): po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis rlabs pa dang / rin po ni sna tshogs kyi sprini rgyan yid du 'ong bsam na mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa byed cing / mi 'jed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
285b4(phal chen): gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogasu brten te/ khang brtsegs pa rgya kun nas ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i bra ba'i kun nas
285b5(phal chen): khyab pa dang / seng ge khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad mo can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi/ brgyal po'i bri ba'i brgyan gyis kun nas rgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
285b6(phal chen): lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka
285b7(phal chen): kha'i rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i rdul shing / tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi
285b8(phal chen): zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu ba bcom ldan 'das
285b9(phal chen): des gnas nas 'khor gyi 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lnga lI dang bra bas kun tu 'brel par byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rani po che/ 
286a1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi lda lnga dang / bra ba chen pos kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad lnga ldi dang / 'phreng ba'i pra bas 'brel bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil
286a2(phal chen): 'khor thams cad 'og gi bzhi 'jig rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'phreng ba yongs su bzung bar byin gyis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig
286a3(phal chen): rten gi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi mang po'i bra bas kun nas 'brel
286a4(phal chen): par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zheng thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi lA da dang / 'phreng ba'i bra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sangs brgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnams par snang ba'i lnga ldi dang / 
286a5(phal chen): bos kun nas 'bral bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi kham kyi khams kyi bzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yud du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang // ldi lI'i phra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis rlabs par byed cing
286a6(phal chen): mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gang na ba der ljags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba rnam par byed pa'i khang pa
286a7(phal chen): rtsegs pa dang / seng ge 'i khri nor bu rina'i tshe phyogs kun nas rnam par srung ba'i pad ma'i snying can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi pra brgyan gyis kun nas rgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis
286a8(phal chen): rlabs nas dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjid du med pa'i brdul shin tu phra bskyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal tsan
286a9(phal chen): mar me zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi rjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i
286b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lha gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad gtug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / bri sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin
286b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dkang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi spyani sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brjod du med pa'i rdul phra ba snyed kyis rgyas
286b3(phal chen): bar bkang ba dang // chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdugs pas kha dog dang bri tu mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprini sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs rgyas par bkang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos
286b4(phal chen): kha tog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i brgyal po mdangs 'byung ba thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog
286b5(phal chen): 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi spyan sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par bkang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che de skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang lda
286b6(phal chen): ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po kha tog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i
286b7(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sgra ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dkang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnams pa tha dad ldan
286b8(phal chen): pa'i ri rab kyi sgra ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par bkang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad non bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rab tu snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i
286b9(phal chen): ri rab kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par bkang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rib rab kyi spyan sangs rgyas
287a1(phal chen): kyi sbyin zhing sa rjod du med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba skyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu
287a2(phal chen): snang bas ri rab kyi sman gyi zhing brjod du med du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi namakha'i rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang ba rab
287a3(phal chen): tu ston pacing byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu'i thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thes/ 
287a4(phal chen): cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gyengs pa bar byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhag
287a5(phal chen): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gradra na pa der don ste/ 'khor ba dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brtan te khang brtseg ba'i spos rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi bri bas
287a6(phal chen): kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po brgya bya ni rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi bra bas kun nas rgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po
287a7(phal chen): 'acod pan bcing ba'i byang nub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra bas snyed kyi 'jog rten
287a8(phal chen): gi masu ni pa tsho'i gisuM 'angs su snang ba zhes bya bya de bzhi ni gshegs pas chos kyi rgyas nam mtha'i dang 'i rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas sming nas/ bya nub sems dpa 'a chags pa med pa'i dadul gyi rgyal ba zhes phyi
287a9(phal chen): bya nub sems dpa' 'atig rten gi khrims rgyamatsho du med pa'i rgyal gni du dra ba stod dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gning nas la 'i khyod kyil 'kho rtsom ci de nas 'angags te/ nang mkha'i dbyings don pa che'i bu
287b1(phal chen): sprin gi rgyan gyis rgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser ngi'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis rgyan par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs
287b2(phal chen): kyis bri zing bar byas pa'i smani gyis car rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan par byin gis rlab su dang / namakha'i dbyangs ri'i rgyal mtshan gyi sman gyi rgyan gyi sgra rgyun par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / namakha'i dbyangs nor bu rin po che
287b3(phal chen): gser gi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis rgyan par byin gyis rlabs dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis rgyan par byin gyis rlabs dang / na mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che skar mas thams
287b4(phal chen): cad kyis gzugs rnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gros kyi sprin gyi rgyan gis rgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyangs phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo lta bu snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su dran par byin
287b5(phal chen): kyis rlabs/ ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / nam
287b6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu nas nor du'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal ba la phyogs kyi dbyings rnams par snang ba'i gros kyi spos kyis yongs su brgyas par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / namakha'i dbyings
287b7(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po rgyas ma tsho'i rgyan gyis gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis rlab par byed cing mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gnas pa der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der don ste// 
287b8(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pas bcos ldan 'das 'a phyag 'phel nas byeng phyogs su brtson te rin po che'i rgyal po rgya myo yongs su 'byung ba'i khang brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i jib+hi rgyu'i bang po'i snying portson dag ma
287b9(phal chen): bar sprul nas/ nos bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i bri bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po ni ni skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil
