288a1(phal chen): mo krung bcas te 'khor do// byang chub dang shar phyogs kyi 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams chen po thams cad du// 
288a2(phal chen): mdzan pa'i rin che'i 'od zer gyi bra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i sprin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin du 'phrul pa'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ 
288a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i brtul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gi 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
288a4(phal chen): thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas kyi khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyebs par byin gyis rlab pa dang / 'jig
288a5(phal chen): rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa rtsegs pa'i sgra ni gas kun nas khyams par byin gyis brlabs sa pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad tsan dan gi
288a6(phal chen): khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyabs par byin gyis rlab be dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang rtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyebs par byin gyis rlabs dang / 'jig/ 
288a7(phal chen): rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyabs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rdo rje'i khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun
288a8(phal chen): nas khyabs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gser gyi khang pa rtsegs ba'i sprin gyis kun nas khyabs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa/ 
288a9(phal chen): thams cad gos kyi khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis khyims par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad pad mo'i khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khyabs par byin gyis rlabs par byed/ 
288b1(phal chen): cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams tu brten te nor bu rin po che/ 
288b2(phal chen): 'i khang pa rtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i nyi ma'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi phra bas yongasu
288b3(phal chen): brgyas pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi bra bas cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor krung bcas tu 'khod do/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
288b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis pha rol tu gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbyangs rgyal po'i
288b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'dzi/ ga rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig
288b6(phal chen): tu bcom ldan 'das des gnas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod chas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'a khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam
288b7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha tog sna tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil
288b8(phal chen): srin gyis kun du khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs
288b9(phal chen): pa'i mdzod sku'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas khyab par bya ba'i dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha tog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gi sprin kyis kun tu khyab par
289a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad ma'i snying po ci 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che rgyal po ri bo tshe'i shing gi yal gyis dkyil
289a2(phal chen): 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi smani kun nas khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams
289a3(phal chen): cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyor bar bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyid ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sma ni gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba
289a4(phal chen): dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba'i dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi khya dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan
289a5(phal chen): 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho phyogs 'tshams su rten te rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog
289a6(phal chen): gi khang pa stegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che rdo rje pad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od ze 'a rab tu 'bab pa'i pra bas yongs su brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i
289a7(phal chen): lus su byin gyis rlabs nas dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khor do// lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'dzeg rten gi khams kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub spyod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten
289a8(phal chen): gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma rab tu spang ba'i da snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin ga shegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes kun du snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub ses dpa' 'khor thams cad rnams par 'thor ba'i ye ste
289a9(phal chen): mtshan nos bya nub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / ldan cig du bcom paldan 'das des gan nas/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rgyamatsho nas 'phags te/ btsun
289b1(phal chen): bu ga'i thams cad nas me tog gi 'od 'phro ba'i sman namakha'i ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba dang / ba bu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo'i 'od 'phro ba'i sman na mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu kye ba dang / bsru bu ga thams cad nas/ 
289b2(phal chen): nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pas rab tu bkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba spos dang / bdug pa dang spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdugs pa'i sprin
289b3(phal chen): nA mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klu'i rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin+da
289b4(phal chen): pa che rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba'i dang / be spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye
289b5(phal chen): ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal dpal gi snying po 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings lta bu yang ba rab tu bkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin ga
289b6(phal chen): pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i 'od ze'aphro ba'i sman na mkha'i dbyangs ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye bar byed cing / ma 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
289b7(phal chen): gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su rten te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od gzer gyi bra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les
289b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu bkye ba'i snang ba'i khang brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po bri med pa'i snying po'i/ 
289b9(phal chen): khra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po bri ma med pa'i dra bas yongs su rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gcod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
290a1(phal chen): cag/ lus su byin gyis rlabs nas dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol kyi 'jig rten rgyan
290a2(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ba rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal gyis bya ba byang chub sems dpal
290a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhagacig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i
290a4(phal chen): bu ga sgo thams cad nas lus thams cad nasanatus gsum tu gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi spya ni kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang po thams cad dang
290a5(phal chen): baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum tu bya/ chub sems dnga'athams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang po thams cad dang baspu'i bu
290a6(phal chen): ga thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du bzhugs bI de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad/ kyi/ lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi spyani kun tu bkye/ mtshan ma dang dpe' byad bzang / 
290a7(phal chen): thams cad dang / ba sku'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus sum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprini kun tu dge ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dang / 
290a8(phal chen): ba spu'i bsgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi skyer ba gzugs rgyan mang po'i sngani kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang po thams cad
290a9(phal chen): dang / baspu'i mjoms cad da nga dus thams cad nas dus gsum du 'byung ba'i nyen thos da'ang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdugaso na ba du 'artse ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang byabang ngo thams cad dang / bcu'i bano
290b1(phal chen): cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpa' byad bzang po thams cad
290b2(phal chen): dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs rnyan mang po'i kun nas bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dang / 
290b3(phal chen): sku'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sgrani kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad
290b4(phal chen): dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba'i skad cig tu/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs shing mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten
290b5(phal chen): gi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der do nga ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal na/ sa nub dang / byang gi phyogs 'tshams su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po
290b6(phal chen): phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad ma snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'o da thub pa med pa'i bra bas yongs su rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'od kun tu snang
290b7(phal chen): ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te 'khor do// 'og gi phyogs 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol rgya
290b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes na mkha'i lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sem/ 
290b9(phal chen): dpa' sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnas
291a1(phal chen): nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ bcu pa sbu bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bskad dang / sgra dang dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa'i dang / dus
291a2(phal chen): gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'grug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul rgyal mtsho dbyangs rab tu bsgrubs pa dang / 
291a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'o/ 
291a4(phal chen): glengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyi ni tshul khrims rgya mtsho dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bdud kyis bkrugs rnam par thor
291a5(phal chen): ba dang / snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phru/ la ba 'dzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu skrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / mad
291a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrogs dang / 'gro ba rtul ba thams cad dus la 'bab pa'i 'khor los dul ba'i tshogs kyi tshul dang / thabs kyi sgra rab tu skrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya bar
291a7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang thabs dang / chos kyi tshul mtsho'i rab tu bsgrag par byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jog rten gi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
291a8(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag mtshal zhing 'og gi phyogs su rten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rin po che
291a9(phal chen): sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang partsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi thams cad gzugs kyi pad mo'i yongs su bzung ba dag/ mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzug
291b1(phal chen): brnyan rab tu spang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gcod pan 'go la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil 'khor krung bcas te 'khod de/ steng gi phyogs gi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing
291b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu bston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings sangs rgyas
291b3(phal chen): kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings smon lam gi bzhi rab tu gtogs pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gan
291b4(phal chen): nas/ dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba sku'i sgo thams cad dang lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos
291b5(phal chen): dang sman yog thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bdag dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / 
291b6(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bston pa dang / ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / de ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jam klas pa thams cad na/ bzhugs pa rnams
291b7(phal chen): kyi spyani bI skya pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po tha~Md kyi gzugs rnyan mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag
291b8(phal chen): dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang spun dang / yo byad thams cad rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ rnam bsnan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab
291b9(phal chen): tu snang ba'i yongasu bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yan lag dang thams cad 'thub pa/ rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ yongasu bstan pa dang / 
292a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rtson 'grus dang / brag shul dang rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasasu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan brgya mtsho yongs
292a2(phal chen): su rol ba ning/ rab tu bsgrub pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor brgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgyamatsho yongs su tshol zhing/ rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldam
292a3(phal chen): pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i gyur pa'i yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul yongs su sgrub pacing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs
292a4(phal chen): su rtong pa zhing shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo bo'i gzugs rnyan rnam par dmyigs pa bya bas/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhing bka' ba dang / 
292a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams ca/ da mngon par mos par byed pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho/ rab tu snang ba'i gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thos
292a6(phal chen): kyi lam rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i bsgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan de nga ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bstobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
292a7(phal chen): rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang rnam par dag par byas pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu spang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis
292a8(phal chen): rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan par byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ 
292a9(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan snying po can khang brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / yin/ 
292b1(phal chen): ta ni la'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i phra bas kun nas rgyan pa dang / rin po chen rgyal po dus gsum gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrogs
292b2(phal chen): pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / 'go la rin po che'i gcod pan rab tu thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil mo krungs brtsegs te 'khod do// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes
292b3(phal chen): bya ba// bam po// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
292b4(phal chen): cad kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo bsde'i tshul gi gsung rgya mtsho'i rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
292b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog/ thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du skad cig skad cig tu yo// ngas su bstan pa rnams par 'phrul pas 'byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khas
292b6(phal chen): thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par bkang ba'i yul dang lde na pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi 'khor tu lus mdo na bar 'byung zhing / rnam par snang ba rtul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten
292b7(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang ba zhing khongs su chud pa ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar dus la sdod par gzhol ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
292b8(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug smra ba sku'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bu rab tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gsheg
292b9(phal chen): pa thams cad mig yor ltar bur khor du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyun tu skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba las kyang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs rnyan lta bur shes pas/ rnam par shes pa ye shes mngon par
293a1(phal chen): par bsgrub par thams cad smani rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khongs su chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 
293a2(phal chen): 'jigs pa khru mchog dang / seng ge ring ris rnam par gnon pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor bzhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skang rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thod pa/ chos kyi
293a3(phal chen): dbyangs dang na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ 
293a4(phal chen): par dag pa/ bdud kyi 'khor thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par krugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes sgru bis/ 
293a5(phal chen): pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas na mkha'i spyod yul dang lha na pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i ba rtson 'bras dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi/ 
293a6(phal chen): spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes da kyi bsgor bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig/ 
293a7(phal chen): tu bzud pa'i rnam par 'phrul bas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad skyes pa'i lus khongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad dbyangs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu
293a8(phal chen): pa dang / shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par bzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs par rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin
293a9(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du 'gro rmongs med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs thams cad
293b1(phal chen): tu rnam par 'phrul pas/ brgyas par 'byings pa sha rtag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis/ 'dze da'i tshal thams cad yongs rgyas lnga
293b2(phal chen): gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / nam gru dang rab 'byor dang 'gag med dang / mos pa dang ka ta ya'i bu dang / byams pa'i bu gang ga'i bu la spogs pas/ mdze ta'i tshal na
293b3(phal chen): 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi rgyan de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs
293b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang
293b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshe la
293b6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpe' phyogs su 'khor pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems
293b7(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gis par brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / 
293b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems
293b9(phal chen): dpa' chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmyigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs
294a1(phal chen): grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu
294a2(phal chen): 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sman kun du 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kyi phra bas rgyas par 'byings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo // 
294a3(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi tshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma spags/ de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs pa
294a4(phal chen): cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa 'dzad do// de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
294a5(phal chen): yang dag par brjod pa mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba ma byas so// de dag gis gzhan gi sems kyi rgyud las byang
294a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' skyed pa rag tu gzhag pa yang ma byas so// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyud mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// de dag ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir rtson pa ma yin no// de dag
294a7(phal chen): gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar ma byas so// de dag gis ni 'khor ba 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so// 
294a8(phal chen): de dag gis ni thams cad 'khyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rtsegs pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sgrubs/ de dag gis ni sangs
294a9(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de thams cad tu rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du chud do/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gis lam gis rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i 'jig rten gi las 'das pa da
294b1(phal chen): thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam che bo las byung ba khong du chud de// nyan thos dang rang rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi laM gyis
294b2(phal chen): gnas par dmigs pathun man ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs las sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis thub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa/ byin gyis rlabs par/ 
294b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khongs su ma myong ba/ de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog bzung ba dang / bzang po'i lus las sogs 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
294b4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo // mi thos so mi shes so// khong tu mi khud do mi rtogs so mi rig so// yid mi chen so mi sems so// rtogs par mi lta'o// nges par mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
294b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag mthung ba'i dge ba'i
294b6(phal chen): rtsa ba med do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag go// dmigs pa chung la rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyi 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do// dge
294b7(phal chen): shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am rdzogs par bya ba'am/ rgyas par dgang bar bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ lta ba'am/ nyam su myong bar bya 'am/ mnan pa 'am/ rnam par mnan pa 'am/ gan
294b8(phal chen): gyis thos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba 'am/ smon par bya ba 'am/ stabs par bya ba 'am/ sman par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rab tu dgod
294b9(phal chen): par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can 'god par bya bar yang dag lta de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi mthu' med do// de lta bu'i sems med do// de lta bu/ 
295a1(phal chen): 'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gis mthu med do// de lta bu'i ye shes med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil / 
295a2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa bden par snang ba/ shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin du zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje rnon po'i bsam po med pa/ 'jig
295a3(phal chen): rten thams cad la mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'dze da'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te/ 'khod la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dag nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas
295a4(phal chen): kyang / 'dze ta'i tshal des sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes de yang dag par ma sgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang dag pa
295a5(phal chen): dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang du/ dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon de lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
295a6(phal chen): mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad 'khyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'a
295a7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul po de dag la 'jug pa'i/ rtogs par bya ba 'am lta zhing khong du chud par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rnams kyi mig gi lam gis lta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos
295a8(phal chen): gyi mig gis lta ba yin gyi de bas na nyan thos chen po dag 'dzeda'i tshal de nyi na 'khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / 
295a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de yang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'ga' ga'i klung gi chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tu yi dgas bkres pa dang / bsgom pas rab tu mnar bya/ gcer Ta
295b1(phal chen): gos med pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog 'tshag cing mtshungs pa/ rlung dang nyi mas bdungs pa/ bya rog mang pos gtses pa/ spyang khu dang las tho 'tshams brgya stong mang pos kun nas 'dus kyang gang ga'i chu klung mi mthong ba ste/ 
295b2(phal chen): sgrub pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir/ la la ni skams te chu med par mthong ngo // lam la ni 'thab pas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas gtan dag/ 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / 
295b3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i lang tog gis mig kun nas khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thug
295b4(phal chen): pa de dag ma mthong ngo // ma shes so// 'di lta ste dpe' na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus na mi la la zhing gnyid kyis myos te/ log par gyur na de nyid log pa'i rmi lam tu gnas de nyid lha'i grong rdal lha'i dbang ba
295b5(phal chen): rgya byin gyi gnas ltan mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ gza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong snyed gnas pa
295b6(phal chen): lho'i me tog sgra tshogs kyis gang ba dag yid la bzhin gi shing lha'i rdzas gyi gos dang mu tig gi 'phreng ba dag rin pa chu'i rgyan dang / se mdo sde pa tshogs mang po snga 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyis la stan rnam pa sna tshogs
295b7(phal chen): nu gis yongs su spyod cing/ sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba la spyan par 'byin bu'i sal snyan gi shing cang po dang / dga' ba'i srid mo'i rgyan pa sku tshogs par gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang ngos bu rdzus pa dang / lha ras kyi ma / 
295b8(phal chen): byis pa'i sgra ya 'ong zhing 'di du 'ang ba stan pa 'byin/ sos ldan gyi gang mang po dang / dpa' ba'i san bzos par gyur te/ bdag 'ad den 'dug pa bsam byi la/ gA'i rdzas kyi rgyan gyis thugs pa'i gnas de dag rnaM/ 
295b9(phal chen): mthong bar byur nga / bya ba'i tshogs sang bdi dag gis gan 'a rnyed na gnas bzhin tu/ ma mdzadzu ma shes 'ang du mi nung do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ rin gyis bu dganyid kyis lag pa tshol ma tsa mi lta ba yin gyi
296a1(phal chen): gnyid na 'khor ba'i skye bo mang po de dag gis gnas lta ba ma yin no// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis rmas
296a2(phal chen): chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu rtsegs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu bzhugs pa dang / byang
296a3(phal chen): nuchub sems dpa'i lam rgya chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa'i khyad
296a4(phal chen): bar dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gi rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rna
296a5(phal chen): par rtses pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes spyod yul thams cadad la chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phung po de dag dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam
296a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyams su myong bar gyur lanyan thos chen pos mchog gis bzung dang bzang po'i zung la sogs de/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar 'gyur
296a7(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la sngags dang rigs sngags dang / sman gyi yul dang blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rigs sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa sman mchog
296a8(phal chen): thams cad shes sman blang ba'i las byed kyang ri'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba lang dang / ra lug dang 'tsho ba dang / sngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i mig sman gyi tshul mi shes pas gzhan dag gis sman de dag gis
296a9(phal chen): tshichog dang / sman gyi ro dang mthu dang / yon tan dang byin dang 'phrod pa mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes pa'i ye shes kyi yul la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nam 'phrul
296b1(phal chen): ba'i yul gyis byung ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul mthong yang / nyan thos chen po'i mchog gi zung dang / zang po'i zung la sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tsami par gyur pa/ gnan
296b2(phal chen): gro dgos pa yal bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa rten/ rgya stong du mas
296b3(phal chen): gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la yang dag rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gi sgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mis/ rin po che btags pa'i gtsug lag gi klos shin du byung ba/ gter
296b4(phal chen): gi gtsug lug dang / rgyus dang ngan rtags gya nom par lobs la/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brtan pa dang / de la rin po che ci 'dod pa blangs shing / bdag kyang yongs su tsham par byed/ pha dang ma la yang len
296b5(phal chen): par rim gro byed/ bu mo gosas kyang legs par gso ba byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / na ba dang dbul ba dang / sems/ can nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams
296b6(phal chen): bsdud cing khyab par bgo ba sha byas la/ nor gi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / rter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i mig/ 
296b7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kho na 'khor kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang / rin po che'i gter de dag mi shes pas rini po che yang klang du med do// rin po che'i don kyang byar med do/ de bzhin du sems dag de bzhinag
296b8(phal chen): shegs pa'i yul bamam gyis mam pa la leshes kyim yongs su rnams par dashA pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bas ma bya mi byung ba la bzhugs pa de dag 'a ta'i tsal na la 'o
296b9(phal chen): kyinam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul rgyal macol 'jug ci/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rimi grol can zhing dam pa'i chos yongs
297a1(phal chen): bzung ba la mngon par rtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su bsdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ 
297a2(phal chen): tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang ma mthong ba shes so// 'di lta ste dpe na skyes bul la zhog gis gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ rin po che'i snang tu byin par gyur na/ des ne nin klung der lan tshun 'gro ba dang / 
297a3(phal chen): 'phreng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong / rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin be che thams cad mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul/ rin
297a4(phal chen): thang ngam yongs su spyod pa'i rgyus mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len pa yang mi leng ba la rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar byed do// gang gi mig la sgrub pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing sheso// 
297a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos rin po che'i ming chen dpo'i phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan tu gyur pa mngon tu gyur te/ 'dze
297a6(phal chen): ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de/ 
297a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
297a8(phal chen): kha'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag ltar/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig de bkab pa de dag la byang chub ses
297a9(phal chen): dpa'i yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do// de dag gi chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do// 'di lta ste dper na/ mig yongs su dag brtul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba
297b1(phal chen): rab tu ring dang / mun 'thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yin te/ de la mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang bral ba'i rab tu srung ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shan tu/ 
297b2(phal chen): gnas par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can bye ba khrig khrag rgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / mun pa'i rangab rab kyi mag yongs su 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam/ 
297b3(phal chen): par gyul phan tshul 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod bkyang mi de dag gis/ skyes bu'i spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa de mi mthong me shes so// skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang // 
297b4(phal chen): cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa phyogs tha dad tu mngon par ltas pa/ dbyings kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/ dbyibs kyi tshul tha dad pa/ thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa byang
297b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mang po/ rnam pa tha dad bcing chags/ pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi thams cad ma/ khyen bcing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gi rnam par la/ 
297b6(phal chen): phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang nyan thos chen po de dge gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po bston pa mdzad
297b7(phal chen): kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag gi mthong bar ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po'i de lta bu
297b8(phal chen): yang dag par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ chus khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sdong pos khyab/ 
297b9(phal chen): pa'i/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ dam bos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs pa kyi lus kyi lus kyis khyab pa lte/ sgra dbyangs kun nas khyab pa 'am/ myigs
298a1(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo // sems dpa' sna tshogs
298a2(phal chen): kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa'i thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzani de la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par spyod pa rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma rtog so// 
298a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam kyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan pa 'dzad na/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong shing shes pa na/ ma gyur te/ byang chub
298a4(phal chen): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du ma chud do/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bsku ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag
298a5(phal chen): tu skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo // des ni 'gro 'am/ 'dug gam 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong d+mo/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'gro ba
298a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi yul las yongs su 'das te/ de bzhin gshegs bI ye shes kyi yul tu zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis rnam par bya ba des/ 'gro ba'i thams cad gzugs kyang
298a7(phal chen): nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul pa dag mthong ngo // 'di lnga ste dper na/ myi'i tshor 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi mthong yang / mis lha de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du de
298a8(phal chen): bzhini gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang chen po yongasu bsdu
298a9(phal chen): mdzad kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'dilta
298b1(phal chen): ste dper na dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhags pa ni shes pa med pa tshor ba med pas/ dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba
298b2(phal chen): yang dag par nyamasu myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la/ 'jig rten gi khams rna bar spyod pa thams cad gnas pa de ni yod par bzhags pa de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / mthus de mi shes mi mthong
298b3(phal chen): ngo / de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nas yang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung
298b4(phal chen): ba de dag cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar gyur/ khong tu ma chud par gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong tu ma chud ma/ 
298b5(phal chen): mthong ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis yul ni za/ ba cang yangs pa med pa/ ltar bar dka' zhing gtogs par ka te ste/ khong du chud par dka' ba la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs
298b6(phal chen): yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'dus pa'o// nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi
298b7(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag ma mthong ngo // 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa/ 
298b8(phal chen): dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan yongasu 'dus pa de yang ma mthong ma shes so// de ni de'i spyod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul snang 'dzad kyi smon lam gyi gzugs 'od zer rab tu smra/ 
298b9(phal chen): khas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// ltos cig sems can dam pa'i// / sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// 
299a1(phal chen): 'dzeda'i tshal 'di rab bstan to// rang byung rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs// bgrang du med par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas chos tshul ma shes pa'i// 'jig rten kun kyang 'go mongs so// chos kyi rgyal po tshe 'thun
299a2(phal chen): dag/ tshad med bsam gyis me khyab cing // shin du thob par 'byung ba yin// de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog/ mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs// yang dag sangs rgyas skyed pa'i// 
299a3(phal chen): chos rab de nyid mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dpung med// tshig gi lam gis brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu bzab pa dag/ rgyal bas 'dze ta'i tshal tu bstan// rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba rnams// zhin
299a4(phal chen): rnam bsam yas che ba nas// rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dka' ste// kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs// spyod lam spyod pa chags pa med// de dag bsam pa shes par ni// 
299a5(phal chen): 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dag sem can spyod yul dang // spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas pa yongs kyis kyang // rna keng kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i gnas/ 
299a6(phal chen): gzhan gyis thub par dka' pha ma byed// dpa'i rgyal mtshan ma 'bras shing // ye shes gsal ba gzhol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la// grangs chen mnyam par gzhag pa rnams// chos
299a7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad brgyas bkang zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs cur
299a8(phal chen): rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshitshigs su gcad pa 'di dge sa so// bsod nams snang po shes rab me// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rdzogs shing // 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/ bder gshegs sku lus skyes pa/ 
299a9(phal chen): 'di 'azungs rdzo thog 'a mthong / ga dum mami gan sa sems ldan pa/ mdza' dar chung tshong bdi ba yin/ le shes bya chen du byangan/ rgyan 'ang mang pas yi dbyang bapo/ mga'i ninas kyi
299b1(phal chen): che ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun rgyas shing // bder gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par// gnas mi gnas par gyur pa rnams// phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te// pad mo'i bstan la 'khod pa dag/ 
299b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i mtha' la lta bar bgyi// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnaMs// smos pa med cing mi rten la// rtul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / ye shes rgya chen rab dpa' ba/ 
299b3(phal chen): rje sesems ni mi g.yo'o zhing // grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'das pa gang ston pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnam bye bo rnaMs// grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus// yang dag sangs rgyas drung nas lhags/ 
299b4(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong // de'i byin rlabs dam pa ya si// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags// sangs rgyas chos la bye ba med// 
299b5(phal chen): chos dbyings bzhi la dang de bzhin te// spyod pa tsam tu yongs byed pa'i'o/ pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ chos kyi dbyings la dpe' med/ pa'i// mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su
299b6(phal chen): zad med pa'i// chos la rab tu dbyed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa dpal kun nas/ 'phags pa'i gzi rdzing rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs la rnam par ltas te/ de'i
299b7(phal chen): tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos shig sems can dam pa'i// ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ mu stegs ldan pa'i
299b8(phal chen): tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bder gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi
299b9(phal chen): bzhud / tshad med pa dang tshad yod las kang thub pa chen po 'das pa mni/ nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ nyan par bgrangs pa spong ba med/ de bzhin gshegs dra gakhas ston pa// dus gsung chags pa med pas spyodade
300a1(phal chen): 6zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang // de bzhin gshegs chos kar yongs rdzogs pa'i// 'gon po rnams kyi mthong ba yini// bar smang na mkha' dbyings 'di las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni/ gar yang rdzoH/ 
300a2(phal chen): pa med par 'gro/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul de bzhin no// da ltar na mkha'i phyogs rnams kyi/ zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma'i/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/ ji ltar 'di ni 'jig
300a3(phal chen): rkyen na/ lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas/ 'jig den ston ma 'jig nan/ chos kyi la la de lan gnas/ ji lta phung ni rtags med da mkha' las 'gyogs par sna ba ni/ de bzhi ni mangs rgyas chom nyid kyang 'dzi
300a4(phal chen): rkyen khas su rab tu myu/ ji ltar chu'i phung po la/ zhing rjes bgrang ba kun nas// de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems can dpal kyi snying pos chags pa med pa'i rgyal
300a5(phal chen): bos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje'i ri'i brag/ zang yin shin tu mtho yod pa/ de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i// sangs rgyas
300a6(phal chen): mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtshor chu chen dag/ tshad med rnyog pa dngas pa ltar/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ 'jig pa rten gyi sgo yang gcod// rgya mtsho'i tshu las 'phags pa'i/ ri bo ri bab ji 'dra
300a7(phal chen): ba// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang // chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtsho brgyas ji bzhin tu/ mi bzad skad cig rab tu mkhyen/ 'gon pa'i ye shes rab tu zab// 
300a8(phal chen): zab med de bzhin bgrang tu med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med bston// skye ba'i mtshan nyid ston pa'i// sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ji lta ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang / rna
300a9(phal chen): par 'phrul pa rab tu bstan// yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/ bsam don rdzogs byed ji ltar ba// de bzhin bsam pa dag byed pa// rgyal bas smon lom rdzogs par 'dzad// 'od srung gsal ba'i byed pa'i / rin po chen
300b1(phal chen): rnam snang ji lta ba// de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzod/ ji ltar phyogs la mngon lnga pa// rin po chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa/ de bzhin chags med sgrol ma yang / chos dbyings rab tu snang
300b2(phal chen): ba 'dzad/ de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang / 'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings smon lam du 'phrul pa'i zla ba'i brgyas pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur
300b3(phal chen): rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bskad smra so// phyogs bcu'i a ni dra ni la'is// kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar/ sangs rgyas mthong bas du skye dgu rnaMs// de bzhin byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rtul
300b4(phal chen): phran re re la/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med par smon// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad// mtha' yas grub pa bkab ste// de ni rnam 'byung shin tu zab/ blo ldan ye shes yul de la// 
300b5(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams ni 'bab ma nus// byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don tu ka/ rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs pa dang // sangs rgyas rnam par sbyangs pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam khA'i// 
300b6(phal chen): blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang // rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzod/ chos rnams gyur pa ston pa mdzad/ shAkya'i khyu mchog ston pa mdzad/ de'i cho 'phrul tshad med pa/ 'di dag rab tu byung
300b7(phal chen): ba yin// brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam par gzugs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad// 'jig rten 'gon po rgyal sras rnams/ chos kyi dbyings/ 
300b8(phal chen): lal bston pa mdzad// chos rnams ma lus yongs la yang // chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang pos byani rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul rgyu dang rab ldan pa'i/ 'jig rten thams cad rnam skyong ba'i// chos
300b9(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// sems can rtse bo'i yul la yang // ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs pa// shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'brel par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
301a1(phal chen): blo gros mtha' yas gzi brjid rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brang srong dam pa'i mchog rnam
301a2(phal chen): kyi// dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba// de dag kun gyi bder gshegs kyi/ gshegs stabs 'jog 'degs mi shes so// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/ ma nor rang rgyal thams cad kyi// de dag gi ni 'go
301a3(phal chen): po'o// gshegs stabs 'jog 'degs mi rig go// ma rig mun pas skabs pa rnams// khyi ltar ltong la rgyus pa yi// sems can de 'bra kun gyis ni// 'gon po mi shes smon mi dgos// rgyal ba sangs rgya zhol
301a4(phal chen): ba mni// des ni shes par mi nus te// sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das// zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba// brtan par mtshan gyis rnam par bris// de ni skar par dpag yas pa// 
301a5(phal chen): rnam 'phrul thogs med spyod pa mdzad// tshul sgo ra ras sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsam yas kyang // skal ba bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod du med pa zad 'gyur kyang // rang 'byung rnams kyi yon tan las// 
301a6(phal chen): phyogs bcug mtha'i mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas de'i zhabs ltas kyang // sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon byed cing // gang zhig yid kyang dga' mos pa/ de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul
301a7(phal chen): lha dka'i thog mar 'gyur// bsam nams ye shes mtha' yas shing // tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon paka bri med blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'di'i tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che ba// sems dang / 
301a8(phal chen): sdom pa rgya che ba// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing // byang chub rgya chen gnon par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs
301a9(phal chen): kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// 'dra ni las kar po bsam yas pa/ sangs rgyas sku rab sgrub pa'i phyir/ de las 'jig rten gsum mi 'gro// bas mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang pos mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyis
301b1(phal chen): rnam sbyangs pas/ 'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/ sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom yin te/ ye shes kun gyi gnas chen po/ chags pa thams cad rab spangs pas// tshul med spros pa mi mnga'o// ye shes 'od zer rab
301b2(phal chen): 'gyed pas// 'jig rten kun gyi nyams 'dra ba// khams gsum thams cad rnam skyong bas// srid pa'i 'jigs par rnam par gcod/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub sems ni de bzhin no// kha dog mtha' yas
301b3(phal chen): ston mdzad kyang // kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun la bsam yas pa'i// kha rog tshad med yongs su bston// skad gcig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi/ byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pa ni// de'i ye shes mthar phyin/ 
301b4(phal chen): ban/ rtag par sus kyang mi nus so// ye shes bstan pa zad mi shes// rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/ de la tus gsum rgyal ba kun// skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs su btang // shes ldan
301b5(phal chen): byang chub don sbyin pas// sems la sems shes bya bar yang // de la sems skyed med par bsam/ gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin// shin tu zab pas/ 
301b6(phal chen): tshig lam spongs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dran pa rmongs med
301b7(phal chen): nga'i rnams// chos 'dzin shA ni tu ngas rtogs shing // blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la// byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa/ de dag yadi ni 'di la nges// de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yid/ de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo// de dag yid la
301b8(phal chen): the tsom 'chang // de dag skye ba'i mi 'gyur ro// de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ches la rab 'jol bar/ de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung // de dag dad pa rnying tshugs shing // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skyed// 
301b9(phal chen): dmigs med gnas pa med pa'i// ye shes 'di la de dag skye// skal pa bye bar bsag pa yi// yongs su brdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos// ye shes 'di la 'dod mtshungs med// de dag thams cad yongasu sngon/ 'khor ba'i
302a1(phal chen): nang na rnam rgyu yang // 'dod pa dag la gnas pa ya ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtags pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtseg/ sems can khams ni ji snyed du// 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba// de dag thams
302a2(phal chen): cad brtan pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung 'gyur kyang // 'jig rten don med rab tu gnas// chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa nungs
302a3(phal chen): med do// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyad// 'jig rten 'de ba kun sems pas// de dag sang sdug bsngal rnam par zlog/ 'jig rten kun la snying rje zhing // byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag ye shes snang bar gyur/ 
302a4(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgrol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyal pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas nas// de'i tshe tshagasu bcad pa 'di dag smras// skal
302a5(phal chen): pa bye ba phrag rgyar yang // sangs rgyas sgra ni rab bkod na// the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i/ dam pa'i mthong ba ji srid smos// chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa// 'jigs rten gsum po'i bsod nams stebs// sems
302a6(phal chen): can thams cad rnam skyong ste/ 'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'/ sems can gtso bos ma ldan pa'i// gzugs rnams kyis ni mthong gyur na// bskal bye ba zhi phrag tu ngoms shing skye ba 'ching btub pa/ mi'i nga
302a7(phal chen): par bam+bu gzugs 'o// byam pa'i rdzas rnam ldalda dang/ rang ga dge ba'i chags med pa// gzhan do sngon pa byang chub s+ho// thu badzin / gzugs kyi sa/ de las tha dad mang dag gis// gas med mi shes
302a8(phal chen): 'byung 'gyur bas nga de ni sangs rgyas byang chub ste/ sems can pasam las tshang lnga/ snang bar 'dzad de theg rdza/ btsung nas thub pachen po'i// mchog/ byang chung dram pa lung yang ston// bso nangs can
302a9(phal chen): bzhin yang // ye shes dkyil 'khor gar cing 'byung / 'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang / bsod nams phung po rnam 'brel mdzad/ sdug bsngal bro ba rab tu gcod / ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong / gang gis rgyal ba ste/ 
302b1(phal chen): bkur ba// de dag ngan song 'jigs pa mni// rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na// shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od gsal snang ba shes rab mtha'// grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// thams cad skyes bu mchog
302b2(phal chen): mthong zhing // byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa zhes// de dag kun kyang nges par sems// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi bzhi rab tu rtogs pas// sangs rgyas kyi// 
302b3(phal chen): byin gyis rlabs kyis / de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// yan tan bsam yas phun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub pa mthong // yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa chen po rnam par dga'// thugs
302b4(phal chen): rjes che mnga' brtan pa'i rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung 'bar 'gyur/ skal ba khrag khrig phrag rgyar yang // sems can don la rtson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la lus rnam
302b5(phal chen): kyi// kun gyis lan klan cis kyang nus// ngan song gsum po mi zad par// skal pa khrag khrig bcos bla'i// chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i// smon pa ma mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams ni// sdug
302b6(phal chen): sngal phung po ci yod pa// ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma lan no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// thams dad ngan song rgyur yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla 'i// sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no// / 
302b7(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba re res kyang // bskal pa grangs med gnas klu'i// mtha' yas rgyal bas rnyed pa'i// byang chub mtha' las ring gnas ma ni// gang zhig phyi ngan song du'ang // yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/ rgyal ba'i dbang
302b8(phal chen): po mthong bas na/ ye shes 'brel ba'i rgyur gyur phyir// rgyal ba'i 'jig rten mthong na// sdug sngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas rnams ni
302b9(phal chen): mi thong zhing // bsgrub pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang chub gang zhig thob pa'i// bsod nams tshad ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the tsom yid gnyis chang par 'gyur/ 'jig rten
303a1(phal chen): thams cad 'jig rten gyi/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par ltas te// de bzhin
303a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba 'di nyid// rgya cher brjod pa dang gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab
303a3(phal chen): tu sa gsal bar bya ba dang // man ngag bsten pa'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gi khaMs mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad
303a4(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang // lus kyi rgyu thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnye
303a5(phal chen): pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu bston to// 
303a6(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu 'phra ba rnams la sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi
303a7(phal chen): thams cad du phyi ma'i mthur nur thug pa'i bskal pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skyes pa dang / mtha' dang 'byung ba/ 
303a8(phal chen): med pa me pa rlos pa bu gyis byas rgya sa su ma zhin padang / rnasapa tshus kyi bas pa sas rgyas kyi ga ba di gshegs pa'i kyi'i la gying chu ba sems pa'i sa
303a9(phal chen): byang chub la ma 'asrung ba'i nam banan pa dang / 'dini ge dus gsum na zhugs pa'i ngas rgyas kyi lu nga 'bral du ba/ 'bu ni nga ca gang cizhes ma na chos kyi kyi
303b1(phal chen): bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bzhi mnyam par byin gyis rlabs cing lus gcig gis rgyas par gang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sa ca rnamapa
303b2(phal chen): skul ba dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar gyur pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra bas rnam par dus gsum gyi zhing gcig tu rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
303b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang / skal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lnga ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad bsku'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi'i mtha' byin gyis rlabs pas/ byang chub sese
303b4(phal chen): dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par seng ge'i khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang // snying po byang chub kyi rgyal thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rnam
303b5(phal chen): pa tha dad pa rab tu bkod pa phyi ma'i mthar phyin pa rlabs pa bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag las sogs pa shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras
303b6(phal chen): dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes pa'i spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po'i seng ge rnam par bskyangs pa 'di nyid kyi don bya ba stan pa'i phyir/ sangs
303b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la ltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam
303b8(phal chen): par 'phrul pa dang / mtha' dang dpung med par la rnam par ltas te/ 'jig rten gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par ltar te/ mtha' dang dpung med pa'i ngag gi las dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad
303b9(phal chen): rnam par ltas nas/ de'i mi tshigs su bzad pa 'di dag sbaso/ baspu gcig la rgya ma tsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin du phra ba'i rdul dang bral// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kun gyi sa yongs skor sangs rgyas mdun na gzhug/ 
304a1(phal chen): sku gcig rtsel zhing mang po r+ya mtsho'i rnaMs// snying po byang chub pad me'i gdan banas pa'i// chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / shing drung dam pa kun la 'gon po snang // zhing rnams kun phran rang mang ste/ 
304a2(phal chen): rgyal ba sku rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod yul ston pa 'dzad// zhig mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin
304a3(phal chen): pa mang zad pa ke/ de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad na// 'byam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings
304a4(phal chen): rgyas pa kun bkang zhing / ston pa kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / zhidi rnams kun tu sgra dbyangs rab tu ston// rgyal po rgyal po ye shes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar dong // 'jam
304a5(phal chen): klas zhing rnams kun nas 'khod// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba rab gnas pa// chos kyi snga ni nyan dpa' bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu ni bskal pa bye bar dpyod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod byed pa// chos kyi gangs chen mno/ 
304a6(phal chen): spyod rnam par snang // smon lam la rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa'i spyod yul gnas// rgyal ba'i chos rnam gzhan 'byung ba'i// de dag kun bzang spyod pa shes/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // 
304a7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang // rnam par 'phrul rgya mtsho yangs la 'jug/ bder gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // zhing rnams zhing bran ji snyed pa'i// bsku'i 'phrin las rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing // chos kyi char gyis
304a8(phal chen): byang chub rab la 'god/ phal po che las bam 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing ting nge 'dzini seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de nyid las// de bas kyang tan tu de/ 
304a9(phal chen): dgongs par mdzad pa'i don tu srini mtshams mdzod sku'i gnas su// chos kyi dbyings bsgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings bsgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas// dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i don chen po 'od zer gyi dkyis
304b1(phal chen): joms nam da dang brjod du med pa'i 'dul gan tu phra ba snyed nu pa pa le/ phyogs bu'i 'jig rten gyi sa rgyal chos pa 'alas pa chos kyi rgyangs zhing 'angam thas pa thams cad kyi 'a gsul banan dus
304b2(phal chen): snyed 'ong su rlu pa'i sangs rnas kyi rdul pa dag la nga sangs rgyas kyi gang gi rdul mang byas pa dag khams dog sa chogs dang / rnams pa sA tshogs su rnams par dag pa dang / bani sa tshogs dang mas snga rdzogs pa
304b3(phal chen): ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi shing dag na byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub du byani te/ sings ge'i zil 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gi dang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshegasun nas
304b4(phal chen): skor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par mtshang rgyab mthong ste/ la la ni lha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khya
304b5(phal chen): ba'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo // la la ni lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ 
304b6(phal chen): la la ni na mkha'i lding gi gnas na 'dug/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ni lto mche chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / 
304b7(phal chen): grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i bro brang 'khor dag rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang // rigs kyi bu
304b8(phal chen): rgyud sna tshogs dang / kha dag rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi bra ba sna tshogs dang / dmyigs kyi 'dakyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / chos ston par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa
304b9(phal chen): ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyings klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu rnam par gnas pa phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos su co/ 
305a1(phal chen): kyi bsgo dang / sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi mang du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba// phyogs cha rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad par rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjod su song ba/ 
305a2(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtshos tshogs su rtogs pa/ 'di lnga ste shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shwar bya dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub dang phyogs mtsham/ 
305a3(phal chen): dag nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi zhing lhun gyis phyogs mtshams dang / sems can gyi yul gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi mang du bya ba'i sems dang / sngon gyi mthan
305a4(phal chen): mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar phyogs bcu da ltar phyogs dang / na mkha'i dbyangs thams cad du skra'i rtse mos shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rtul shin du phra ba de gcig nas cig
305a5(phal chen): du rgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud pa bya ba'i phyogs dang / las dang 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dpung med pa'i na mkha'i dbyings kyi mang du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs
305a6(phal chen): kyi khongs su chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyibs mnyam pa nyid du gzhon par kun tu rtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam par la mnyam par sgra dbyangs ming tu bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khongs su
305a7(phal chen): chud pa'i dus gsum/ gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khongs su chud lus la mngon
305a8(phal chen): par lta ba/ dmigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pas/ skal ba thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa/ zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas sems can gyi bsams pa ji lta bzhin tu gzug
305a9(phal chen): mngon gsum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmyigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa/ sems can gyis 'dul ba rgyud mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag tha~Mng
305b1(phal chen): sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 'dzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa skal pa nyams pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su smras pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen kur ngas yongs su smin par byas pa
305b2(phal chen): dag go// sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dge/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu bsdus pa de dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba
305b3(phal chen): khaskal ba mnyam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu yongasu smin par gyur pa'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag
305b4(phal chen): kyang mthong zhing / khong du chud par 'gyur ba yan te/ la la ni chos kyi bsku la 'jug go// la la ni gzugs kyi bsku la 'jug// la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' yongs grub pa la 'jug/ la la ni pha rol tu phyin
305b5(phal chen): pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni sngon gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug/ la la ni mngon
305b6(phal chen): par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba la 'jug go// lnga la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam thar 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi snyems pa la 'jug
305b7(phal chen): man sa margyam gyi bdad pa yang dag pa mkhyen 'argya tshal 'jus no// de dga' ba bzugs spangs rgyas kyim par 'jug brgyan chos rgyas kyi ga rjod du med paston phrag cu chul phra ba srid la 'jug
305b8(phal chen): na rtsogs dang / lam rdzogs dang / blog tshogs dang / 'jug pa su tshogs dang / 'a ba chogs dang/ rnam par gyu sngag mogs pa sasu 'tha ba cwa rdzog rnaM/ byin sa rnam sa dang / 'ad ga
306a1(phal chen): mtshod dag la 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum mnyam par thams cad la thogs
306a2(phal chen): pa med pa'i yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi bzhi tha dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyibs la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
306a3(phal chen): chos na mkha'i dbyings kyi snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pas rnam par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas rnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon
306a4(phal chen): cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting de chos kyi dbyings thams cad tu thogs pa med pa/ sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gyengs
306a5(phal chen): ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyad pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 'dzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug
306a6(phal chen): go/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge ladzini thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzirar/ 
306a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gi khams rgyung thams nang kyi rgyang kyidris su 'jug pa snang rje'i snying po ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas ladren pa'i phyir gyis rlangs pa dang / byang nub sems dnga'i ting nge 'dzizhi shin
306a8(phal chen): zhi b.rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / bying nub sems dpa' ting 'angani sprul ba bzang bong mig su med pas kun du 'phrul ba'i gzugs nan dang / byang nub sems dpa'i deng la ni zhing thams cad yong su 'dun
306a9(phal chen): bya ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad mngon par 'tshong rgyal ba'i rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad dbang po'i kha dog gi rnam par spyod pa dang / 
306b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad khyad par tu 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par dpyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyis
306b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan du 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa/ mngon par sgrubs pa/ phyi ma'i mthar
306b3(phal chen): byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba rgyas mtsho 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
306b4(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs cu'i zhing rgya mtsho de ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini sems kyi skad
306b5(phal chen): cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod bcing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa tha~Md la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi
306b6(phal chen): khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bskur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dpa
