306b7(phal chen): po'i rgya mtsho rdo rje dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsku gcig pa'i snying po byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
306b8(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi tshul thams cad khongs su chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thas cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongasu bston pa'i
306b9(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skyi 'u tshugs su/ zhing la rnam par sbyong ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha
307a1(phal chen): dad pa byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon gsum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / 
307a2(phal chen): mtshan ma yongasu shes par rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi bskad cig ma thams cad chos/ 
307a3(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi rigs kyi bu rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
307a4(phal chen): dmyigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbus su ye shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i stsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbyigs pa thams nang
307a5(phal chen): kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu 'dzes pa mngon par 'grub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grong mig
307a6(phal chen): g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin chos ga gal nas thams cad 'du bar bstan pa dang / byang chub sems da 'ating nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gangs pa'i ngag gi che gi rab du 'byed bas
307a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnams par 'phrul ba rgyam che de dag la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi myul mtshan gyi byid gyis
307a8(phal chen): darlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyis mu la thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i drung nge 'dzin skal pa thams cad khong du chung bas byin tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub
307a9(phal chen): sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin tshul zhin du tha bas stobs bcu long du nung pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa slab pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems pa
307b1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun du shugs kyis mngon du 'thor ba'i sgrani dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'thor ba'i sAni dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul
307b2(phal chen): pa rnam par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad gyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du na mkha'i rgyun mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub ses
307b3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig tu 'gro ba ji skyed pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprini mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar brtul dang bral ba dang / byang chub
307b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i na mkha'i byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i brgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad
307b5(phal chen): don rnam par byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dang 'i ting nge 'dzin tus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyis rgyal mtshan dang / byang
307b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dus ba'i snying po dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskad cig skad la sngags// thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
307b7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa/ mthong ba'i yul tu snang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rdo rje seng ge ltar rab tu gnas
307b8(phal chen): kha dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pas yongasu bstan pa kun tu bstan rnam par dmigs par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams
307b9(phal chen): cad kyi sprul pa'i yongs su bstan pa kun tu bstan par dmyigs par bsgrub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'ja/ 
308a1(phal chen): dus gsum gcig tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa
308a2(phal chen): gsum gcig tu 'dzin tu pa dang / ngabyang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad ma'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi rnamakha' la rnam par
308a3(phal chen): lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho bsdud pa'i blong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi thams cad kyi bsgor 'jug pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ chos rgya mtsho thams
308a4(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'byed sa rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon
308a5(phal chen): lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting dnge 'dzin rtag thams cad kun tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams
308a6(phal chen): cad kyi rgyun gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang / rang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad
308a7(phal chen): par chen po dang / ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yang dag par rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gyengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
308a8(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par bkod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gzi rjid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / byang
308a9(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongasu bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi thams cad
308b1(phal chen): tha mi dad pa'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad mo'i byin/ rnam par 'phrul bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad tha kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud
308b2(phal chen): pos mngon par shes pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad me'i byin/ rnam par lus sems can thams cad la mngon par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / byan chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi
308b3(phal chen): dbyings kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i bzhi tha dad pa thams cad khongs tu chud pas/ mngon par shes pa dang / 
308b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa khri snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzini sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin du gtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
308b5(phal chen): nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa/ sangs
308b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgya sa kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug/ sems kyi skad
308b7(phal chen): cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du brgyus par 'gyongs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa yang rjes su zan no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshul tu phyini cing / bcom ldan
308b8(phal chen): 'das kyi spyan snar lakhod pa/ seng ge'i khri ni de rje snga chags kyi dad me'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i brtul shin du phra ba skyed mnyam par yangs pal 'khod/ ye shes mngon par shes
308b9(phal chen): shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes brno ba dang sa rje su thob pa/ ye shes kyis kun tu rnam par spyod pas// shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rig su byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon
309a1(phal chen): tu gyur pa/ ye shes kyi dmig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kho lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par nyid kyi rje su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med pas chos ston
309a2(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi ye shes thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad zhi bar gnas pa tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad rab tu zhug
309a3(phal chen): pra/ gnas med par zhing thams cad tu 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par chos thams cad blang du med pa'i gzhal med khang tu phyin pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la bzhugs pa ses
309a4(phal chen): can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes spyod yul dang ldan pa// srid pa'i rgya mtshor thams cad las gyen
309a5(phal chen): tu 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya tsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting 'dza dan gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing snying
309a6(phal chen): rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam par lta burab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bu'i zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bu
309a7(phal chen): khong du chud pa/ smra ba skad dang dbyangs thams cad bsgra brnyan lta bur rab tu rtogs rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu zhugs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu
309a8(phal chen): bsngags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
309a9(phal chen): kyi bkod pa med pa'i kun nas rab tu gnon pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyong
309b1(phal chen): pas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / shugs thob pa rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
309b2(phal chen): pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don la mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzad dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ de'i ba'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ spobs
309b3(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sgran zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyis dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta ba/ 'jig rte
309b4(phal chen): thams cad gi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa med pa'i zla bar 'gyur ba/ shes rab kyi dkyil gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dpe' byang thams
309b5(phal chen): cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes/ kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa rgyal mtshan dang / bdud thams cad kyi rgyal// mtshan rab tu stsol ba la dpal ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'a
309b6(phal chen): kyi gzi ba can 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lu sa dang ldan pa chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa zad pa/ mi zang po'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag par mtha'
309b7(phal chen): kun gyi pha rol phyi ni pa la gnas pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon gsum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa can thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyal mkhas pa/ mig gnyis pa'i rgyu la khA
309b8(phal chen): pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs nan can sdang bar gyur pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mu bsel ba la ra
309b9(phal chen): dgugs nga byinas du rgyam gyi dang pa tu kyi tho sa cad kyi yo mas kyidang chog gyur brnaMs pa nga nga bdang / ldan pa ma da 'ad pa'i rje ba'i yod nams kyi ba 'an na mas ca
310a1(phal chen): par 'phags pa phas kyi dgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshal gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi ngor 'byin pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsku mthong bas mi ngoms
310a2(phal chen): pa// sangs rgyas kyi bsku gzugs rnyan gyis dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba 'dul ba/ mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad na/ lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gyengs pa mngon par 'du bya ba med bI
310a3(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa med pa 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po theg pa'i glu dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams
310a4(phal chen): cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsams pa ji lta bzhin tu dga' nga ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu gtogs pa'i ye shes can chos thams cad bsgrubs pa med pa'i
310a5(phal chen): yul 'khor tu chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rna ma par rig pa phra ba dang / yangs pa 'dun tu yongs su bsdu ba dang khang sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab
310a6(phal chen): me la tshig dang / yi ge tha dad pa'i la 'khas pa/ tshi go dang yi ge dang / don zab par rab tu brjod pa mdo sde zab pa rab tu rjod/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud pa rab tu ston pa/ gzugs dang ye shes kyi lus
310a7(phal chen): rgyurnon po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal ba mtha' yas par yo she su 'dzin pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig tu nud par rab tu sten/ rab tu gtogs pa'i ye shes can sems kyi sang
310a8(phal chen): cig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dmyigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob/ chos thams cad kyi dbyis
310a9(phal chen): phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su bzhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin
310b1(phal chen): kha dog med pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes yang dag par bskyed do// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs/ 
310b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi kyis bston pa/ sngags pa bkur ba tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas/ yon tan dang legs pa bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdze ta'i tshal tu 'dus te/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la
310b3(phal chen): 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang partsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i long spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa de dag dang / 
310b4(phal chen): mdze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i long spyod snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob bo rga shi'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i
310b5(phal chen): rgyan mngon par mthong ba nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa der gyur to// 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi phra ba da'i sprin shin tu yangs pa 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa mngon par mthor
310b6(phal chen): te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi bral bu sprin mngon par 'thor te/ tus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin
310b7(phal chen): gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad la sku rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par 'thor te/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan pa klang bas rjes
310b8(phal chen): bskon cing / phyogs bcur rgyas par thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sman lim dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mngon par mthon pa nas byang chub sems
310b9(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgog pas phyogs bcu brgyas pas khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'dzin nas/ de bzhin
311a1(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung gi dbyings rjes su brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe' byang bzang pos rnam par rgyan pa'i sprini mang bo mngon par rdzos
311a2(phal chen): nas/ zhing thams cad kyi du 'byung ba'i sems rgyas skye ba gcig tu rgyud pa rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu'i rnas par khyabya bar gyur to// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i snying po'i snganam
311a3(phal chen): po mngon par de/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub ba'i rgyar byung ba yongasu bston cing phyogs bcur rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmyigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sma ni mang po mngon par 'thon
311a4(phal chen): nas spos sna tshogs kyi bar du 'bebs shing phyogs bcu brnyas par khyab par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang pos mthon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i yongs su
311a5(phal chen): brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par gyur to// zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes la mngon par mkhas da chos thams cad mngon par khyad par 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul
311a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi rnam par rtse ba/ dmyigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su gzugs rnyan gyi smani mang po mngon par thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
311a7(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag thams cad la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byin gyis rlab dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab
311a8(phal chen): thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprini sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab
311a9(phal chen): kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su bston par byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad ba 'di dag smras so// 'dze ta'i tshal tu sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs// mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung
311b1(phal chen): kha ltos/ dmigs pa kun las lus kyi san can rnam par// 'dzin cing phyogs rnams kun du khyad/ bder gshegs sras po sna tshogs rgyan/ kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag snyan pa dang / dmyigs pa yongs su bcad
311b2(phal chen): pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs rnan byung bar snang / rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'dre'i smani/ bder gshegs sras po rnams kyis spu rtse la// sangs brgyas gsung rnams rab tu bsgrog par byed// zhing
311b3(phal chen): mchog rnams kyi dbyings su khyab par 'phron tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra'i lus rnams dang // spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs// zhing rnaMs me tog kun las mngon thon te// bsam gartan
311b4(phal chen): yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong // kun tu bzang blo 'dre ba'i rgyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpa' byed bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// grangs med bsam yas bdar gshegs pa sru laMs// sprul pa de 'dra thogs
311b5(phal chen): pa med pa 'byung // bder gshegs sras po dus gsum 'byung dpa'i gnas// yon tan gya 'tsho leg par brjod pa dag/ brgya// mtsho che mnyam rgyal srid de dag kun// mdze ta'i na gnas shing rab tu rjod// 
311b6(phal chen): phyogs rnaMs sems can yongs kyi las// brgya mtsho chen po sA tshogs ma lus par// mdze ta'i tshal gyi gzugs rnaMs kyi// ge seb nas 'byung bar gyur pa kun tu grangs// dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal
311b7(phal chen): ba sras rnams kyi nan zhing rnams kun du ma lus rnam 'phrul pa// zhing rjes rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang // so so'i dmyigs par gyur par snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i swa ni ka/ ba sU re rer sna chog
311b8(phal chen): rnam par bye ba yi// sangs rgyas gnas rjes skad gtsug re rer snang // de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang phyogs rnams kun bkang zhi// sems can thabs kyis kun tu smin par byed// de dag zod
311b9(phal chen): las spos kyi 'od 'phro ba/ me tog phal cher rgya mtsho'i smani dang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang / ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnams mdzes pa// de dag 'od las spos thaMd nAm kun khyab byed/ 
312a1(phal chen): ga zhing gi snying po byang chub de bzhin no// dngas 'byung ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i rnam tshul du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i// brgyan rnaMs sna tshogs 'gro ba tshad med pa// phyogs rnaMs
312a2(phal chen): tus gsum kun tu gang byas rnas// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnams byas pa// de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags tshal gyi// bar snang mkhang la gzugs rten tshul tu badz+ra ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
312a3(phal chen): gyi rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re ras kyang // snying rje chen po'i bsgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i brtul phra rab snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa
312a4(phal chen): yongs su bsdu ba'i don tu zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par gzhag bu de dag gi ba spu'i bsgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa'i brtul shin phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de
312a5(phal chen): dag gi bsgor re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnas par 'phrul pa'i spyani 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi dbyings rgyas par bka/ nga nas/ sems can yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par byas dang
312a6(phal chen): 'dul bar byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bston pa'i bsgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad du bskye ba'i yongs su bstan bI bsgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan
312a7(phal chen): pa'i bsgo dang / rmi lam yongasu bstan pa'i bsgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can yongasu smin par byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung sgo dang / 'jig rte
312a8(phal chen): khams kyi sgo khas yongs su skyong ba'i bsgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa yongs su bstan pa'i bsgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan du bya ba dang / rab tu bsgrubs pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag
312a9(phal chen): gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bston pa'i bsgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bston pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam rten
312b1(phal chen): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i bsgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu btsal ba'i phyir chos
312b2(phal chen): kyi tshig dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus drangs med pa yongs su rtogs pa yongs su bstan pa'i bsgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro ba zhing // chos thams cad yongasu bri bI bsgo dang / dus la ji ltar
312b3(phal chen): khab pa dang / bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i chos rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par bya ba'i bsgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod
312b4(phal chen): nams dang / ye shes tshogs thams cad bdud dang pas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bstan pa'i bsgo dang / gzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes pa'i sa yongasu bstan
312b5(phal chen): pa'i bsgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas bI
312b6(phal chen): ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i bsgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs la yang dag par gzhol ba la shes shing mkhas
312b7(phal chen): ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i bsgo dang / de dag las sogs pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
312b8(phal chen): kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyini bar snang ngo // la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyini bar snang ngo // la la ni
312b9(phal chen): bri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par
313a1(phal chen): a/ snang ngo // la la ni 'di dgas kyi gnasu phyin par snang ngo // la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yid dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad phyin par snang ste/ mthong bas 'dul ba'i ses
313a2(phal chen): can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyis dkyil gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi phra ba rab tu bkye bas 'dul
313a3(phal chen): ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
313a4(phal chen): bsdu ba tha ni dad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'ja ma klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khas 'jam klas pa thams cad du
313a5(phal chen): brgyas par 'gyengs par byed pa snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zha bas kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i mig rab tu 'gyed bar snang / la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du yongs su
313a6(phal chen): smin par bya ba'i don tu/ gcig pu gnyis su med par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o// lA la ni dge slong ga gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la la ni brtul zhugs thams cad
313a7(phal chen): cha byad go cha dang chu zhes gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad
313a8(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i gzugs dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang gzugs dang / lus mngon par bsgrubs pa/ 
313a9(phal chen): dang / ra lus kha dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra bar dang / dbyangs rnam par tha dad pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i
313b1(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa'i dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs bcu theg pa
313b2(phal chen): la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gtung ba'i don du grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang
313b3(phal chen): ljongs dang / khas dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas med pa'i khang brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag
313b4(phal chen): dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten thams cad nyam rta ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad snyed bkur bar smon lam sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon la
313b5(phal chen): kyis rjes su 'brang bas rkang pas 'gro ba'i ris su rtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang pas 'gro ba'i ris su rtogs pa'i lha dang / chos mnyam pa mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag
313b6(phal chen): dang / snying rje chen po la rtson pa'i lus dang / ra lu ma dang mtsho dang tsha 'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od srung bas rab tu gzhal bI me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i
313b7(phal chen): gcod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dang / ma rig pa'i nun pa btsal ba la brtson pa'i lha dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i yang mngon par bsgrubs pa la mdo/ 
313b8(phal chen): par brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi na mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par
313b9(phal chen): brtsams pa la brtson pa'i dge ba'i spos mngon par 'phags pa la sems dang ldan pa ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang / byin gyis rlabs la brtson pa'i
314a1(phal chen): brtson pa'i klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro brtson bzhing dge ba'i rtsa ba spro mngon par 'phags pa la sems can dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang ba'i rtson pa'i grong gi lce dag
314a2(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du phyin pa cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dang / sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba la bzhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par la
314a3(phal chen): 'brel bar byed pa la rtson pa'i bri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par zlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas 'don pa'i smon lam gyis bzhugs pa'i na mkha'i
314a4(phal chen): lnga ti gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i de bzhi na gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yod sa su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang
314a5(phal chen): mthong na dga' bar gyur cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dab ting po dang / 'khor ba las bskyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing mdor lha'i dab kyang po dang / cher ram gro chen po rab tu byed cing / lus rab tu bdud pa'i dgra
314a6(phal chen): po dang lhan cig tu de dag gsi ram gro chen pos mngon par stod te/ mchod cang de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan dang ldan par gang gis gnas nas 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yasu bskor ba lan du ma
314a7(phal chen): zhig byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa grangs du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas lagasu rgyu zhing song ngo // / phal po che las// bam po// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs kyis tshe dang
314a8(phal chen): ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par sprul bu'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas mdze ta'i tshal tu 'byung ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
314a9(phal chen): dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yun rgyu zhing 'gro po snyam nas/ de dag dge bslong drug bcu tsam gyis mdun du byas nas/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das
314b1(phal chen): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na
314b2(phal chen): ba der dge slong drug bcu tsam dang lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung na/ ring po ma lon par gsar du bzhugs pa sha stag ste/ dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros de dag la sogs pa dge slong drug bcu tsam kun kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas
314b3(phal chen): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zab mor gyur pa dang ba'i dmig yong su dag pa/ sems can rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba la 'bru yod pas/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin nges par rdzo
314b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dang ldan pa gzhan la phan par gyur bI blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos stan pas 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du
314b5(phal chen): bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa gang na ba der don to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltar lam tu bzhugs te 'dod pa de'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la ltos nas/ dge slong dag mtsho'i blo la smras pa
314b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus dang dpe' byad bzang pos rnam par rgyan cing yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir ba'i/ bcas pa bsam gyis gyis mi khyab pa dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su
314b7(phal chen): dag cing / sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yong su bskyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi phra ba'i rgyan sems can dpa' tu med pa'i bsdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung
314b8(phal chen): ba dang / lam gi rgyan 'gron lam mig mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnams par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi 'khor thams cad la rnam par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nu
314b9(phal chen): gter chen po mngon par mthon te/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun mthun pas/ shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi cher
315a1(phal chen): mngon par 'bebs shing btud te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od bri ba'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'gyed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu bsgog cing spyi bos char pa
315a2(phal chen): la ltos shig zhes de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam tu bzhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa de dag rab tu de dag la yongs su bstan to// brjod do// smras so// dkrolo/ 
315a3(phal chen): rab tu brjod do/ rnam par phye'o// gsal bar byas so// de ltar gnas rtan sha ri'i bur 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ci tsam du brjod pa de tsam du brjod pa de tsam tu dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par gyur to// rab tu dang bA
315a4(phal chen): gyur to// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyes par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to// yid bde ba rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur to// yid bde bar
315a5(phal chen): rab tu byang bar gyur to// sems kyi bskyon dang bral bar gyur to// smrab ti thams cad phyir log par gyur to// sangs rgyas su lta ba la mngon par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub
315a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen por 'gyu ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par 'gyur to// snying rje rjen po yongs su skye bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongasu snang
315a7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// de lta de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas/ 'di skad 'dzer te/ mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung tu phyin pa mdzad du gsol lo zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
315a8(phal chen): dge slong de dag dang / 'grogs shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'di bskad ces smraso/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la lta bar 'dod pa bajog go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
315a9(phal chen): thung ba nang ga gnyis la skyo bos byag 'tshal nas/ zal ma skyed te 'di nad ces smras so kyi skyes bu dag byed mthong ba nga / khyo la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bdag cag gi dge bar bani cod kyis bakhyen pa dang/ 
315b1(phal chen): mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ khyod de 'dra ba de 'drar gyur te/ rnam pa de dang 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thom
315b2(phal chen): par shog shog/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyod ji lta bzhin du shig shig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal ba/ zhon nur
315b3(phal chen): gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di smras// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyob pa'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa smos kyang ci smos/ de bzhin ga
315b4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba pa dang / mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba la sogs pa yongs su mi skyo ba'i ses
315b5(phal chen): bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsegs pa las phyir mi ldog cing mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu
315b6(phal chen): phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongasu mi bskyo ba'i sems skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad 'jug pa la yongs su mi
315b7(phal chen): skyo ba'i ses skyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / bskal pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems/ 
315b8(phal chen): can gcig yong su smin par bya ba tshul du sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongasu mi skyo bI sems bskyed pa'o// dge slong dag yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag dang
315b9(phal chen): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i rtsa ba thaMd yong su 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'khor ba'i rgyud thos cad la phyir log par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la gyen tu 'phags par 'gyuraro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
316a1(phal chen): sa thams cad las yong su 'da' bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
316a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan gyi yon tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad la yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// de dag shes pa tha~Md kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bdud dang phas kyi dgol ba thams
316a3(phal chen): cad rnam par 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nyes par 'gyuraro// de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thob nas sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba/ 
316a4(phal chen): la chags pa med par mig yul zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig
316a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du sems can de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sase can rnaMs kyang ma lus pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang
316a6(phal chen): rnams par phye ba sna tshag su mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khas de de/ gan rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yod pa de dag kyang 'brang ba tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang / 
316a7(phal chen): long spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyings kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thob par gyur to// chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig gi dang / yi ge dang / nyes pa'i tshig dang / bskrad dang / brda'i yongs su shes pa
316a8(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' tshe rabs yang rje su dran par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges par tshig mngon par grub pa la rab tu
316a9(phal chen): zhugs par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyis rna bar 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrubs pa bcu la yang dge bar zhugs par gyur to// bstan pa'i tshul mngon par 'grub pa bcu la yang zhugs par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin de thos ma thag tu byang chub ses
316b1(phal chen): dpa' yan lag yongasu rdzogs par gyur to// dri nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongasu non par gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag gyur to// snang ba chen po rab tu thob par shes rab chen pos dkyil 'khor
316b2(phal chen): gyis snang bar 'gyur ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i mu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'ja
316b3(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho
316b4(phal chen): la bzhugs pa mngon par 'grub par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen pos rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// lus rnam par dag pas/ lus yang dag pas/ 
316b5(phal chen): lus yang dag pa rab tu thob par 'gyur to// de lus rnam par dag pa dang / nga / lus yang dag pas shes pa'i bsgo de dag shin tu yangs par// byed pas mi mnyam zhing rjes su mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to// / 
316b6(phal chen): mngon par shes pa de 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur ba'i rkang pa'i drung na yang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu grub par phyira'i phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las grub pa/ las kyi spyan mngon
316b7(phal chen): par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su btang bar dka' ba tu ma yang yongasu btang ste/ sa phyogs de ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'i
316b8(phal chen): ci dang / lto mye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyud mi 'chad par mngon par rtson pa'i gnas yong par 'khor dang bcas par gyur nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang
316b9(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen pos krung bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du ma snyed nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de dag thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par rjong/ 
317a1(phal chen): cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur na/ klu'i rgyud ba rnam par zlog ste/ lha dang mir bskye ba yong su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag rgyad bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs de'i byang chub bya ri mi ldog
317a2(phal chen): par gyur to// chos bstan pa'i tshe sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par dul bar gyur to// zhes nas dge snyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa/ dge bsnyen pa dang / dge
317a3(phal chen): bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bud mo mang po dag gis so so nas 'khor lnga rgyu dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong brdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa gyur pa gang na bar der song ngo // de la dge snyen shes chen pos byin pa
317a4(phal chen): dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga' bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / bsgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal
317a5(phal chen): dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge snyanade ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge bI dadapal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal bzang po dang / dge bsnyen ma dmyigs
317a6(phal chen): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga rgyas skor cing 'dun tu byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal ga zhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal
317a7(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la tshong dpon gyi bu rtul bzhugs bzang po dang / de dag tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam
317a8(phal chen): pa bzang po dang / mag bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / cong dpon kyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga rgyas bskor cing 'dun gyis byas na/ las dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas na 'a
317a9(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la khyod bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang po ni bu mo/ 
317b1(phal chen): bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin tu brtan pa'i blo dang / dpal bzangs mo dang / tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal kyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga rgyas skor nas 'dun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ 
317b2(phal chen): gang na ba der dong ba nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
317b3(phal chen): gyur pas skyed pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas bskyes nas bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo de dag 'dus te bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu bstan pa'i byin gyis zal gyis gnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis tsham par byas snying rje chen po'i
317b4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi sems kyis se sa dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/ tha dad ba yang dag par shes pa chen po kyang chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la ltas so// tshong
317b5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor bzangs zhes bya ba zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes bya ba de thog mar ma'i mngal tu zhug/ mthong tu khyimi de'i 'khor kun nas/ rnam par phye nas rin po che sna bdun gyi/ 
317b6(phal chen): sdong po 'thon par gyur nas/ ran po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na nor bu rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dUr+ya dang / shol dang / mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gar ba dang / 
317b7(phal chen): rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams khru bdun tsam tu sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar gyur nas rnam par snang zhing 'dzer bar gyur to/ khyam der ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga n+ya
317b8(phal chen): yang byung bar gyur te// 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod dang / mar gsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs dang thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar
317b9(phal chen): rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongasu gang ba dang / gser gyi
318a1(phal chen): snod dngul sil mas yongasu gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / 'phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po ches bye dur+ya sa yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gar pas yod
318a2(phal chen): su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gar ba'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongasu gang ba dang / a s+tha gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar bos yongasu gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod a s+tha gar pas yongasu gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar
318a3(phal chen): ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongasu gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dar gyi snong rini po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rini che'i snong lnga brgya 'dzin par gyur to// tshong dpon
318a4(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad tu nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char pa mngon par 'bab par gyur to// de la bram ze yis ltas pa
318a5(phal chen): dang / pha dang / ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa byung bar 'gyur nas/ nor bzangs zhes bya ba de ltar ming tu rtags te/ nor bzangs de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o// 
318a6(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bskod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i las yongasu sbyang
318a7(phal chen): kha la rab tu brtson pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi snod du 'gyur ba'o// bsam pa'i rnamakha' yongasu dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ tshang dpon gyi bu nor zangs
318a8(phal chen): la ltas te/ dga' ba'i rtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing thob par gyur bya ba las kyang rtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'khor
318a9(phal chen): thaMd gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa las kyang rtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad shes rab bya ba las kyang rtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang rtsis/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo dang
318b1(phal chen): sbrul bI rgyan las khyad rtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi bsku'i mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi bsku'i grub pa las kyang rtsis/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos
318b2(phal chen): kyi 'khor dang / gsung rno bar phye ba las kyang rtses/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang rtses/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas
318b3(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshor dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang 'thun pa'i rtam gyis bstan to// yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de/ dga' bI byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bI
318b4(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed tu btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu dran par byas nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong khyer gyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu chos bstan pas byin gyis rlabs te bde bar byas nas song ngo // de nas
318b5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rna pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chos nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyir bzhin du 'brang / 
318b6(phal chen): ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas la/ tshigasu bcad bde/ mngon par stod do// blo gros chen pos mtha' yas spyod yul can// khyod kyis mthu' ni sems can sman slad du// bdag kyang byang chub tu mcho
318b7(phal chen): tu zhugs par gyur// de la nges pa'i gang mchis bdag la thon// dga' ba'i chus bkang kun nas 'obs kyis bskor// nga rgyal bregs pa'i rab tu mtho bar brtsegs// sems can lam rgyud bsgo rnaMs sdud cing brdas// 'di 'dra
318b8(phal chen): 'i khyim ni srid pasum ma ni ldan che// de ni rti mug ma rig gzigs par khyebs// 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu brdungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang tu 'gyur// de la byis pa ma rig rten yang 'cha'// srid pa'i bsgo dang
318b9(phal chen): zhags pas shin tu brags// g.yo dang sgyu ma'i skyon gyis tho 'tsham zhing // the tsom yad gnyis dag gis rab rmongs pa// log par phye ni phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs// pra dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings// yi dgra
319a1(phal chen): byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu// rga shi nad dang bskye bas rab tu mnar// mgo rmongs las rgya'akhor lo bskor// de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i// dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba 'dzad// nyon mongs rgya/ 
319a2(phal chen): mtsho bskam par rab tu bshad// nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang bar 'dzod// byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor ba rdzogs shing nya// bsod nams zla 'od pa'i gzer 'gyed pa'i// sems can kun gyi gnas su de shar gyis// zla ba nya ba
319a3(phal chen): lta bur bdag snang 'dzod// bka' thub thams cad yongs su bskor mnga' zhing // chos dbyings mkha' la chags mi mnga'// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas// rgyal por gyur pas bdag la bson tu gsol// byang chub sos
319a4(phal chen): dpa'i smon lam mnga' ba ste// bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs spags shing // sems can kun la phan pa'i don tu bzhags pa yin/ ded dpon che pos bdag kyang skyabs du gsol// bzod pa brtan zhing smra ba'i go mnas shing // ye/ 
319a5(phal chen): shes spyan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas// bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon gyur par/ dga' bo chen po bdag gi gsal yang ladadzod// chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing // ting 'dzin mchog gi lha
319a6(phal chen): mos kun tu bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha mo 'dul mdzad pa// brgya bya na gyur pa bdag kyang gzigs su gsol// byis pa'i gnas gyurakhams khang na// nyon mongs las rnaMs rnam pa gsal ba mkhyen// rgyu'i sa dang
319a7(phal chen): lam rgyud 'khor mongs par// me mar bri bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol// ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnaMs rnam par sbyong // 'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las byung // bdag la'ang
319a8(phal chen): thar pa'i bsgo ni bstan du gsol// rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan// ldog 'jani sgo re'i bskyabs kyi bcad gyur gyi// bde bar ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas// thar sgo bdag la'ang myur tu dbye bar gsol// yang dag ldo rtog
319a9(phal chen): ba'i lam la mkhas gyur cing // las kyi rgyus dang sa la stengs mi mnga'// lam kun gyis 'dul bar thugs chud pas// bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsalo// yang dag lhag pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cings sa'i jang
319b1(phal chen): bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis spyan/ sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa// byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol// brgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnaMs dang // da ltar byung ba'i rgyal bar
319b2(phal chen): snang mdzad pa// sems can gtso legs gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam bston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol// las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi snyengs paka/ chos theg shing rta'i 'phrul 'khor la yang mkhyen gyur cing // ye
319b3(phal chen): shes theg pa'i lus la rnam dges pa ka/ byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad tu gsol// mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo rje srog gi shing la brten// dad pa'i nya shing rin chen legs pa yi/ byang chub theg pa bdag
319b4(phal chen): la bskyon tu gsol// tshangs pa'i spyod pa lam gyis mngon par rgyanas/ ting 'dzin bud med khrag kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs chen rab bsgrags zab// theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol// bsdu ba bzhi'i mi zang
319b5(phal chen): mdzod ldan ye shes ni// rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan// khrel yod du spel ba'i phreng bas mchod sngags pa'i// theg pa chen po dam pa bad/ ga la bstan tu gsol// sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can// 
319b6(phal chen): tshul khrims can dang snying rje'i 'byung ldan zhing // bzod pa'i zer gyis mtshan dam sbyar ba yi// theg pa'i mchog la mngon par bdag gzhag gsol// sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa// bsam gtan ting 'dzan kha khyer 'acwo
319b7(phal chen): bskyon cing / shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu la/ theg pa'i mchog la bdag gzhan gsal// smon lam gyi ni 'khor sbyor ba// chos kyi gzugs dam mthu rngan che ldan zhing / ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs
319b8(phal chen): byas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon 'gasol// kun du bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing // sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs pa med// kun tu bzang po'i skyed pas gnon gyur pa'i// ye shes theg pa bdag la gzhag du ga la// 
319b9(phal chen): de ni rten pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa// ye shes sgyu mas legs bsgrubs shing / sgrab dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa'i/ bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyol bar gsol// 'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa// sems can
321a1(phal chen): thams cad skyob par bde bsgrub cing / chos dbyings shin tu rgyu che rnams snang ba'i// byang chub theg la bdag la skyon du gsol/ sdug bsngal phung por rab tu gcod byed pa/ nyon mongs las kyi chung mnga' skyon sel bcing // 
321a2(phal chen): bdud kyi phas dgol kun kyang 'jom pa yi/ chos kyi theg pa bdag la skyon tu gsol/ phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes snang ba che/ chos dbyings na mkha' rnam par grub byed cing / sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i// chos
321a3(phal chen): kyi theg pa la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// rnam dag mkha' ldan tshad med mi zag pa/ sred pa dang rig lta ni skyon med pa/ sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa bdag la skyon tu gsol// rlung chen langs
321a4(phal chen): pa'i shugs kyis shugs ldan pas// smon lam mthu'i sa 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing // zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i// chos kyi theg pa bdag kyang skyon tu gsol// sa chen bzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying rje'i 'a
321a5(phal chen): thu' dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer mtsho na ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / bsdu ba'i rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ 
321a6(phal chen): banus kyi stongs mtshad dam pa 'o cang b.le/ yi shes kyi bdagal bstan tugasas// 'arnam pa nga po na ma grus chu tshul dngas kun sangs bur bas rje gang gis 'dus pa'i cho
321a7(phal chen): khyer gzhon gyur pa'i// shes ldan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la rtsal du gsol// sangs rgyas legs bslabs phan sum gyi/ ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la// tshad med rgya mtsho blo mangs bslabs gyur pa/ de legs ci 'dra
321a8(phal chen): 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol// gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs rgyan te// chos kyi dbu thogs dam pa'i dbu bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ de nas
321a9(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// glang po che'i lta stangs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge ba'i gshe
321b1(phal chen): gnyen du rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'dod de// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bri bar bsam pa legaso legaso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// dge ba'i gshes gnyen la snyen cing bstan
321b2(phal chen): pa dang / ri grong bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu grub par 'gyur ba'i bzhi yin te// 'di'i mthu'i rgyu'o ma yin gyi rigs kyi bu de bas nan khyod kyis dge'i bshes gnyen bkur bsti byed cing de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu ga
321b3(phal chen): te/ dre bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ches dkon no// rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams
321b4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar gtogs pa thob par gyis shig/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen yongasu brtsal ba yongasu skyo bar yid med par gyis shig/ 
321b5(phal chen): dge ba'i gshes gnyen lta ba la ngoms pa med pa gyis shig/ dge/ ba'i gshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyi shi ga/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen kyis thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khyod kyis
321b6(phal chen): khong du khro ba med par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyal po 'di nyid na/ yul me mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod do// de ni dngul legs ba zhes bya bA ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug
321b7(phal chen): gis de'i gan tu song la 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par brtsams par bya ba dang / ji ltar
321b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yong su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba 'i dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub
321b9(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar rdza su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par bya ba dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yong su rdzogs par/ 
322a1(phal chen): 'gyur ba bris shig dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyes de khyod la kun tu 'azang po'i dkyil 'khor ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
322a2(phal chen): ba la lan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor bya byas nas/ lan rgya stong du mar phyir lhag te/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen yid la 'ong ba'i sems can ldan pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen mi mthong mi bzod do// gdong mchi mas gang bar bya
322a3(phal chen): zhing / 'jamra dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mtha' yas kyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya bar song ste/ phyin nas yul mi mo gya nom snang nas rnam par rgyu ste/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas kya
322a4(phal chen): zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis rlabs pa'i long spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongasu spyod cing // ri 'gul legs pa gang na ba der phyin/ 'gul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la chos tshol zhing / shar phyogasu logs su
322a5(phal chen): byung ngo // de bzhin tu lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tsha/ mas dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'a/ tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / zla 'og tu yang lta zhing / 
322a6(phal chen): dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol lo ba las/ des bzhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ra rtse gcig gis sman ljongs na 'jam cing 'a drug pa mthong nas/ de dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge
322a7(phal chen): slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa la phyag btsal nas/ dge slong sman gyi dpal la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ 'dun tu 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba nas/ 'di bskad ces smras so// 'phags pas thugasu chud par bya ba 'dzad du gsol
322a8(phal chen): bdag gis dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa nas/ ji ltar byang chu sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la bslabs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyid pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod brtsa ma
322a9(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar ba nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub
322b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'dug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs pa dang / ji ltar brgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
322b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rngams pa dang rje su ston pa mthong nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
322b3(phal chen): dpa' bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol ka/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin kyi dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la/ 'di bskad ces smras so// 
322b4(phal chen): rigs kyi du de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar sems skyed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyo da pa yong su 'bri ba leg so ldeg so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub
322b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang brjesu dran par bya ba// dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bskyod pa dang / byang chu ba sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rje su 'brang dang / byang chub seMs
322b6(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de dag la mngon par mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lnga ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi na mkha' de la rjes lnga bar bya ba
322b7(phal chen): byed do// mthar kyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i gangan ba deng / dge slong rgyamatsho'i sprin gang na 'dor byinan dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i snyan gyi rkang pa gnyis spyi bo'i phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin las lan tu stong du ma
322b8(phal chen): la du bsar ba byas nas dge slong rgyam ma smin gyi mdur du 'dug sa/ rnal mo sbyi nas 'dib sa pos smras so// 'phags pa bdag nican byed de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyu bar du chug pa de/ ldan rje
322b9(phal chen): pa yang dag par ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ dge slong rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su grub par 'gyur
323a1(phal chen): ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya 'tsho las rgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya 'tshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'grub par 'gyur ba/ 
323a2(phal chen): dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi khyod lor 'jug
323a3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu bston pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho yong su skyems shing / snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar
323a4(phal chen): byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / ldog par ltung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa kyi sgo spyod cing / mtho ris dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi bsgo rnams par gcod
323a5(phal chen): cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi bsgo rnam pa 'byed pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsdu dba'i smon lam yongs su sems can bskyed par 'tshal to// de bskad
323a6(phal chen): ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgyu mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa legaso legaso// rig
323a7(phal chen): kyi bu dge pa'i skye ba ma skyes pa'i skyems can nas ni byeng nub tu sems kyang mi ba skye ba'i dge pa'i rtsa ba'i zlo kun tu snang bar 'du dzu ba dang / thams cad kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam ting nga 'dzin gyi ye shes sdang ngas rangab tu spang bgyur
323a8(phal chen): dang / ba nganam rgyam ma sa pa chen po gsags pa dang / da' ba tshigs thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par dang / dge ba'i gces gakhyen rnams cad kur bas yongs dusgyu med pa dang / lus dang sron pa me 'aM
323a9(phal chen): ma rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin 'jams cad dral ba dang / mngon can med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang gizhan gyis snying rjezhi byas pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyis rgyud thams cad gnas par
323b1(phal chen): 'dun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par moso bI sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la skos
323b2(phal chen): par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi bde ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par zlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i seMs
323b3(phal chen): dang / 'gri ba thams cad kyi bstug las yongasu bsrang bI phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / bsgrub pa thams cad yongs rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongasu rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rna
323b4(phal chen): par dag pa yongasu rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par yongasu rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po yongasu rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'grub pa rnams par dag pa
323b5(phal chen): yongasu rtsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa yongasu bsta/ na pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i snying brje'i rgyu yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta bzhin/ 
323b6(phal chen): tu rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'di sa pa'i bsgo yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi 'du sa byas dang / 'dus ma byas dab kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pa mi gos pa'i
323b7(phal chen): rlud yongasu btsal ba 'di ni dka'o shin tu dka'o// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig gi rnam par dag pas shin tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyini phyogs med pa
323b8(phal chen): dang / yul la thogs pa med pas bsgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la 'khas pa dang / mig gi yul kun lA yongasu rnar dag bI lus rno bar dag pa dang / phyogs kyi 'dzi blas pa thaMd tu mngon pa 'dud bI lus kyi sa 'dud pa la
323b9(phal chen): mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin gyi yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyi stobs kyis rgyud thams cad nas mngon par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
324a1(phal chen): a pa gcig kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas gnyis dang / bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba rgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
324a2(phal chen): khrig rgya phrag stong dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ batshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
324a3(phal chen): dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang stong gnyis pa dang / stong
324a4(phal chen): gsum pa'i stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang ma thong ngo // de bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang sangs brgyas kyi zhing bye bI brtul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
324a5(phal chen): stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rtul shi rkyen tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba rgya phrag stong gi rdul shin/ tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs
324a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // shar phyogs logasu ji ltar ba bzhin tu phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / 
324a7(phal chen): lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang d+ma'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med bI yang rjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang
324a8(phal chen): mthong ste/ re res rnam par ltas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog tshogs mnga' bas dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / mngon par sprul ba sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 
324a9(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang rnam par sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba sna tshogs kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa dang / pho brang dang / rgyan sna tshogs mnga'
324b1(phal chen): ba dang / sku che'i tshad rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par dmigs par 'dzad pa dang / mngon par 'tshang brgya ba rnams par dag pa'i bsgo rnams pa 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi/ 
324b2(phal chen): khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo // de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni bsgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig par la yang dag par gzhol/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thos par zad na/ byang chub
324b3(phal chen): sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i bsgo kun na
324b4(phal chen): snang ba dkyil 'khor rab tu thob par dang / bsam pa ji ltar bzhin tu rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i bsgo btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin
324b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjesu 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i bsgo stobs rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos ma de nyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la lta
324b6(phal chen): bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rtogs pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi phyogs thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha dad pa lag 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab
324b7(phal chen): tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bA dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
324b8(phal chen): pa 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dmigs pa dang / mo 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i bsgo bskal par sgo btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad
324b9(phal chen): tu de de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang / mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgo dusu sgro btags pa dang rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/ mngon par 'phags shing zil
325a1(phal chen): gyis non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yong su mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang / rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas bran pa'i bsgo zhing du bsgo btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil
325a2(phal chen): 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i bsgo dus gsum tu sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas
325a3(phal chen): gcig tu rgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas sangs rgyas dran pa'i bsgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis bskad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
325a4(phal chen): pa thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams pa dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i bsgo bzhi pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyan gcig tu gnas pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
325a5(phal chen): gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rjes su bra ngan pa'i ba'i bsgo bral bas sgo btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa re re dkyil mo dkrung du zhugs pas kyang chos kyi
325a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dang migs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i bsgo shin tu yongasu bsgo rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sgra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs
325a7(phal chen): rgyas brjod du med pa 'byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgro shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang
325a8(phal chen): rgyu zhing rnam par 'phrul pa bston pa rnams par 'phrul bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su ba'i sgorgyan du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 
325a9(phal chen): mi shes snang bar tu thong bas spangs rgyas rjes su zan pa'i slad dngas par spo rtags pa ba tu thob pa dang / shes rab kyi sems dang / bsam pa'i la lhas na de banan gshegs pa thams cad rab tu snang ba
325b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas dran pas sangs rgyas kyi bsgo sems kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam rnam pa ji lta bur btags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongasu ston pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rje su bran pa'i sgo
325b2(phal chen): las kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus par thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyis rgyan/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon gsum du dmyigs pas gang gis
325b3(phal chen): rjesu dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sgrani yangs bsgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang / na mkha' kun tu snang ba gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su
325b4(phal chen): dran pa'i bsgo na mkha'i sa sgro btags pa rab tu thob par de dag gi spyod pa'i/ yon tan brjod par nus ri skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di ni/ phyogs kyi ljongs 'di nyid na/ mtsho'i bsgo zhes bya ba yod pa de ni dge
325b5(phal chen): brgya mtsho'i srin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan tu song la/ ji ltar byang / chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba/ dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba bris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i
325b6(phal chen): gshes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshig dang rgyu yongasu ston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyis rgya chen po'i khong du chud par byed do// dge ba'i stobs dang shugs rgya chen po yang yongasu bskyed par byed do// byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs
325b7(phal chen): dang rgyu rgya chen po yang yongasu brjod par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sdang bar gyur pa'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skye bar byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshigs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do// spyod pa rgya
325b8(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po yang rab tu bston par byed do// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yong su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i spongs
325b9(phal chen): rgya chen po yong su 'phel bar byed do// de nas dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong sngon gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas ge slong gi dpal la lan brgya stong du ma g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya
326a1(phal chen): bstod du mar byar ldas te/ dge slong sbyin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song // 'phags pa 'dus pa na po che sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las/ dbam po dgu bcu rnam pa'o// 
326a2(phal chen): na tsong dan gyi thunang ba sa dag pa gshes gnyin gyi sa dang sangs de bani rje su bas marnam par brjog pa'i byang chags bamed pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dakhyim thams cad rgyas par dag pa'i phyir byibyin pa'i sems dang / 
326a3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir/ bri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa sa
