326a4(phal chen): lus ye shes kyis khyab rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya
326a5(phal chen): mtsho'i bsgo 'di lo bcu gnyis su mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon pa ra du byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho che zhing tshad med pa la rjesu bsam/ pa dang / bri med cing dang ba dang / zab cing rting dpag dka' ba dang / bag
326a6(phal chen): gis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas tu mas rnam par rgyan pa dang / phung po med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad 'a mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po'i mtha' yas pa'i nA
326a7(phal chen): su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten tu 'gyur ba dang / sprin gyi chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang // zhig 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la brjesu sems med cing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di
326a8(phal chen): bsnyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags pa rgya chen pa/ 'di bas kyang yangs shing / 'di bas kyang tshad med pa/ 'di bas kyang ngo 'tshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod
326a9(phal chen): dam snyam ste/ de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la rtson par gnas par tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi las pad mo chen po rin po che ani 'bra ni la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bu smra ba'i nu ba can/ nor bu rin
326b1(phal chen): tha che bai dUr+ya'i dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa 'dzam bu ri chu klung gi gser ltar bri ma med pa'i lo rgya chen po can/ dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che.a sgra gar ba'i ze ba can dang / rgya mtshotshas
326b2(phal chen): du yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha ma yin gyi bu dbang po rgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung / rin po che sna tshogs brgya ba stong phrag gi bra bas kun nas g.yogs pa'i b+hu'i rgyal po rgya stong phrag bcus spos chu mngon
326b3(phal chen): bar phab pa/ na mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang / se mo do mang po chus bzung zhing rab spyad do// mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas lha
326b4(phal chen): ba dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rgya stong phrag bcu 'khor bar mngon par 'dud pa/ srid po'i dbang po rgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa/ bri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang / klu'i
326b5(phal chen): sna tshogs snyan pas snyan cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin rgya stong phra ga bcus lnga brdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdu/ ga spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / bdugs dang / 
326b6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi tshar mngon par phab pa tshangs pa'i dbang po rgya phrag bcus spyi bos rtags te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa gnas rtsang ba'i ris rgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal ba/ mAM/ 
326b7(phal chen): dbang po 'khor lo bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rib po che bdun gyi spu zhing mchod pa rgya mtsho'i lha rgya bstong phrag bcu mngon par thon cig phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che bskar ma'i ngang brgya phrag stong bcu'i 'od zer gyi rab
326b8(phal chen): tu snang ba byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis rgyan stong phrag bcus khongasu phebs par 'brel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba rgya phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor
326b9(phal chen): bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar ba dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu kho bos bskal ba thams cad du gnas pa rgyun
327a1(phal chen): mi 'cha pa'i phyir sngon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / bsam 'ji lta ba bzhin tu rje su 'drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / stongs bcu'i ye shes
327a2(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i phyir snang ba yong su dag pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems can mtshol bzhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba dang / sems can thams
327a3(phal chen): cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing / rim gro byed pa'i stobs
327a4(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rigs pas/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan bras yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la bzhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams
327a5(phal chen): cad du bzhags pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskurarab mngon par bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i bskad rgya mtsho la bzhag sa pa 'am shes pa'i/ yon ton brjod pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi/ 
327a6(phal chen): bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug bcu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'dini dan lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa rnams la spyod pa yo da de/ de nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan tu
327a7(phal chen): song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dang 'byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ba bris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong rgya mtsho'i sman gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong
327a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i smani la lan rgya stod du ma drug yas phyog su bskor 'byas nas/ 'di dang yang ltas te/ dge slong mya mtsho'i sman gyi drung nas sang ngo // de nas nong dpon gyi bu nor pa 'angs dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi brnams ngan deg/ 
327a9(phal chen): dang / kun nas mig gtses kyi rnam drongs de na rje su dran par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsams pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang / yi ga'i sprin de dag kyang yong su bzung ba dang / chos kyi rdo rgya
327b1(phal chen): mtsha'i nul de dag la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de dag la yang rjes su rnam par ltas pa dang / chos kyi le'u dang / glong gi nul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi rnamakha' de la yang dag par gcol
327b2(phal chen): bar byed pa dang / chos kyi gakho lo dri yang rjesu sbyang bar byas pa dang / chos kyi rin po rtse'i gling de yang rjesu bsams shing / mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs zhes bya ba'i ngogs zhes bya ba gang na ba der byani nas dge
327b3(phal chen): slod shin tu brtan pa mthong ba dga' zhing shar phyogs su ltaso// de bzhin tu lho drung / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'dzums dang / nub
327b4(phal chen): byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / bla dang 'og gau dang yang dge slong shin tu rten ba mthong bar dga' ste/ kun tu ltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu rtan pa na mkha'i dbyings lha rgya stong grangs med pas yongasu bskor cing / phan tshu
327b5(phal chen): chags pa mthong ngo // na mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis da ge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las/ lha rdzas kyi me tog si rgyal ma'i sran gyis g.yogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin bsgra da
327b6(phal chen): dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan kyis rgyan par 'thong ngo // klu'i dbang po rnaMs kyis na mkha' de la/ a ka ru nar po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sgran shin tu 'thon pa las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo // mi
327b7(phal chen): 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis na mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rlung du gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzod sna tshogs rgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas/ nor bu rin po che 'bar brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogasu
327b8(phal chen): rgyan ga nod bu rin po che me kyi rgyal ba rgya sang phrag 'acus mi da pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin pa me nyi ma'i snying po rgya drug bcus rgya tshong gsal par sgrubs pa/ nor bu rini ba che 'bar ba rgya stong blag bcus kha dog sna tsog su rgya du rnaM
327b9(phal chen): bu rini po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po rgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar dbya ba 'byung ste/ pad mo chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i/ byang chub sems
328a1(phal chen): dpa'i bsam ngas yongasu bdun pa'o// phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos 'byung ba'o// rjen pa'i dri med pa'i las kyis 'byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam/ 
328a2(phal chen): byas rgyan pa'o// thal ma sa bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su 'byung ba'o// mngon par du bya ba'i med pa'i thos kyi rgyal gyi rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan dzim/ phyogs kyi khas kun nuchos bye byi
328a3(phal chen): bar 'byings pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun par ste/ de'i rnam pa dang / yan tan dang / dbyings dang / kha dog dang / brgyan gyi thar pa ni bskal brgya stong phrag med par yang khong du chung par bya mi nus te/ pad mi chen pa
328a4(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku drung du bzhugs pas khyab cing yongs rgyas nga bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs bI bsku'i de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas ma klas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gtso
328a5(phal chen): ba'i bdan gyi brgyan gyisim gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi da kyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs
328a6(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpa' byad bzang po brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnar dag
328a7(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi rtsug rnar mi 'thong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rdong / sangs rgyas kyi gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bas
328a8(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so// stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi snyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi
328a9(phal chen): khyab pa dang yongs so// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rje su bran no// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / chos kyi
328b1(phal chen): nr-i ts+yai DU sgra so rnags pa sa bcom dang / ldan tsugs pa'i ma nga/ rgyun lam gyim mabyung bzlas so// gams gan ba nang pa cad can pa ma kyis mi bye pa dang
328b2(phal chen): can don dang dgos pa pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba yang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa rkyang zhing kho bos// 'ogo la byugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas
328b3(phal chen): mig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi dang / rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing / snang ba
328b4(phal chen): byed pa dang / zheng gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongasu snang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jo
328b5(phal chen): pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tsham par byed pa/ sem sa can thams cad kyi sems can thabs po rab tu snang bar byed pa'o/ na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par dmigs
328b6(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang / 'bru sna nga bar byed pa'i yang bstan te/ kho bos kun nas mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs te/ bzung ba de la'ang bri na ni/ snag tsha rgya mtsho/ 
328b7(phal chen): chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang / myu gu'i phung po ri rab ra'i brgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs des na/ le'u re re'i dang / bsgo re re dang / chos kyi tshul re re dang / chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba re re las
328b8(phal chen): kyang zad pa 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa/ mtha' med bzad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig
328b9(phal chen): ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig gcig thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang ba le'u grangs med pa zhig khongasu chud do// zhi ba'i bsgo'i gzungs gi 'od zer snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhug stod/ blo mtha'
329a1(phal chen): gams pa'i gzungs kyi 'ad snang bas le nu grangs med pazhog la yang dag par 'jug go// sa la rnam par spyod cing yongs su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs bya'od zer srung bas le'u grangs med pa nan
329a2(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba byas nas/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig blangs so// pad mo'i rgyun gi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrub por
329a3(phal chen): dbyangs kyi tshul gi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do/ nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o// bskar ma rtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od
329a4(phal chen): snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas bur bya'o// rgya mtsho'i bsnying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yo dusu bkod do// kho bos drung nas shar phyogs logs nas lha dang / wA
329a5(phal chen): dbang po dang / klu'i'i/ klu'i dbang po'i/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod/ sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ briShe/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ na mkha' lding dang / nam
329a6(phal chen): lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dang / lto 'phye chen po dbang po dang / mi 'am ci 'am dbang po 'am/ tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ sems can
329a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing btsud de/ de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid
329a8(phal chen): la mos par bya'o// rtag tu btsud do// yongasu bstan to/ yang dag par brjod do// yongasu bsam par bya'o// rnam par phye'o// rgyas par bya'o// mngon par bston to// rnam par bkrol lo// rab tu phye'o// shin tu smang
329a9(phal chen): bar byas so// de ltar shar phyogs kyi ji lta ba bzhin tu lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i mtshams dang / de lho nub kyi phyogros 'tshams dang / nab byang gi phyogs nas
329b1(phal chen): sems can gang su dag 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun nas snga ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de kho bo na chos kyi rnam drangs gcig gcig shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yong su dag gis sdod pa'i rol mo
329b2(phal chen): chung ba dang / bkrol ba dang / klur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad skyong zhing blangs pa thos par 'gyur to// lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnam gyi na mkha'i de la gos shin tu phra ba shin du phra zhing mdog bzung po'i sprin bsam
329b3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa dag dkye ste/ dge slong shin tu rten pa la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo // lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang na mkha'i de la nor bu rin po che'i sman bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyi
329b4(phal chen): rlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan pa'i byas pa mthong ngo // na mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang mi'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyings su 'khor cing na mkha' lngang dbang po'i mas kunas
329b5(phal chen): bskor to// gsol ba me ba la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te/ gnas da pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gi dbang po rgyu stong 'khor dang bcas pa btsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la
329b6(phal chen): shin tu bstug pa'i gzugasu dge slong shin tu rtun pa la byas pa'i ma thu dang ldan par 'khod pa thong ngo // sran po'i dbang po rgya stong khor dang bcas pas bsam gis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la dge slong
329b7(phal chen): shin tu rten pa yongs su byed cing kun tu bya ba mthong ngo // tshangs pa'i dbang po rgya byin stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid tu 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyun gyis bston pa rab tu brjod
329b8(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // rtsa ma'i lha'i rgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' la dge slong shin tu rten pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar cing gzhal yas khang gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gi bu
329b9(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar na mkha'i dbyings la chags shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dga' rangs te 'gu zhing nyams bde ba tshim zhing 'di dang bskyes nas/ dge slong shin tu rten pa la thal mo sbyar
330a1(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas 'di bskad smras so// 'phags pa dag gis bla na med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub ses dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos tsal bar bya ba/ 
330a2(phal chen): dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu
330a3(phal chen): smon par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi rje su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brtul bar bgyi/ pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas
330a4(phal chen): kyi chos yongasu bskor bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa 'a sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub seMs
330a5(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi bar 'tshal te/ 'ang gas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjes bstan bur mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji
330a6(phal chen): lngar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dang / bskol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang
330a7(phal chen): mi 'bral bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur/ 
330a8(phal chen): ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon la tha~Md dang mi ldan pa dang / bskal pa zad/ 
330a9(phal chen): tu gnas pas yong su skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yong su dag par bya bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas
330b1(phal chen): bar dag ba dang / mi 'brang bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul du thams cad dmigs pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi nam ngar 'brel bdan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
330b2(phal chen): kyi chos kyi sbyini yongs su bzung ba'i spyad du chos mnyam pa dang ma mnyam bu dang / dus gsum gi ye shes khong du rlung nga / rjesu bstan pa'i dgye ba'i slad du ye shes snang ba dang / mi 'brel bar 'gyur ba dre dga'
330b3(phal chen): bstan tu gsol/ de bskad ces gasgrol pa dang / dge slong shin tu rtun pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag bya rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs
330b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang / rang byung gi chos bri ba leg so legaso// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i bsgo thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
330b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i rdzogs pa med pa'i bsgo de khos b+hAdangs te/ bzung ba nas rjes su 'brang bar rnam par bye ba dang / rnam dbar spyad pa dang / rnam par rten pa dang / sdung ba byung / rab tu snang ba
330b6(phal chen): bya ba dang / thogs pa med par thad zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob po/ de thob pas kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi sems can spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa medo/ sems can thams cad
330b7(phal chen): kyi skye ba dang / 'pho ba yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med/ sngon gyi gnas rje su dran par bya ba'i bskor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// phyi mas mtha'i bskal bar 'gro ba'i la thams cad kyi skye dang / 'gro bar bya ba'i lha
330b8(phal chen): thogs pa medado/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba'i thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med pado/ sems can tha~Md kyi sgra skad dang / kun rdzob yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa medo/ sems can thams cad kyi the tso
330b9(phal chen): gcad par bya ba'i la thon pa med do// sems can tha~Md kyi dbang po tha dad pa khongasu chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus su 'gro ba la thogs pa med do// nyin mchis
331a1(phal chen): dang / skad cig dang / yid tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus kyi mang tu ma yang du rgyung byar byab la thogs pa med do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyun tu 'jug par bya' la thogs pa med/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'a ra
331a2(phal chen): gi lus kyis rgyas par bya ba la thogs pa med pa dang / der de ltar dngos med pa la gnas shing dngos po med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob par phyir te/ rigs kyi dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin
331a3(phal chen): de kho bon ma nyid gyis 'di las ngan tshun du grog 'dun pa dang / skes pa dang / spyod yang gA tsog su skyed do// mi snang ba med/ snang bar 'gyu ba med/ 'brab 'phrul ba byed do// me lce'abar bar byed de/ da du
331a4(phal chen): shing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por byas shing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang nga dang mi snang bar yang nyesu myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la yang thogs pa med pa dang / ra ba la yang thogs pa med par 'gro ste/ dper nan mkha'
331a5(phal chen): la yang bya bzhin no// namakha' la yang dkyil mo krung gis 'gro nga ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang bye'u dul dang / steng du 'byung ba byed do// dper na tshul bya bzhin no// chu la bying ba med
331a6(phal chen): par dper na sa la bya bzhin no// tu ba 'thul ba dang me 'bar bar byed do// dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// sa yang yongasu g.yo bar byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di nyid de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar 'thu che ba/ de ltar
331a7(phal chen): gzi brjid ce yang lag pas kun nas yongasu zhu go/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyi dbang sgyur/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu dud pa na kun du chags pa'i sprin gyis khyebs par byas shing / rab tu 'bar bar byed do// 
331a8(phal chen): rin po che yang thams cad kyi 'od kyi stan gyi bri bas 'jig rten gyi bya khyebs par byas shing / 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i srin rab tu 'gyed do// khe dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer gyi bri ba'i sgra ni rab tu bkye zhing / 
331a9(phal chen): kun du yang 'gro stenang 'di ltar shang phyob su yang 'gro bste/ lho phyogs su dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
331b1(phal chen): mtshams dang / nub byang gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs 'tsham su yang 'gro ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig re re yang / shar phyogs logro su 'jig rten gyi khaMs gcig dang 'dra/ 'jig rten gyi khams
331b2(phal chen): gnyis dang / bcu yang / 'jog 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jog rten gyi zhes sbyong dang / 'jig rten gyi khes rgya brag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khom bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'dzi
331b3(phal chen): rten gyi khas mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas gzhal tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi ldes mu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas mtshams med pa dang / 'jig rten
331b4(phal chen): gyi khas rgyan co rjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khas kun tu de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'dzag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag dang / 'dzag rten gyi
331b5(phal chen): khas 'jam klas de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khas phyogs de dang de dgadang / 'dzag rten gyi khas rgyu de dang / 'jig rten gyi khas yongasu la du ba de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dag dang / 'jig rten rgya
331b6(phal chen): khams kyi snying po byang chub yong su bkod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas kyi dkyil 'khor de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji ste da cig chos bston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las de bzhin ga bye
331b7(phal chen): ba re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re'i zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthas yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i srin gyi char 'bebs shing
331b8(phal chen): sbyar sngar 'bru'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / bye ma thams cad dang / byug bajams cad dang / na rba dang / rgya mtsho thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams
331b9(phal chen): cad dang / blar thams cad dang / phra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang
332a1(phal chen): dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par rjod pa dang / yongasu brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad dang shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
332a2(phal chen): de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang yongasu bran no// shar phyogs ji lta bu de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / 
332a3(phal chen): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs 'tshamasu dang / yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu
332a4(phal chen): yang bda'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan/ 'jig rten gyi khas/ sangs brgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i yang rjod du med pa'i 'dral zhing gi shin tu phra ba snyed gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dag
332a5(phal chen): bda'o// 'jig brten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ sa ji skad cig bzhugs shing mtsho bskyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khas rgya mtsho de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dag nas
332a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor de dang / de dag na chos bsngon pa'i de dag kun kyang mthong kyango // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas gzugs thams cad kyi mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom
332a7(phal chen): ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa
332a8(phal chen): de dag gsung ba nas rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongasu shes shing 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad chags pa
332a9(phal chen): 'am/ bzung ba 'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed kho byos mthong bar gyur pa/ de dag kun la'ang yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyis de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus
332b1(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs so// sems can ji snyed cig kho bos drung tu 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'dod pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gnon pa don yod pa la rab
332b2(phal chen): tu gzhog go// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni rigs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i thogs pa med pa'i bsgo kun tu 'gro ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rimi 'gro rab tu sbyar ba rab sems can yongasu smin
332b3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / mthun par 'di shes par zad na kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i nga tshul can theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dnga'i lam dang 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can// thogs pa med
332b4(phal chen): med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ sangs rgyas rgya chos la lhag par dmigs
332b5(phal chen): ba'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i ngang ngang tshul can nam/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul
332b6(phal chen): can/ 'god pa'i ngang tshul can/ glags med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'bre sa pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub seMs
332b7(phal chen): dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ bra ba'i klung grong brdal rdo rje'i khyer zhes bya ba yod do// de bi la sbyin ces bya ba
332b8(phal chen): 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs pa dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba la bris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi du nor bzangs kyis dge slong rab tu brtan
332b9(phal chen): kha'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum rgya stong tu mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dag par ltas nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drang nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
333a1(phal chen): chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang / byin gyis gnon pa/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bdud mi 'chad par la rab tu rtson pa dus gsum snang bar gyur pa/ smon lam
333a2(phal chen): chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khas thams cad yongasu bskyab par bya ba'i drabs la bzhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi khas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
333a3(phal chen): nges rtogs par bya ba la rtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang bas de
333a4(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen rje su bran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su brdzogs par byed cing mthar gyis phra ba'i lang gi grong rdal rdo rje'i khyer du phyin nas/ dra ba
333a5(phal chen): li'i sprin yongasu tshol ba las khrod khyer gyi khyams zhig na chos bstan du seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la chos kyi brangs yi ge'i seng ge'i rgyud kyi rgyud ces bya ba yongasu bsngon
333a6(phal chen): cad mthong ngo / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ pra ba la'i sprin gyi rkang pabI l+la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dra ba li'i sprin la rgya stod du mas g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas 'dun tu 'dug cing / thal mo sbyar ba nas
333a7(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba la bslabs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan na
333a8(phal chen): tu bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud du nub po mtshal ba dang / ji ltar yong su bskyob par ma mchis par dran par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa
333a9(phal chen): yongasu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongasu skyo ba ma mchis la shing snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sgo kunas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i
333b1(phal chen): rab rab dang / bsgrub pa ma mchis pa rnam par 'thor cing / shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa'i// 
333b2(phal chen): dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rtogs shing / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yong su gnon
333b3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos tha~Md kyi phyogs rig pa'i snang ba rjesu rtogs shing / rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad don rnam par gdon mi za/ 
333b4(phal chen): bar rab tu dbye ba la rtson par 'grub par 'gyur bar ma 'tshal te/ de nas pra bi li'i sprin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i khri de las langs te babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus
333b5(phal chen): thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi nga me tog phung pos mngon par gtor ro// nor bu rin po cher ni thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye na mang pos kyang mngon par 'thor ro// gro/ 
333b6(phal chen): mtshon sna tshogs tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag tu mas kyang nga mngon par bkab po/ spos gyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad / pa yad tu 'ong ba/ lta na bstug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor
333b7(phal chen): nas/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po sna tshogs gzhan dag gas kyang mchod pa dang / ri gro dang / bkur sti dang / sde sdang dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu nor zangs khyod kyis de ltar
333b8(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa leg so legaso// rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi bdud rlud mi gcod pa
333b9(phal chen): phyir zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bI rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par bya ba yin/ zhing gi rgyud tha~Md kyi gtung gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin
334a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / 'dul ba la sta gon tu gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thaMd yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu brtag pa la rtson pa dang / lus kyi rigs thams cad dang / mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems
334a2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs kyi tha~Md yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu ba'i rtson pa'i smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir yang dag par bzhugs pa ya ni/ tus gsum gyi rlung thaMd ye shes kyis khong du chud
334a3(phal chen): bar bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos bI rigs shin tu rtam pa'i phyir rtson pa yin/ tergyu de bzhin gshegs pa mang po tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems/ 
334a4(phal chen): dpe'i thad dang nyams pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa tha~Md kyis rje su dran pa bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po tha~Md kyis yang dag par mchod pa yi/ 
334a5(phal chen): gnod byin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par srung ba yan/ srin bo'i dbang po tha~Md kyis rim gror byas pa yin// klu'i/ mi'i rgyu ci'i dbang po tha~Md kyis stong pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams
334a6(phal chen): cad kyis yang dag por bsngags pa ya ni/ des ni sems can gyi khas thas cad kyang ngan song gi lo rgyud gsum po yongasu bcad pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song 'gro'i lo tha~Md zlog pa dang / dbul ba'i
334a7(phal chen): lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang me'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyan par dang bral
334a8(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yong su sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
334a9(phal chen): dpa'i le gas 'ongs su chung bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par byabs dadugs 'byon par byab yin no// rigs kyi bu de la bdag ni 'di bskad du sems te byang chub sems dang 'a rnams
334b1(phal chen): la rka ba byed de/ 'byung bar dga' zhing mthong na dga'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni sems can rnams la bag bro bar byed pas pa dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lta ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
334b2(phal chen): gyi rgyan du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsdug bsngal gyis gnang ba rnaMs la bskyangasu gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/ 
334b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnas ni/ 'jig rten sna tshogs kyis gces par rnaMs la dpung mnyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni 'gro ba rnaMs thas cad ngan song gsum las ltung ba las yong su 'don pa'i phyir
334b4(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam na sems ca ngan thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa lta bu bda'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po ne'i 'a
334b5(phal chen): 'dzod mi zad pa'i rter dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// byang chub ses dpa' rjes ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar bye ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin
334b6(phal chen): tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnas ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms/ 
334b7(phal chen): pa dga' bar gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni rang gi chos rnams kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya bas rdul pho ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnyes ni/ seMs can gyi byang chub pa'i rlan skyems pas me lta bu'o// 
334b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char chen po'i mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni sems can ga po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas
334b9(phal chen): narang lta bu'o// byang chub sems dang rjes ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'bram yongs su bston pas mnyam par lnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag
335a1(phal chen): dag ba sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rjes ni thams cad kyis mngon par dgrod byar bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lte bu'o// de ny+dza ra dra pi li'i sman gyis/ tshod dngon gyi bu nor bzangs
335a2(phal chen): kyi 'dun du 'dug s+ho/ tshag kI n+dan de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam la yongasu bsngags pa byas nas/ nong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la re leg so zhes sngag so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ba yang
335a3(phal chen): dge bar dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ so kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnams 'di lta bu 'byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyus par gang bar gyur nas lha
335a4(phal chen): dang / lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'i/ klu dang / klu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ gno du d+ya na dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ dri za dang / brI zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / lha ma ya ni ne/ lha ma yan gyi rdzu 'phrul
335a5(phal chen): chen po 'am/ na mkha'i lding dang / na mkha' lding gi rdzu 'phrul chen po'o/ mi 'am ci dang / mi 'o tsi brdzu 'phrul chen po 'dang / lto 'phye chen kho'i/ lto phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / 
335a6(phal chen): mi dang mi'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mi mA ya ni pa/ dang / mi mU yan pa rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / tshangs pa'i/ tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongasu snang bar byas pa de
335a7(phal chen): dag bra bi la'i sprin gyi drung du 'ong so// de nas de ltar pra pi li'i sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing / thal mo sbyar te gnas la/ lus dang sems tsami bar 'gyur ba/ dga' ba'i chen po skyes pa/ sre bcu
335a8(phal chen): chen po la gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgya mtsho bcom pa/ g.yo bsgyu dang bral ba dang / dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur ba de dag la/ pra bi la'i sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rkyen ces bya ba de'i
335a9(phal chen): rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes rab dang / rig par bya bar byaso/ de thos pa nas kyang de dag thams cad na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// 
335b1(phal chen): de nas de'i phyir chos bstan pa la 'dug nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu kho bo dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gi sdong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
335b2(phal chen): 'di lta dang rnaMs kyis dbang ba'i skad kyang shes/ de bzhin gshegs du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / bri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i ljang dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa/ 
335b3(phal chen): rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyis lnga'i skad sna tshogs shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod byin dang / bri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs brnyes kyi tsha
335b4(phal chen): ba'i skad sna tshogs shes so// lha rnams kyis lha'i dad pa tha dad pa yang shes so// de bzhin du klu'i dang / gnod sbyin dang / bri za dang / lha ma ya ni dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / me'i ci dang / lto 'phye che po dang / mi dang mi ma
335b5(phal chen): yayin pa tshangs pa tha dad pa yang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa rda yang shes so// de bzhin tu klu dang / gdon sbyin dang bri za dang / lha ma ya ni dang / na mkha' ldang dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / 
335b6(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i bskad tha dad payang shes// byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnam kyi brda 'a dang skad dang / mang thams cad kyang shes so// sems can dmyal
335b7(phal chen): kha'i sems can rnaMs kyi skad dang / mi rnaMs kying shes so// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bskyed dang / mi rnams kyang shi so// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang / mi rnaMs kyang shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi bskad dang / brda
335b8(phal chen): dang / nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung
335b9(phal chen): gi rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi mang dang / rnam gi sgra dang / tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do/ ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sems can rnams kyi brda' dang / de'i ba'i tshig dang / 
336a1(phal chen): bskad dang / mdi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa cing shes pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu
336a2(phal chen): med pa/ 'tshams med pa/ gzhal tu med pa/ brjod tu med pa/ de bzhin tu lce'i phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub
336a3(phal chen): bya gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang dag pa brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnam rdza dang nges pa'i tshig dang bskrad dang / mang rgya mtsho
336a4(phal chen): thams cad la yang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i sa/ da kyang shes so// tshangs pa rjes kyi tshangs pa'i bsad kyi bar tu yang shes so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzungs spang
336a5(phal chen): dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam brgya stong la bzhugs pa de dag dang / 2khro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang / ma'i rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba
336a6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi mang shin tu bstan da rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa/ de dag la tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang
336a7(phal chen): tshig ltung blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad gcig tu rnam par spyod pa/ rgya mtsho la'ang che la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gis gtsigs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs bdeg/ 
336a8(phal chen): dang / gnyis nas rtsegs te bstan brgyas tsho la bzhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phyi ste rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan brgya mtsho la bzhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams
336a9(phal chen): byed kyi rkang rgyam mol zhugs pa de dag dang / dngas kyi ba'i 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la bzhugs pa de dag dang / gam gi'i 'alar lo'i mthar phyin par byas pas rab tu dbye ba la/ byang de dag gi spyong mung shes can
336b1(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re bskan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid ni/ yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu btang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan tu song la ji ltar byang chub sems
336b2(phal chen): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i rtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar byung chub sems nges par bzhag par bya ba bris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis pra bi li'i sprin gyi rkang pAl+la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim
336b3(phal chen): bro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba rmugs pa la rab tu btags pa dang / dge ba'i dge gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad med pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing / gdong mchi mas gang bar dungus te/ pra bi la'i sprin la lan
336b4(phal chen): brgya snang du ma g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang ltas te/ phyag 'tshal zhing / pra pi li'i sprin gi drung nas song ngo // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// bam po dbu/ 
336b5(phal chen): bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid du rjesu bsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyis tshul gyis
336b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mos 'jug pa de nyid rjesu dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rje su 'brang bar bya'o// byang chub ses
336b7(phal chen): dpa'i dge ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba'i bsgo de nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid do/ shin tu bya ba
336b8(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i bstobs rnam par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de nyid nye bar rngan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdo rgyud de nyid yongs su
336b9(phal chen): sbyang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yid dam rten zhing / smon lam
337a1(phal chen): gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang / ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul bsam mi zlog pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ bsgo kun
337a2(phal chen): nas rnam par dag pa'i la mngon tu gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta bu'i ye shes kyi pha tshul snang ba sa'i gzugs kun tu snang bar rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi bye brag la mngon
337a3(phal chen): sum tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la
337a4(phal chen): rab tu rtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'das pa'i ba'i ye shes kyi bsgo rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi phyogs dang bzhi thams cad tha dad pa'i las so sor rtog pa med pas 'jig rten gyi bzhi dang / phyogs kyi bye brag la phyir mi
337a5(phal chen): ldog pa'i chos kyi bzhi dang / phyogs kyi bye brag la mi ldog pa/ sangs brgyas kyi phyogs dang / bzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang / rnam par rig pa ra bya ba la gzhog pa/ dus kyi phyogs dang / bzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye/ 
337a6(phal chen): shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong ba'i yang dag par bsgrubs/ kha'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang bar ting nge 'dzin gyi/ sa rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus kun tu
337a7(phal chen): ldan pa'i sa la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun nas snang bar byas la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i rba rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu brlob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang ldan pa
337a8(phal chen): med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin byis brlabs kyis byin tu rlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi rgyung du khong du chud pa'i snang bar 'gyur ba/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par
337a9(phal chen): gang ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mngon par sgrub pa la rtsen pa de mthar gyis song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyi bar yul nags par phyin nas/ des tshong dpon tang
337b1(phal chen): rjod rtsal te/ mthong ngo mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag 'tshal nas 'dun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di bskad ces gsol to// 'phags pa bdag de rang gis dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang 'jal bar gyur
337b2(phal chen): bas ni/ bdag gis thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dga'o// 'byung bar dga' bo// 'jal bar dka'o// bgrod par dka'o// bsnyen bkur bar dka'o// 'grog
337b3(phal chen): bar dka'o// rim gro bgyi bar dka'o// dge ba'i gshes gnyen rjes ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa bdag gis 'di lta ste
337b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams na da la rim gro bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs
337b5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi sngon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgya sa thams cad smon lam yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba ra / 
337b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / rang gi spyod pas mngon par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rnam par 'phrul
337b7(phal chen): pa mngon sum tu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi spangs pa'i yongasu dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyam pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thed/ 
337b8(phal chen): kyi chos bstan pas mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par bzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
337b9(phal chen): kyi bstan pa yongasu bzung bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bskal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpal dza
338a1(phal chen): kyi spyod pa yongasasu dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / 
338a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi bar du thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi rter dang / 'dzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba'i dang / byang chub
338a3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gsar nang / mdzod khong tu chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'dzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rkyer dang / mdzod
338a4(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba'i sems mthar phyin par bgyid pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'dzed tshad med pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rter dang / 'dzod rnam par dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub ses
338a5(phal chen): dpa' thad kyi gter dang / 'dzod rang gi sems kyi dbab tu bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dga' ba'i gter dang / 'dzed rnam par thams cad du rgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bA
338a6(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir 'chi'o// bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta
338a7(phal chen): bu dang / gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod pa yul mngon gsum tu bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong tu chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhon pa de lta/ 
338a8(phal chen): bu dang / rna bar spyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon par 'gyur ba'i dbang po de lta bus bdag lta bu 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa de ni// 
338a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' brnaMs la gdams ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston par 'dzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar 'dzad/ le ni bstan bA 'dzad/ mu steg la mi 'jog par 'dzad// 
338b1(phal chen): chos kyi bsgo rnam par 'phyed par 'dzad/ the tsom ni yongasu dpyod pa 'dzad/ nem nur ni sel bar 'dzad/ yid gnyis ni zug rngu 'byin par 'dzad/ dngos po'i dri ma ni spyod bar mdzad/ sems kyi thabs po ni snang hA/ 
338b2(phal chen): mdzad/ sems kyi bri ma ni yongasu legs pa 'dzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni yong su dad pa mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongasu sel bar mdzad/ sems brdung ba ni yongasu tshim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rna
338b3(phal chen): par zlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba'i las ni phyir zlog par 'dzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni thar bar mdzad/ ngan pa'i gnas dang ni bral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen tu skyon pa mdzad/ chags pa thams
338b4(phal chen): las ni yongasu 'gyed pa 'dzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu ni sgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer tu 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon par gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu sgrub par mdzad/ byams pa chen po ni rab
338b5(phal chen): gzhol bar mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyar ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa 'dzad/ rtogs par gyur pa'i bsgo la ni gnas par 'dzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni bzhog
338b6(phal chen): pa mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pa ni khyab par 'dzad/ 'gro ba tha~Md mnyam pa nyid tu sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do// zhes thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpara' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ 
338b7(phal chen): ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar rtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'gyur la bdag la bstan tu gsol/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu btang rjod kyis de'i tshe/ byang chub ses
338b8(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag pa zhes bya ba gzungs kyi bsgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon tu 'gro ba la dge ba'i dun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / 
338b9(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang ba yang dag par bsgrubs pas/ skos par zhugs// tshong dpon gyi bu btang brjod de ltar ston pa bzhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongasu dag pa/ 
339a1(phal chen): rnams 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/ lus yong su dag pa de'i mthus/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
339a2(phal chen): dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas 'od rnam par dag pa'i dang bcas/ sngon gyi spyod ba la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon las kyi tshogs dang
339a3(phal chen): bcas 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang / bcus mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang yongs su bston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi khong shin tu bston pa dang bcas
339a4(phal chen): sems can yongasu smin pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang / lus kyis khong tu chud cing 'dus snang ste/ de dag kyang phan tshul dam bros pa dang / phan tshun brjod pa dang / phan tshun
339a5(phal chen): shin tu rnam ther phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshog su zhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rna bar dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can
339a6(phal chen): mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi 'dakyil 'khor gyi sna tshogs kyi brgyan dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogasu bston par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod/ 
339a7(phal chen): bar mdzad pa dang / smon lam sna tshogs yongasu brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khaMs la lan dga' ldan gyi pho brang tu 'du shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi sprin las thams cad 'dzad par snang ngo // la la ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang
339a8(phal chen): nas pho ba dang / la la ni yul gyi sku ni/ rnam par 'phrul ba snang tshogs yongasu bston pa la/ la la ni skye ba dang / la la ni byis pa'i ston par mdzad pa dang / la la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang ma nug
339a9(phal chen): ba dang yul ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la ni snying po byang nub du bzhugs pa dang / rnams par 'phrul po rgya chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par 'dzad pa dang / la la ni lha dang / kun dang / gnod sbyin dang / drangs yongs
339b1(phal chen): bskor cing // tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos tshe kyi 'khor lo bskor bas gsol ba btab pa dang / la la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas gsol ba btab pa dang / la la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dzad pa/ la la ni sems
339b2(phal chen): can gyi gnas ma bzhugs pa dang / la la ni yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar ste/ 'jig rten gi khaMs la la na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring srel rnam par dgod par snang ngo // sangs rgyas
339b3(phal chen): kyi zhing la la n+ya ni/ lha dang mi'i rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis klubs pa byed cing snang ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi rigs rnams par thar pa dang / 
339b4(phal chen): can dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnas par tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud rnaM pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnaMs pa sems dad pa dang / sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnaMs pa tha dad pa dang / sems
339b5(phal chen): can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tus kyi rgyud rnam par rgyud/ tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las rnas par smin pa tha dad pa dang / sems
339b6(phal chen): can gyi 'jig rten rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnas pa tha dad pa dang / sems can bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag
339b7(phal chen): pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'jam klas pa rnaMs la/ sangs rgyas kyi rna bar 'phrul brna ba sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges
339b8(phal chen): ba'i tshig dang / dbyangs dang / lag dang / gsung rnam par sna tshog su bsgrubs te/ mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi bsgo rno ba tha dad pa'i rgyu dang / yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs
339b9(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mang rgya 'tsho dun rna ba sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrogs pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsten pa'i cho 'phrul yongasu bstan pa dang / bran
340a1(phal chen): ba'i bsgo sna tshogs can shin du bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus bstan pa'i seng ge'ing ro sna tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'ju byung ba rnams
340a2(phal chen): gtsugs kyis/ 'khor kyi kyil la dam pa'i mtha' yas par rnam par tha dad pa phan tshun du ma mtshang ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sa tshogs yangs pa dang / lan kyi kyi
340a3(phal chen): dudrwa bar 'dus pa dang / dpa' tshad gcig gi tsad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsun dang / dpag tsang bcu tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes sangs rgyas kyi gang brjod du med pa'i yang rdul shin tu dras
340a4(phal chen): snyed kyi tshad tsam du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ni/ na gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sna srang dza kyi rjes su 'gro ba thams cad chos ji snyed du bston pa dang / rnams
340a5(phal chen): cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis thos so// sbyangaso/ yang ga khar gzung ngo // bsams so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul 'de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
340a6(phal chen): d+hamanog gam thu byung ba de dag kyang mthong // donas thong dpon gyi bu mo dang rgyang zang ni shes bAzhin tu ti 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi thun bzangs la 'di skad ces sngas/ rigs kyi bu la das
340a7(phal chen): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa rdzogs pa med pa'i rgyun ces bya ba yongasu blangs shing 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyun de la
340a8(phal chen): rtog bcing spyod pa'i tshen shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas 'dzam bu'i chu klung mdog dang ldan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba
340a9(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mag lam tu snang ngo // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/ 
340b1(phal chen): khas stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros pa/ kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i rgyal
340b2(phal chen): po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas spobs thams cad tu 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
340b3(phal chen): dgra bco/ ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang
340b4(phal chen): thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu spang ngo // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas dmigs pa rgyal mtshan tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhi
340b5(phal chen): bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la so dgas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu snang ngo / byang shar
340b6(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas mi dmyigs nga'i spyan rnam par dmyigs pa zhes bya ba dang
340b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub ses dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu snang ngo // shar phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig
340b8(phal chen): 'jogro rten gyi khams snad kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi tha dad padzi
340b9(phal chen): dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu bzhugs pa mig lam tu snang ngo // lho phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khas nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na/ 
341a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgo kun nas ye shes snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i me tog gi 'od kun du 'phro ba gtsug phud rab tu phro ba la sogs pa
341a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha~Md dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu snang ngo // nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyud yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gabye/ 
341a3(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi rdzing rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i kho
341a4(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu zhugs pa yang mig lam tu snang ngo // 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas rin po che seng ge sdang zhing 'bab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
341a5(phal chen): 'od chos kyi dbyings snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od phro ba zhing rnam par snang bar 'byung ba'i blo gros la/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu
341a6(phal chen): bzhugs pa yang mag lam tu snang ngo // stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gri khes mtshan ma med pa 'od rje bar snang ba la/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgra banom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags ni
341a7(phal chen): rdzogs pa med pa'i rnar thar pa'i yon tan 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / rtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thabs dang thaban
341a8(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam tu sna / rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
341a9(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thabs gcig tu bzhugs bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med do/ na 'dod pa de ni bde bar yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi ngas na de
341b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rjes byang chub tu yongasu smin par byed cing / phyogs bcu bdang te 'dod pa
341b2(phal chen): mthong ngo // pus mo'i lhang gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze'i khams pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / gzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro
341b3(phal chen): rgyun la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang rgyur gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi khyis kyi slob dpon tu mkhas par bya ba'i gzugs na byang
341b4(phal chen): rnam pa na ma dang ldan pa// dbyings rnam par 'du ma dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yid bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dbul po'i sems
341b5(phal chen): can rnas la phan bdags pa dang / bsdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde ba dang / sdig pa dang theg pa'i rdul nya mnyes su gyur pa'i seMs can nas 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i sems can rjes
341b6(phal chen): yongasu bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag pa dang / sdig pa las zlog pa'i gru yongasu bsgrag pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can bzung ba dang / don spyod pa la sems spyod pa dang / dge
341b7(phal chen): ba'i mugs la yongs bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i sems dbang po yongasu brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don mthun par 'grub par bston pa byed cing / phyogs bcu brgyas par bdang sde 'dong bar mthong ngo // lte ba'i
341b8(phal chen): dam 'a'od nas srang mang po thob thams cad kyims su bye dus su 'a bag dang / dran pa'i gis rgyan pa'i gos ril pa rtogs pa btugs dang / byang dang / dpyongs sna tshogs can spyod las rab tun pa dag tu
341b9(phal chen): ma gang gi bar dang 'am mangs rgyas kyi 'on dan 'dzig byang 'i rgyas kyi rtswa mang su zag pa dang / sris rgya gyis 'a ba dang / bya chub sems dpa'i dge dun 'di du dan 'dag nga spyo tshu
342a1(phal chen): pa la rab tu brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa las sems dgod par dang / rang bzhin med pa don rab tu rtog pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongasu spyod pa dang / 
342a2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis byung bI lam gyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod par byed cing phyogs bcu gang ste 'dong ba mthong // rtsibs logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgya
342a3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi grangs pa dang / mnyam pa lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa tum dang ldan pa ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul bu bsum gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa dang / sprin gyi mi khyab pa'i na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlabs mi khyab
342a4(phal chen): pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang 'phreng ba'i spyani bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang / rin po che'i rtags kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams
342a5(phal chen): cad yongasu khyebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i ba dan gyi sman bsam gyis mi khya rke ba pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phung po'i 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rgar
342a6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che'i dam pa'i sprin gyi chabasam gyis mi khyab palce rgyan dang / lha'i rnams kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tsho gas dang ldan pa'i bu mo mang po chos kyi klu bstan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin
342a7(phal chen): gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che pad ma'i ze ba 'tho ba mu tig gi bra bas rgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprini me tog dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu
342a8(phal chen): brgyan pa// 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha mo mang
342a9(phal chen): po bsam gyis lus kyi sbyin pa la thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon dang / legs pa thams cad du bsngon pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bya
342b1(phal chen): la byin gyis brlabs cings spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug spos kyi na'un dang / sman gyi shin tu rgya che bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon
342b2(phal chen): par khyebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khas 'jam glas pa thams cad rab tu rgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thaMd
342b3(phal chen): mchod par skad cig gcig tu/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad brgyas par 'gyengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mthong ka'i dpal gyi be'u las lha ma yan kyi bu dbang po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
342b4(phal chen): med dpag tu med pa'i rtul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar tu bston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongasu bskyem pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khes rgya stong tu rab tu spyod pa dang / 
342b5(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongasu spyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde dpon thams cad rab tu brtul ba dang / nga
342b6(phal chen): rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / bregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems dpa'i sems zlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / tho 'tsham par sems phyir zlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can rna
342b7(phal chen): kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par rtogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mothun tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi skyes rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba rnams kyis sna tshogs
342b8(phal chen): kyis sems can rnas paskyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa'i las gyen tu skyon pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pas los kyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyed do// gnas pa med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub
342b9(phal chen): kyi sems la sems can rnam dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol du phyin pa las la la rab tu dgod par
343a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongasu bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod par sna tshogs kyis sems
343a2(phal chen): kyi bskad cig re re'i zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'byings par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // rgyab kyi zhung nas thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i brtul shin tu phra
343a3(phal chen): ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnaMs la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yong su brjod par byed cing / rtag par mngon par btang ba dang / 'dod mtha
343a4(phal chen): kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can lnga byams pa dang / rti mug gi spyod pa can rjes la rkyen las 'byung bya'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la shes kyi yul
343a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par/ dga' ba'i rnams la gnas pa med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba/ la gnasu sems brnaMs la smon lam gyi khyad par bgyi spro ba bskyed
343a6(phal chen): pa ste/ phyogs kyi rgyud dang / sgo thams cad tu chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i/ rgya mtsho'i rgyu dang / sgo tha~Mng sems can thams cad kyi don tu brjod pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gyings pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor mazangs rgya
343a7(phal chen): mthang / phrag pa'i ldan gnyis nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang por byi'is sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ lus mi bsdug sa// kha dog dang / chu zheng snga tshogs can/ skyong yul gyi rnang bas chogs dang ldan gA yus mi brdzun
343a8(phal chen): pa kha dog dang / cu zhing snga nags can srung ma gro gyi sa tshogs dang ldan pa/ gzhon pa sna nags la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ sems car gyi las yongs su bskod/ sems kyi yongs
343a9(phal chen): bal brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu bsgogs pa/ gzhan sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul gan tu phra ba snyed byung na/ thabs mngon par bsgrubs pa sna tshogs ma 'dres par phyogs lams kun gyinamakha' rgyas
343b1(phal chen): par 'byengs shing / dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongasu bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu bzung ba dang / lag brdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / rnams
343b2(phal chen): cad bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba dang / sems can ltung ba rnams par zlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nan dang / gnod pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir tu rtson pa
343b3(phal chen): sems can gyi don bya bas yongasu sbyor ba la brtson pa rjes dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi dgol ba'i 'khor tshad med pa gcod par
343b4(phal chen): byed ba cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'byings par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // 'dun gyis ltas na/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi'i/ 
343b5(phal chen): ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba/ snyed/ dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor lo rgya stong grangs med pa na na dag 'byung nas/ lha'i rol mo rgya stong grangs med pa'i bsgo snyan
343b6(phal chen): pa dang / klu'i dbyangs kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gyis ldan pa'i sems/ sa sangs rgyas kyi bstobs pa rjod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' yong su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu rjod
343b7(phal chen): pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bsgo thams cad la mngon par bston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba thams cad tu 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrug pa'i bsgo thams cad tu mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / 
343b8(phal chen): yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsgo r+m+ma byur ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bstan ni bsgo thang yong su bzung ba dang / seMs can gyi sgo thams pad rab tu dga' bar bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yodzin gyi sgo rnams cang / 
343b9(phal chen): tu dga'i bar bya ba dang / chos kyi bag dzing mngon par bldan pa dang / sgri'i ba'i ma khrid rnam par thug par bya ba dang / dge pa bya ba'i bsgo mas cad long su bskyed par byed pang / chos kyi ngas rgyas pa 'ong dpo gyin
344a1(phal chen): nor bzungs kyis mthong ngo // kha'i bsgo nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnon po bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyun rab tu
344a2(phal chen): 'byed cing / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yong su btang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dngul po rjes nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlogs pa
344a3(phal chen): dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu bgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / rab tu bral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu rgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongasu btang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang la
344a4(phal chen): rnam par zlog pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la rab tu bgod pa dang / rdzun tu smra ba las log pa dang / slu ba med pa la rab tu gzhol bar bgod pa dang / bla dma'i tshig las zlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum pa'i gzungs rtson pa'i tshig
344a5(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dza zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshi ga rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang / ldan pa'i 'byung rgyal tu smra ba las sems can rnam par zlog pa dang / don
344a6(phal chen): bzab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngagi nyes pa tha~Md las 'jig rten rnam par zlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying gi bri ma yongasu
344a7(phal chen): sel cing / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chos shes pa la brtson par sems can yong su bgod pa dang / chags bsas las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / lha hUM
344a8(phal chen): khra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gnon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi bar dzad rnam par sbyor ba dang / the tsom gyi spros bathed rab tu gzhol ba dang / ner nur dang / som nyi'i rab ring yong su 'astsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye nI
344a9(phal chen): 'jig rten tu rab tu dbye ba dang / rgyan las byung bar rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu brjod pa dang / bsgri pa thob thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul rab tu bzung ba/ 
344b1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyis don gyi tshul snga rdzogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyis rgyas par 'byengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu snang sangs rgyas stong kyi
344b2(phal chen): zhing drangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / blangs med pa'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khor ba'i sems can dmyal
344b3(phal chen): pan 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i bsdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams kyi zhing rnam par 'od kyi kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od
344b4(phal chen): be tu r+yarI kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / be tu r+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od zer gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od zer kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rtswa
344b5(phal chen): su 'di shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyizhing yongasu 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam par mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'byung
344b6(phal chen): pa dang / in tra ni la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal bo'i nyi ma'i snying po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgya la po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in tra ni la'i kha/
