344b7(phal chen): dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rjes su 'od rin po che'i 'od rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi phra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed cing / rin po che'i rgyal po zla
344b8(phal chen): ba'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'od mu tog dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gis rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab
344b9(phal chen): tu 'byed pa dang / rin po tsho sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi gang rnam su rin pa che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi kyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don cing med/ 
345a1(phal chen): zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // sman 'chos kyi 'dzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 
345a2(phal chen): lha'i dbang po thams cad zil kyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas lnga ba la dga' ba la rjesu sngags pa byed cing / sems can tshad med pa 'dul bar rtson
345a3(phal chen): khar phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs kyis mthong ngo // bral ba nas tshong dpon dngos chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung
345a4(phal chen): nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangasu brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed cing / sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson pa'i phyogs bcu'i chos kyi/ 
345a5(phal chen): dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtho dang ngo / 'go nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing drangs med pa'i brtul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs
345a6(phal chen): dang // sna tshogs kyis lus yongasu ston cing / dpe' byad bzang po rnam pa dris pa'i lus rab tu bston pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin dpung mtha' med pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / ba sku'i bu ga thams cad
345a7(phal chen): nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rter nas bzung ste/ rtor ba dang / len pa dang / dngos po yongs su btang ba'i rnam pa sprin mang po rab tu 'gyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs
345a8(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba thams cad yongasu bstan pa dang / sbyin pa spyod pa 'jig rten tu brjod pa dang / ser sA'i dri ma rnam par zlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spangs la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig
345a9(phal chen): rten riri po che sna chogs rgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / suni de'i pha rol du phyin pa la sems rab tu 'god pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / ngag med pa thams cad las sems ca ni
345b1(phal chen): par zlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu 'god pa dang / khengs pa dang / 'gyer ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam rten gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rnam
345b2(phal chen): la bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thad nas bsam brtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sgrani rab tu 'byed pa dang / sems dpa' la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu 'god pa byed cing / skad cig re
345b3(phal chen): ri la chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyas par 'gyengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyang zhing blangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ka thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu tshol ba'i dang ldan pa'i/ 
345b4(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprini rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i bskad cig thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi sa 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i klog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 
345b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa dang / sems can rnaMs kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu zhig pa dang / lta ba thams cad kyi zug rtul rab tu 'byung ba dang / the tsom dang / yidi gnyis dang / nem
345b6(phal chen): nur gyi rab rab rnam par gsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing / seMs kyi bskad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brangs med pa'i rdul
345b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod par byed cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa'i dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'ge ba dang / 'jig rten rnas
345b8(phal chen): la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba rab tu rjod pa dang the tsom pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bston pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tha mi dad pa'i byang chub ses dpa'i
345b9(phal chen): spyod pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyini pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten rjes la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing sems bskyed pa re re la tshwa kyi dbying rgyas dwa bye sa na
346a1(phal chen): mthong ngo // yang dag par byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing blangs med pa'i brtul shin tu phra ba skyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i
346a2(phal chen): sprin 'jug sgra sgrogs cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang pos smrani rab tu 'gyed pa dang / smon lam gyi
346a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / smon lam chen po'i ting nge 'dzin shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mthar mur thug par 'brel ba chos
346a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / mi shes pa'i rab rib rnam par zlog pa/ 'jig rten tu rab tu brjod par byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems
346a5(phal chen): can gyi bskad cig re re la chos kyi dbyangs rgyas par 'byings pa mthong ngo / yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu spang bar
346a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu yongasu bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i spyan rab tu
346a7(phal chen): 'gyed pa dang / bdud kyi drang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongasu bston pa dang / 'khor yul dang / rdo rje'i ri thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i lus kyi stengasu rdib kyang mi mnyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa
346a8(phal chen): dang / bsgral bas 'jig pa'i thams cad kyi me'i rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gdon pa med pa'i stobs yongasu bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas 'jam klas thams cad lag pa'i thal gyis na mkha'i dbying
346a9(phal chen): bston pa'i stobs yong su bston par byed cing / sems can gyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyingasu 'gyengs pas rgyun mi 'cha nga mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
346b1(phal chen): gni d+hu zla ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnaMs la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba rang po'i sngon tu 'gro ba'i sbyor la/ 
346b2(phal chen): mang po'i spri ni rab tu 'byed pa dang / 'jig rten rjes la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes mngon par shes pa'i dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon pa shes
346b3(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mchod par bstan pa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu bsdug pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye
346b4(phal chen): shes shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag med ba'i rang bzhin la bzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye she ngas kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho/ 
346b5(phal chen): rnam par lta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu rjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbyed pa'i ye shes mthong bar shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / 
346b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa rnam par lta ba'i ye shes rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 
346b7(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi bstan pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
346b8(phal chen): bzangs kyis mthong ngo // spyi bo'i tog gi gseb nas/ de bzhin gshes pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing drangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe' byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan/ 'dzam bu'i gling
346b9(phal chen): gi chu klung gi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba lta bur snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sbar zhing snang ba tshad med par 'bab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gyings pa dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul
347a1(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mtha' yas dang dpung med pa yongasu ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la tha ma ded pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
347a2(phal chen): la chos kyi dbyings kyi ba zhi'i bye brag mngon par gsum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sman gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i thob pa rnam la bzhi kun tu rjen ces bya ba'i chos
347a3(phal chen): kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab dang dbang bskur ba rnams la bsgo kun nas 'jug ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher mngon par dab ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos
347a4(phal chen): chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas rgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
347a5(phal chen): sman gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chos shin tu rngan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi cha par mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor la sngon gyi/ 
347a6(phal chen): sbyor ba ldan pa'i rnams la 'gro ba'i yongs su bsdud pas kun nas rgyan po zhes bya ba chos kyi spyan gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la sngon gyi sbyor ba ldan pa'i rnam par 'gro nga'i yongasu
347a7(phal chen): zhes bye ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po pa snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sgrani kun nas rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab
347a8(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dang ba mos bra la rnam par mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byas pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can
347a9(phal chen): rnaMs la zhing kun tu mi zad pa'i 'jod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyis lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug smra'i dbyangs bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'das
347b1(phal chen): dang / dang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod byed pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyi tshogs can yang das/ 
347b2(phal chen): par bsgrubs pa'i dpyas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnaMs la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i cher mngon
347b3(phal chen): dbab po dang / mdo ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjesu dran pa'i 'dzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang ba dang / lnga'i dbang po rgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong dga'i bu
347b4(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par de ngang ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi na mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pas rgyas par 'gyengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi spyan
347b5(phal chen): gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / bri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gro bI zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon pa dbab pa dang / lha'i ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi/ 
347b6(phal chen): tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon pa dbang pa dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po gnas su de bzhin gshed/ kha thams cad 'byung bI thabs kyi sprin zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char ma
347b7(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su char gyi sgra ni yang dag par 'gro po thams cad kyi dbyings shes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog
347b8(phal chen): cing sran gyi char mngon rgyud las skyo ba zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya chen po rnam par 'brel ba dang / byed pa'i shugs shes pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par ga
347b9(phal chen): pa dang / mi gnas su 'gro ba thams cad la khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten tu 'khor ba'i bsdug bsngal thams cad
348a1(phal chen): rab tu zhi ba'i dbyings dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig rgyan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su lamakha na ma tho ba med pa nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / 
348a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu bde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol phyin pa sgrag pas ses
348a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi rtor pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnaMs la bsdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu thobs dbugs 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i sprin
348a4(phal chen): gyi char mngon par dbab pa 'dzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'byings ba/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / ba spu'i bu ga thaMd las ba spu'i bu ga re re las kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'a/ 
348a5(phal chen): kha dog dang / gzugs kyi glong dang / rgyan grangs med pa can dgongs ba sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon tu gnas pa dang / sa sa rgyas kyi grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i
348a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgyan par mthong ngo // 'di ltar ba spu'i bsgo'i 'od zer gyi bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor las sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med/ gdog pa thams cad rtong par rnam par 'phrul bar mthong ngo // ba sku'i bsgo'i phra ba dang / 
348a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / rtul zhugs dang / yid dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i 'od zer gyi phra ba dang dkyil
348a8(phal chen): 'khor la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa spyod pa'i rnam par dus gsum byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rga lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyam su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul
348a9(phal chen): padang / khu tshur dang dbyug pas spun te mtshon gyis lus btab kyang nyams su bzod par byed kyang nyam su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs pas snyim dang / mig phyung nyis su
348b1(phal chen): bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum tu byung ba rnam par btags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongasu btsal ba'i chedu lus
348b2(phal chen): dang / sems can la gnod pa thams cad dang yan lag dang / nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyam su bzod par byas pa dang / btang snyoms su gzhag par byang chub sems
348b3(phal chen): dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs snyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga nas 'od zer gyi phra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rtson 'gru
348b4(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rnam par tha dad pa rna bar 'byed pa'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongasu skyob pa dang / rgya mtsho'i
348b5(phal chen): yongasu bskyob pa dang / sems can yongasu skyo bar bya ba dang / mu ste dgas thams cad yongasu tshar gcod pa dang / bdud thams cad snga skong ba dang / phyogs kyi phyogs kyi spang bar bya ba'i don byang chub
348b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // sku'i bsgo'i 'od zer gyi phra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la la sa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i
348b7(phal chen): rnam par grangs ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen lus zhes bya bar lon pa snyed pa dang / rigs kyi bu skye ba yongs su bzung ba ji ltar bur snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa dza snyed pa dang / dge
348b8(phal chen): pa'i gshes gnyen gyis yongs su gru gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongasu sgrub
348b9(phal chen): pa dang / 'thun pa'i rtsag lag khang dang / gnas dang gzhal med khang dang yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / rtul zhugs dang / yid dam dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / 
349a1(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor lo la las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba/ 
349a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i lus yongasu bzung ba dang / lus yongasu chos kyi tshul tshag gcig gis don tu yang rdog pa thams cad yongasu bstan te/ sems can thams cad yongasu btsal ba dang / rim gro bya ba dang / bkur sti
349a3(phal chen): thams cad kyis ji ltar ba bzhin tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad la yang de bdud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongasu btsal ba dang / chos kyis tshig gcig la ji ltar ba
349a4(phal chen): de bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig thams cad la yang de bdud te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongasu btsal/ tshig gcig la ji ltar ba de bzhin tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
349a5(phal chen): phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig thams cad la yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad cad tu gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad yongs su de btsal ba de thams cad las/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis pa
349a6(phal chen): sku'i sgo gcig gis 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor las ma thong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi phra ba dang / dkyil 'khor ma la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems can yongasu
349a7(phal chen): smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jam klas pas sems can thams cad bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo // sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi bsgo sngon gyi lus dang nye bar bla
349a8(phal chen): bathabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la rtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / phra bas yongasu bskung ba yang bsgo'i sgo'i 'od zer zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig la mthong ngo // bsku'i bsgra'i 'a zer gyi dranga'i kyi'i/ 
349a9(phal chen): 'kho la la las ne/ nga sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba thams cad kyi lus sngon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad yong du sman par bya ba'i sngon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i
349b1(phal chen): pa dang / zhing tha~Md yongasu dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par 'dzad pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa' de dang de dag gi zhabs drung tu 'khor ba'i
349b2(phal chen): skyon thaMd kham 'khor skyon re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa 'dzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa spu'i bu ga ga'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba spu'i 'od zer gyi
349b3(phal chen): dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo // ba spu'i bsgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la las ni ye shes kyi sbyong ba rnaMs par rgyu badzad
349b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par bya nga ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnya
349b5(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bar thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjesu dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sa mas dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung ba de la rjes su 'brang zhing
349b6(phal chen): rnam par bsam shing // sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du ba'i bsgo rgyu kun la mngon par gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam
349b7(phal chen): par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes de la rab tu rtag pa'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongasu bskyed pa dang / byang chub
349b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i sngon lam gyi stobs de rten par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de gni tu rgyas par dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun tu nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no// nyani zhig gnyis dang bdun ya
349b9(phal chen): lan no// zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar du/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshon gyi badrung du song ste/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyi zhag drug 'das nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
350a1(phal chen): mtshan dang de la ni las lang so// de nas nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ltar zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa
350a2(phal chen): rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba 'tshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di
350a3(phal chen): ltar sems can gyi don mchis pa rab tu bsgrub par gyur pa ni ngo 'tshar ro// de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnas par zhi bar bgyi ba ste gon tu gnas pa ste/ de ltar dbul ba'i bsdug
350a4(phal chen): bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la stag gon tu gnas so// sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcod pa dang / mtho ris byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongasu sgrub pa dang / yid dgas kyi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud lnga
350a5(phal chen): yongasu skyab pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud las yongasu sgrub pa dang / mi khom pa'i las kyi rgyud kyi bsgo thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam kyi rgyun du phyin par bgyid pa dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang
350a6(phal chen): bde ba dang 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nya masu myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'atus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yod/ su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo
350a7(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa la sta gon tu gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par bskyed pa'i rgyu yong su brjod pa la sta gon tu gnas pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam
350a8(phal chen): par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las snang ba rab tu thol bar bgyi ba dang / pha rol
350a9(phal chen): tu phyin pa chen po theg pa chen po rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun du bzang po'i shes pa snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shing snang ba dang po bar bgyi/ 
350b1(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang spyod pa'i dang byung ba'i rkyen rnam par dag yongasu sgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gnas pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyi 'o// 'phags pa
350b2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi de'i ming zhes bgyi ba/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lnga ba'i btang snyoms yong su rab thob zhes bya ba yod de/ dang nge ladzi ni 'di ni de'i snang ba ste sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i
350b3(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba 'am/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i bta do ma'i rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgo kun nas rnam par dga' ba'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di kun tu bsgoms nas
350b4(phal chen): bsgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba la sogs pa/ ting nge 'dzan brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongasu 'byung / bar 'gyur ro// smras pa 'phags pa ting nge 'dzani de bas sam/ smras pa
350b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs pa la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khas rnams par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi zhwa
350b6(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khas yongasu rgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi kham su thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu rgyan par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas lnga
350b7(phal chen): zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyis bdag nyid che ba la rtags pa la thogs pa mdo/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas la/ 
350b8(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong tu chung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sprin gyi char yong su bzung ba la/ 
350b9(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba 'am/ 'bres pa shes shing khong tu chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la
351a1(phal chen): ba med do// phyogs bcur 'jug cing rje su chos 'brang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su rtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rje su rtag par bya ba la/ 
351a2(phal chen): thogs pa med do// snying rje chen po'i chos rnams par mi spangs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ 'jam klas pa phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/ sangs rgyas lte ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya/ 
351a3(phal chen): ba la thogs pa med do// sems can rgya 'tsho thams cad tu 'jug cing khong tu chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gi dbang po tha dad
351a4(phal chen): pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa'i 'du shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rgya mtsho
351a5(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rigs kyi pa rjesu 'brengs pa'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rnam pa 'gyengs pa/ gzungs chen po'i
351a6(phal chen): snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu'i byin pa la shin tu byung ba la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad
351a7(phal chen): kha'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pas sa'i snying po dang ldan pa dang rjod/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten tu gyur pa rnams kyi shes pa'i yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod pa yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon la
351a8(phal chen): chen po'i stobs yang dag par gsags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i bsgo nas yong su snang bar byas pa 'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa 'am/ lam yongasu bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi rjesu 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ ses
351a9(phal chen): sems kyi yul bar byas pa 'am/ ye shes par bya ba 'am/ yeng shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba la nur re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid ni phyogs kyi gnasu rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes
351b1(phal chen): bya ba yongs de/ de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par rgyan par rgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig/ grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba shar phyogs logs na yod do/ de na shed las skyes pa'i 'od bzangs zhes bya ba'i chung ma dge snyen
351b2(phal chen): ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis de bzhin gan tu song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slabs par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba bris shig/ de tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ 'gu zhing nywa
351b3(phal chen): bde la tsami zhing yid bde ba skyed nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho las snying po yongasu blangs te/ chos kyis nyes khar mtsho ba byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa snang ba thob pa/ ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting
351b4(phal chen): denge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa mos pa rnam par dag pas/ khong du chud pa sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba rnam par dag pa'i bsgo snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogasu ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bda'
351b5(phal chen): des dge slong rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan stong tu mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan la btud te phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang lta zhing yang
351b6(phal chen): dang nga yang mngon par lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu 'dod pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / ri gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgo ba dang / yongs su bsgoms pa dang / legs par 'tshal ba dang / de/ 
351b7(phal chen): 'tshar du gyur pa dang / yon tan mngon par 'du ba dang / rje su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'breng bar bya ba dang / rje su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi tang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / smon
351b8(phal chen): lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / dbyings kyi mtshan ma rtsang ba dang / bzungs kyi rjesu bsam pa dang / mang yongasu bsam pa rjes su bsam pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyi bas/ 
351b9(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjesu bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon le gyi yul la rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par spyod par bya ba dang / 
352a1(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su bzung bar byed do/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung du song ngo // sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po phal po che zhes bya ba las// // bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa'o// // de
352a2(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi yon tan tu ni 'gu/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du byin/ dge ba'i gshes
352a3(phal chen): gnyen gyi pad ma ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i gshes gshen yid du 'ong ba'i rjesu sems/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gnas tsam tu lta/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa
352a4(phal chen): yin par lta/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi rjesu lta/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas na mkha' lta bu la mag tsam tu lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgyas mtsho rnam par rlob
352a5(phal chen): pa'i/ gza' shing gi ba kun nas rgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ des mthong ba/ gza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par rgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ ran po che thams cad shing gi phreng ba
352a6(phal chen): sbrel legs par yongasu rgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing phreng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgrani rab tu 'phrul pas/ bzhi brgyan pa rani po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par rgyan pa thams cad kyi me tog rgyas
352a7(phal chen): pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhing ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu byung zhing char lngar 'bab
352a8(phal chen): pa rab tu 'bab dang / rin po che'i char ba thams cad kyi zhing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis 'dzes shing sA la/ rgya cher rgyan pa'i bzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad la kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos
352a9(phal chen): 'byung bas gos yo khyebs par 'dzes par byas pa/ sa li bsnyen gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas kying 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing / sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba'i bzhi mthon dman med par
352b1(phal chen): gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/ rgyan sna tshogs rnam par tha dad pa rgyun tu zhugs pa'i phreng bas rab tu brgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ gza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyas pa/ de'i nang tu khang
352b2(phal chen): pa bye brgya stong phrag rgya stong bcu kun nas kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang partsegs brgya stong bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser la sogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang / zhal
352b3(phal chen): med khang stong phrag bcuHka dung rin po che snang ba las bres pa dang / rdzing bu lnga brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las bzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gu mkhyud tu byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skyes
352b4(phal chen): rnam par sbas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skas rnam par smras pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi bri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba gser gyi phye mas kun tu gram pa nor bu rin po che
352b5(phal chen): chu ba dang / kun nas 'jam klas pa phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bris pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngang dur dang rma bya dang / khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la bying ka dang / ku na la'i
352b6(phal chen): bsgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi bri bu'i dri bas kun nas g.yogs pa rlung gis skyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ steng nas rin po chen bres pa rin po che sna tshogs
352b7(phal chen): kyi shing gis ra bas yongasu bskor ba rin po che'i bra bas brgyan pa'i bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng ba lu ma rgya stong phrag bcus dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi mdam gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che snang tshogs
352b8(phal chen): kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad mas yong su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos sdang bar gyur pa'i chu brim med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ gza shing gir ba'i dbus na/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya
352b9(phal chen): bsnang ba rini po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i swa leb bkye bas rgyan pa bzhi
353a1(phal chen): nor bu rin po che 'bar ba drangs med pa'i bra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi bris gam yo kun nas gtugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i ngad kun tu ldang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal
353a2(phal chen): pa'i bri rnam par gsal ba byed pas/ dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing / gzhal med khang che po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der bstan grangs med/ tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad ma'i snying
353a3(phal chen): bo can dang / nor bu rin po che snang bar byed pa'i pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can/ dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'dzod sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snyi
353a4(phal chen): po can dang / rin po che'i seng ga'i shing btags kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che bri ma med pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas rgyan pa'i
353a5(phal chen): pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi brgyan gyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyan par rgyan pa'i rin po ches 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon bI/ 
353a6(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po can dag gshes shing bting ba dang / gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang / rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ kha dog hUM
353a7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa las 'dzad cing / gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de'i steng nas bla re chen po rgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khyengs pa'i ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / khri shing gi bA re dang / me
353a8(phal chen): me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che'i rdo rje'i bA ri dang / glang po che'i shugs dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i bla re dang / nor bu rin
353a9(phal chen): po che mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khyebs par byas pa'o// rin po che'i pra brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yod pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che mngon par dam pa'i bral bu'i phra ba dang / 
353b1(phal chen): rin po che'i rdugs kyi bra ba dang / rin po che'i 'brug gi bra ba dang / mu tig gi rgya mtsho'i snying po'i bra ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i bai tur+ya sngon po'i bra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi bra ba dang / nor bu rin po che nu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs
353b2(phal chen): kyi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bskar ma'i 'od zer gyi bra ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po chen dra bas brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa'o// snang ba'i chen po brgya phrag bcus kyang gnas nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar
353b3(phal chen): ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi bdud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpa' kyi snying po snang ba dang / nor
353b4(phal chen): bu rin po che pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rgyal mtshan gyi snying po dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma'i snang ba'i dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos chen po dang / klog gi phreng ba
353b5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i spang ba dang / de bzhi dgu la gsogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po r+ya stong phrag bcus rtag tu char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste// dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sgrani brgya phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha rdzas lnga
353b6(phal chen): 'das pa'i phreng ba dang / lha'i sprin chen po'i kun tu 'dzin pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos mtshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sgrani rgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'bab pa lha rdzas las 'das rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag
353b7(phal chen): bcus rnaMm par klubs pa/ lha'i bu rgya stong phrag bcus mthong ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag bya ba bzhin du bab pa/ lha'i sgrani rgya stong phrag bcu'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i bskal ba mnyam par rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char
353b8(phal chen): mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcus mnyam par bskor cing / 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de ni dge bsnyen ma yin bzhin khri chen po la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya mtsho snying po'i pra bas
353b9(phal chen): rgyan pa'i gcod pan thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / rtsu bu thon pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis 'dzer bar gyur pa/ rnam pa rin po che 'thon cing bri ma med pa rang
354a1(phal chen): tra 'byung ba gnong bu na pa na'i drangs dran pa'o// nang bu na ba tso do ni rna ba'i gong brnyan rnanas par bu nib me 'di bzhin gyi rgyam po'i 'phrul lal sogs pa/ lus na pa cemasacad kyi drabs 'as
354a2(phal chen): tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu bdud te/ phyag 'tshal ba 'dug ste/ dge bsnyed ma yid bzhin de'i drung du/ shar phyogs nas tshangs pa tshangs pa chen po'o// tshangs wA nye phan nam/ tshangs tI ris su rtog+sa/ 
354a3(phal chen): ba 'am/ rab 'phrul dga'a'/ 'phrul dga'i ris su rdzogs pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ ldan gyi ris su rtogs pa 'am/ rab 'tsho ma'i ris rdzogs pa'i/ rab 'tshe ma 'am/ 'tshetsho lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum bcu rtsa sum
354a4(phal chen): gyi ris su rtogs pa'i/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin ni/ dri za'i dbang po'i/ bri za'i/ zul 'bru gyi dbang po'i/ grul 'brun/ klu'i dbang po'i/ klu le/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i/ lha ma yani nam/ nam
354a5(phal chen): ljang gi dbang po'i/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'i ci'i dbang po'i/ mau'i ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i/ gshin rje'i/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'aM/ yi dgas so/ mi'i dbang po'i/ mi yang rung ste/ sems can tshad
354a6(phal chen): med grangs med pa'i 'ong ba dag dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lce'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'chis
354a7(phal chen): 'og dang steng gi phyogs 'chos dang / tshangs pa chen po'i/ tshangs pa nye phan nam/ tshangs ris su rtog pa'o// dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su rtog pa 'am/ mi'i dbang po'o// mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad tshogs
354a8(phal chen): zhishi gsi ba ba 'am/ nyon mongs sna rtogs kyis kunanas 'ang ngas sto ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon pa zhin ne/ las kyi bslabs pas bsgrubs pa zhig yo na yang de dag gis/ dge bsnyen ma ldani babani de mdzong ma thags
354a9(phal chen): nad byed rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i bri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ lha'i bas pa'i gsal shing phyin par yang 'gyur/ sgrub pa'i rigs byed kyang rnam par zhig par 'byur thams cad 'byen pa'i ye shes kyi bsgrib pa med pa rje/ 
354b1(phal chen): yang khongasu chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni/ dge bas ni dge ba tha~Md kyis rab tu byang bar 'gyur dbang po'i myu gu tha~Md kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtsho'i la yang dag par/ 
354b2(phal chen): gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi bsgo rgya mtsho thams cad la yang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bsgo nas tshul rgya mtsho thad kyang mngon pasum tu 'gyur ba/ smon laM gyi bsgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skyes par 'gyur/ smon bI bsgo
354b3(phal chen): thod kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsgo tha~Md kyang rnar dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thob pa med pas kyang thams cad rjes
354b4(phal chen): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ gza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang tu phyin to// ltas na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge snyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song
354b5(phal chen): ste/ phyi nas dge bsnyen ma ya bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge snyen ma ya bzhin la lan rgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ 'di bskad ces smras/ 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
354b6(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi bar ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams la padam ngag dang rje su bstan pa/ 
354b7(phal chen): 'dzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan me
354b8(phal chen): pa bde bar rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo de'i mthu' mthong na don yod pa'o// rim gro byas pa don yod pa'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge
354b9(phal chen): ba'i gshes gnyen gyis yongasu ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmyigs la 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can ni
355a1(phal chen): na se nga gas pa byed na las bya sa su 'gyu gnas shes kyis mas tu thug phyogs nas gshegs pa nam ga 'ang dag pa sa gyi na nas
355a2(phal chen): 'di'i zhugs nas bskon nas panon/ gar phyogs nas de lta ba bzhin du phyongs bcu nas ne ba ni tu phyogs bcu nas de bzhin te/ 'gas kyi bu de lta bas mam bani de pa ni gshes ma ma 'tham par / gan pa dang mi sa
355a3(phal chen): ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang mi 'bral ba'i bskal ba mnyam par srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag rgya stong phrag rgya bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// gza' shing gi ra ba kun nas nA~M/ 
355a4(phal chen): khar rgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thaMd kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha sta go// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di ni gnas de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
355a5(phal chen): las phyir mi ldog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun tu rtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pa dag go/ smras pa 'phag ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas
355a6(phal chen): thugs bskyed pa/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni sngon nas rjesu dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
355a7(phal chen): pa kho bos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos ston pa/ kho mos yongasu bzung ba'o// de'i sngon rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa bri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la kho bos rab tu byung ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo yang
355a8(phal chen): kho bos rab tu bskor ro// de'i sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to// de'i sngon rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs rab pa
355a9(phal chen): ma'i dpal snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gabye ba rnam par snang 'dzad ces bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol na de bzhin gsheg pa bri ma kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa
355b1(phal chen): dag pa zhes bya ba byung / de'i snga ma du de bzhin gsheg pa rdo rje'i nug ces bya ba byung // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa cu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig tu rlung pa dang / brgal pa gcig nas gas/ 
355b2(phal chen): tuchud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig tu rgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chagasu bsis te/ dran par byas pa nas/ gang kho bos rim grong byas te/ bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / sti sngang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan snur
355b3(phal chen): mos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la kho bos tshangs par spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chu klung 'ag 'ag su bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rje su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan chad du khro mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed
355b4(phal chen): cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes kyis 'khyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bgrangs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i
355b5(phal chen): khongasu 'gro ba tha~Md chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rjes ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi bzhi zad tu 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad pa'o// rigs kyi bu byis pa
355b6(phal chen): chen pos 'gro ba zeng rgyas pang 'byings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongasu bsrud pas/ byang chub sems
355b7(phal chen): dpa' rnaMs ni tshad pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad
355b8(phal chen): yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khongasu chud par byed pas/ byang chub ses dpa' rjes ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes snang bI stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chung bar byed cing yang dag par dzin
355b9(phal chen): pas tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnas ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyi zhing thad du sems can rjes kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi bra bas 'khor lo mngon par sgrubs pas// 
356a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni tshad med do// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du shes pa'i stobs kyis chag gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba dzad kyi shin tu tshami par byed pas/ byang chub sems
356a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams na cad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed rang gi lus kyi 'byings pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs ni tshad med pa'o// nor brdzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod ji srid kyi
356a3(phal chen): na bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can brgya cig la gcig dmigs shing 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang
356a4(phal chen): rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skems pa yin te/ sems can rgya'i phyir ma yi ni/ sems can stong gi ngar yang ma yin/ sems can bye bI phyir ma yini/ sems can bye ba rgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ ses
356a5(phal chen): can bye ba rgya phrag stong gi phyir ma ya ni te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi don tu byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// sems can tha~Md kyi phyir ma yan/ seMs can gang gi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can
356a6(phal chen): ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byar phyur gyi phyir ma yani/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can nyer 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal byol gyi phyi ma yini/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin ses
356a7(phal chen): can ldan ldan gyi bya rI ma ya nI/ sems can phyod zin gyi phyir ma ya nI/ sems can phyang phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldem ldem phyir ma yin/ sems can dbyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mo mo'i phyir ma ya ni/ seMs
356a8(phal chen): tsan jam khrim gyi phyi ri ma yin// sems can nopo nub kyi phyi ma yin mA la/ sems can rgyud las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can padang langs kyi phyi ma yini/ sems can lam lum gyi phyi ma yini/ sems can rab 'i kye
356a9(phal chen): bya ma lan sems can thab tha'ib kyi phyi ma yin/ sems can 'jig rol gyi phyir sa yin/ sems can zin bya'i phyir ma ni/ sems can thas ma spyod kyi phyir ma lan/ sems can 'dramams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
356b1(phal chen): can drang breng gi phyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can rgyas 'das kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can sngo g.yos kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can zangs g.ya'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can 'phro rgya'i phyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can rtse phye'i phyir ma yin/ ses
356b2(phal chen): can yang than gyi phyi ma ya ni/ sems 'brug g.yos kyi phyi ma ya ni/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma ma ni/ sems can thang yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yul gyi phyi ni ma yin/ sems can nan tan gyi phyir ma yin/ 
356b3(phal chen): sems yid phyi'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag thos cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda' yal gyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can thug yal gyi
356b4(phal chen): phyaphyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can yang yud kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can brda' yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lce phyog gi phyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can thug thag phyi ma ya ni/ sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can rin
356b5(phal chen): yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyed med kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can spu phreng gi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yanan/ 
356b6(phal chen): sems can brjod pos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lto yas kyi phyir ma yan/ sems can spyod yul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yani/ sems can dag tham gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir/ 
356b7(phal chen): ma yin/ sems phyog phyag gi phyi ma ya ni/ sems can zil zil gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sa la sal gyi phyi ma yani/ sems can phun phun gyi phyi ma ya ni/ sems can rnang la'i phyi ma ya ni/ sems can rim grol gyi
356b8(phal chen): byabyiri ma ya ni/ se sa can rdzingag gi phyi ma ya nI/ sems can rdzi 'dul gyi byi ri ma ya ni/ seMs can yun yol gyi byir me yin/ sems can rol rol kyi phyi ma ya ni/ sems can da da kyi phyir ma lani/ sems can bgrang rtsi'i rgya
356b9(phal chen): ma yani/ sems can zab bgrang gA phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' spyad kyi phyi ma yin/ sems can 'azangs mtha'i phyir ma lani/ sems can phyong lal gyi bya ri ma yin/ sems can 'di khyod kyi bye ma yin/ sem can 'a / 
357a1(phal chen): g.yas byim ni/ sems gtsa yas du byas na/ sems drang 'byed na 'di/ sems ca bya byo byin man/ sems can ma seM bya na/ sems can canas mas kyi ma
357a2(phal chen): sems can lnga pa ldib kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can 'ban btsang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can pa phung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdal rtul gyi phyir/ ma ya ni/ sems can rgyud sde'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can yun 'bred kyi phyir ma
357a3(phal chen): yani/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yani/ sems can bran lon gyi phyi ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyi ma ya ni/ sems can snyan yangs kyi phyi ma yani/ sems can lang ling gi phyi ma yani/ sems can ldab
357a4(phal chen): lngab kyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can mi rtsal gyi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can phyan yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems canang 'brang gi phyir ma yini/ sems can sprul mal kyi phyir ma yani/ sems can bkra brtsal gyi phyir ma yin
357a5(phal chen): sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdzas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can le lo'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yani/ sems can phya 'brang gi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can grangs mchog/ 
357a6(phal chen): las bsgrubs pa'i phyir ma yani/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyi rim ya ni/ sems can dpag yas bsgres pa'i phyir ma ya ni/ sems can dpag yas phyong gi phyir ma ya ni/ sems can yal 'phyod bsgres pa'i phyir
357a7(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyi ma yin/ sems can mu lal la sogs pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byal
357a8(phal chen): pa'i phyi ma ya ni/ sems can mi 'jal ba las bsgrubs pa'i phyi ma ya ni/ sems can bsam 'phyong gi phyi ri ma ya ni/ sems can bsam 'byong las bsgres bI phyi ma yani/ sems can mtha' 'jam gyi phyir ma yan/ ses
357a9(phal chen): tsan mtha' ya 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yini/ sems can dpag thag gi phyi ma yini/ sems dpag bsam la sogs pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rjod pa med pa'i phyi ma yin/ sems can rjod du med pa las skyes/ 
357b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las skyes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa
357b2(phal chen): nas brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khasu rtogs pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi phyi ma yin/ gling bzhi bI 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khas su rtogs pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi phyi ma la
357b3(phal chen): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khas kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khas su rtogs pa'i sems can rjes kyi phyir ma yani/ stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brtul shAn tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khas
357b4(phal chen): su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas kyi brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khasu rtogs pa'i sems can rjes kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong
357b5(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khaMs brjod du med pa rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khasu rtogs pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi don tu 'di lta ste/ yong su smin par byas pa dang / 'dul bI phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
357b6(phal chen): kyi sems/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khaMs ma lus par lhag ma med pa/ mtha' dag thams cad tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi rog tu yongasu smin par byas pa dang / 
357b7(phal chen): bdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu sems skyed pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gcig snyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par byas pa dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
357b8(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu bskye ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu'i bsnyen bkur zhing / bsam par bya ba dang / mchod pa mi bye br-i Sh+ka'i/ phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par yin pa nas/ brjod tu med pa'i yang brjod tu med/ 
357b9(phal chen): yang brjod tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyud sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod cing ri brong bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyed pa ya ni/ 'jig
358a1(phal chen): rten gyi khas gcig tu rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing gnas par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i yang brjod tu med bI
358a2(phal chen): brtul shugs shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khasu gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rlud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems skyed pa
358a3(phal chen): ma yan/ no/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khes brjod pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing yongs
358a4(phal chen): su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi ses byang chub tu bsnyed pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gi gi snyan po yongasu bzung ba phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs
358a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub ses dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu bskyed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhag
358a6(phal chen): pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa las 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi rkyen las 'jug pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi
358a7(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skyed pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod bu med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brnyan la 'jug bI phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi se/ sa
358a8(phal chen): byang chub tu bskye ba ma ya ni/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la rnams par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu bskyed pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod
358a9(phal chen): du med pa'i brtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par che ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su
358b1(phal chen): bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma ya ni/ sangs kyis kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'khor lo yongasasu bzung ba'i phyir/ 
358b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub skye bar la ma yin pa nas/ sangs
358b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi son gyi sems rgya mtsho khong tu chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi 'khor
358b4(phal chen): lo'i dbang yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang gas/ 
358b5(phal chen): 'khor yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khongasu chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems gyi dbang sems byang
358b6(phal chen): chub tu skyed pa med pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med bI yang brjod du med rtul phra rab shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong tu chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu
358b7(phal chen): skye ba med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khas gcig/ bskal pa cig tu rlung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med pa'i/ 
358b8(phal chen): rdul gni tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khas bskal pa gcig nas cig tu rlung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khas gcig tu rtogs pa sems can
358b9(phal chen): thad kyi dpyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshas sbyor ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i yang rjod tu med bI rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'ji
359a1(phal chen): rten gyi khas ma rtogs pa'i sems can gyi stobs kyi khas spyod pa'i bags chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yan/ 'jig rten gyi khwa/ 
359a2(phal chen): gcig tu rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pargya 'tsho tha~Md la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyems pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjed du med pa'i yang rjod tu me
359a3(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gi khasu rtogs pa'i sems can tha~Md kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub du skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khas cig
359a4(phal chen): tu rtogs pa'i sems can tha~Md kyi las kyi rgya 'tsho thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa r+ya mtsho thams cad la 'jig rten pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod tu med pa'i yang
359a5(phal chen): rjod tu med pa'i rnal shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khesu rtogs pa'i byang sems can thad kyi dpyod yul r+ya mtsho thad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// 'jig rtem
359a6(phal chen): rten gi khas gcig tu rtogs pa'i seMs can thams cad kyi dpyod pa rgya mtsho thad kyi dpyod pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
359a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi kha su gtogs pa'i sems can tha~Md kyi dpyod pa rgya mtsho tha~Md kyi dpyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khongs du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 
359a8(phal chen): sems can gyi khas ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa/ mtha' dag thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad snyan
359a9(phal chen): bkur zhing / mnyer bar bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi smon ses byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gi khas ma lus pa thams cad tu rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhis
359b1(phal chen): mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim bror bya ba'i phyir byang chub bya 'i sems dpa' rnaMs kyi smon la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus kyi thams cad yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
359b2(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam gtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa ma lus pa thams cad yong su bzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i smon lam
359b3(phal chen): tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shugs brag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya bI
359b4(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi yi dam rten pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor r+ya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyang mngon par mos
359b5(phal chen): bar 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thaMd la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongasu bskyed pa yin/ sems can gyi 'khor lo'i dbang po ma lus pa yong su shes/ 
359b6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems ca kyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya bI phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 
359b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khaMs ma lus pa tha~Md kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu rlud pa la 'jug par bya bI phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag rgaT/ 
359b8(phal chen): kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i yong su bcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi rtson 'brus yongasu skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi 'tshas rgya 'tsho skam pa'i phyir/ byang chub
359b9(phal chen): sems dpa'o rnas kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char bar yani/ sems can ma lus pa dzad kyi dpyod pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rjes kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus
360a1(phal chen): zed kyi bsdug bsngal gyi me phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba ya ni/ rigs kyi bu mdor na/ de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa
360a2(phal chen): pa'i tshul dang sgo grangs med brgya stong phrag byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyi yongasu sgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes kyi dpyod pa yin zhes khong du chud par bya bI phyir/ chos thams ca
360a3(phal chen): la yang dag par gzhol bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams cad las yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gis smon lam na mkhri
360a4(phal chen): dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mtha' klas byar shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gi khams rnam par dag pa'i mthar gang thug pa de'i mtha' klas par shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam sems can thes
360a5(phal chen): kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal gyi mtha' gang tu thug pa'i mthas klas par shog shig/ de ltar smon lam btab po/ smras pa 'phags pa rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bya na smras pa
360a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu rnas par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa maud pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par shes pa de dag gcig tu shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
360a7(phal chen): chos thad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/ sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam partan pa'i phyir/ ri rab dang 'dra ba sems can tha~Md kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa phyir/ smon gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu'o// / 
360a8(phal chen): sems can tha~Md kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can tha~Md kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur byas/ so lha lte bu'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir/ rlung tu gyur pa/ sems can thaMd la
360a9(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba byin pa'i phyir/ rab rab mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i bsgras/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'bebs pa'i sman tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od gser gyi bra ba rab tu 'gyed bI
360b1(phal chen): phyar/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thaMd yongasu bsrung ba la bzhugs pa'i rgya byani lta bu/ de dag gi stod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa bas gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang chub sas
360b2(phal chen): raba'i smon lam gyi rnam par thar pa mthu' dpung med pa/ yongasu bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par slob pa 'di ni/ yul chu brtsang mes byas pa yod de/ de na drang srong
360b3(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan tu song la bris shig dang / de rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin
360b4(phal chen): gyi rkang pa gnyis la dbyi bos phyag btsal te/ dge slong ma yad bzhin la lan rgya stong du mas rnams phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang tu bstan te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ de 'chims gang bar dus te byang chub mchog tu
360b5(phal chen): dkon pa semasu sems shing / dge ba'i gshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dkon par rje su bsams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thob par bya brje/ su
360b6(phal chen): bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa dkon par rje su bsam pa dang / bskal pa mnyam pa'i med bI cha gshes gnyen phrad par dkon par rje su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag par ji ltar ba bzhi/ 
360b7(phal chen): tu mngon par mos shing / sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rje su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med pacing mi 'phrogs pa'i dpyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa dga'
360b8(phal chen): kha rje su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs brag po rnam par bskyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub
360b9(phal chen): sems dpa'i gdam ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa yong su dag par bya ba'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rna bar 'phel
361a1(phal chen): par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas lta ba'i shugs brag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter thob par bya ba shugs brag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i/ smon lam chen po mngon par
361a2(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i shugs brag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs kyi mngon par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrub pa zad rnam par
361a3(phal chen): 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi 'phrogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud tha~Md kyis dpung gis rgyal bar dga' zhing
361a4(phal chen): thub rka'i sems dang ldan pa/ de thar kyis yul chu ba rtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jig rten mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong 'jig rten mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyar bar gnas shing / shing sna tshogs
361a5(phal chen): grangs med pa'i gnags tshal mdangs dga' ba lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gas kun nas bsgrubs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i/ shing sna tshogs can rtag tu shing thog mang po dang / ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang
361a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis shing drung nor bu rin po che srang le ba kyasi rtag tu 'grigs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan ngan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par 'bres pa/ a ku ru yid tu 'ong ba'i las skyod kyi khri rtag tu 'byung bas rtag tu r+yar
361a7(phal chen): ba/ phyog bzhi nas shing ta la rnam par 'dzes par bskyes pas yongs su brgyan/ n+ya kro ta'i shing gi dbyibs yid la 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog sman pa 'phrul pa me tog gi tshal/ pad mo dang / 
361a8(phal chen): ud pa la dag gser du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ drang srong 'jig tshogs dbyangs/ brang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'brel ba'i
361a9(phal chen): bya skyabs zhig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can pags pa dang / rtsa'i gos gon pa/ shing shug gyi smad g.yogs can/ rtsa'i bstan la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / brang srong 'dzag tshogs dbyangs ga la ba der song
361b1(phal chen): ste/ phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang 'phrad par bsam pas/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ de zed mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i bsgo yin par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
361b2(phal chen): sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ni dge ba'i gsheg nyen gyis gdam ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ phyogs bcu'i ye shes ran po che'i klung tu skyes pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge bI/ 
361b3(phal chen): gshes gnyen gyis gnam ngaganyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pas/ tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag
361b4(phal chen): par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni grong tu phyin par byed pas/ mkhyes pa nyid kyi le ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongasu ston pas/ thams cad 'a
361b5(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid byis pa chen po'i stobs kyis tsam pa yongasu bskyed pa'i phyir/ mkhyen pa nyid bdugs ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen pos yongasu bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
361b6(phal chen): kyi shugs brag po ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba la ni/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la rag lus
361b7(phal chen): par mthong nas/ lus la thabs kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te/ brong srong mchog 'jig dbyangs la lan brgya stong tu mar bskor ba byas nas/ 'dun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas yid tu 'ong ba'i tshul gyis
361b8(phal chen): yad tu 'ong ba'i tshig brjod do// de bskad ces smra so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub rA pa'i byang chu sems dpa'i dpyod la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji
361b9(phal chen): ltar nan tan tu bgyi bar mtshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' nas la bde dag la rje su bsdu ba 'dzad do// zhes thos pa nas 'phags pa dang ji ltar byang chub sems/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la
362a1(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba bdag la bshad tu gsol/ de nas brang srong 'jags mchog dbyangs kyis bram ze'i byi ba stong phrag bcu po de la ltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis
362a2(phal chen): ba dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can tha~Md 'jigs pa med pa la 'gon tu gnyer ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i/ 
362a3(phal chen): don tu/ sta gon tu gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon par gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi chab btung 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o// ye she
362a4(phal chen): kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sgra ni bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab par 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten tu shar bar bya ste/ snang ba nyon mongs kyi bdud thams
362a5(phal chen): cad rab tu bzhal bar 'dod pa'o// sems can tha~Md la dge bI rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong gis bcu po de dag gis me tog bri zhim pa yid tu 'ong ba'i kha dog sna tshogs dang / ldan pa mang dro// 
362a6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtad do/ mngon par gtor to// mngon par nga phyag 'tshal to// de ltar bdud te phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ tshagri 'di skad tu brjod do// 'di ni sems can thaMd yongasu skyob bla/ 
362a7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i bsdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// byol song gi bskye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thaMd rnam par gnon par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad
362a8(phal chen): rnam par bzlog 'gyur ro// mi khom pa'i bsgo tha~Md gcod par 'gyur/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems par 'gyur ro// srid pa'i bcing ba gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyuraro// ma rig pa'i mu Na
362a9(phal chen): pa srel bar 'gyur/ bsod nas kyi khor yul gis 'jig rten yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongasu smon par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyi bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par
362b1(phal chen): sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rjes la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yang dag par bskon par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis byas pa de dag la 'di bskad ces smras/ byis pa dag gis bla na med pa yang
362b2(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyad ba spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can tha~Md kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/ rim gyis tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyuraro// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu
362b3(phal chen): 'dis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thaMd kyis yongasu spyong bar 'gyuraro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis tshong dpon kyi bu
362b4(phal chen): nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpag rno bar thar pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i/ rkyal mtshan thob pa'i/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dang
362b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i/ yul ji ltar bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi lag bzung ma thag tu/ de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing
362b6(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab skad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs drung na/ bdag nyid 'dug par she
362b7(phal chen): par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam par grangs med par dag brgyan dang / ldan par mthong ngo // de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/ kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs can/ rgyan
362b8(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khor bar mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po 'bar ba rlan pa dag zhugs par 'thong ngo // de dag yi ga gcig lnga
362b9(phal chen): kyang phyi phyogs pa med par chos ston par nyan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'bres par yang dag par 'dzin to// chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi khas sna tshogs la 'bab pa de
363a1(phal chen): de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyis/ rnam par sbyangs pa rgyas mtsho la'ang zhugs
363a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshor rnam par dgu par yang bzhugaso/ sangs rgyas kyi bsku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu/ rnam par 'gyur ba rnams par dmigs pa de dag kyang
363a3(phal chen): mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi bra ba 'dod chags dang / bral ba sna tshogs kyis/ rnam par dag pa'i brgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang bar bsgribs pa med pa dang
363a4(phal chen): ldan par bzhug so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgya mtsho/ mchog gi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin rjes par snang 'dzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzim
